title: Mapy.cz navigation & maps
description:
Never again will you get lost or bored with Mapy.cz. Use it while driving to get to where you want to be, showing you exactly where to turn right or left, or even take a break. All of this without being tied to an internet connection. Through your device Mapy.cz by Seznam.cz will guide you around the world. Our offline maps will show you every hiking and biking trail and you won’t miss a single castle, fabulous view or other attraction. In My maps you can save your special places and routes to files and easily sort them by trip or share them with others. You can also display restaurants, ATMs, public transport stations, accommodation tips and other destinations that may come in handy. There are even parking zones and public transport timetables for the cities. Maps of the whole world are downloadable and work without internet access.
 Mapy.cz is the hassle-free essential item for your trip.
 
 But Mapy.cz offers so much more. Offline you can:
 • Use downloaded maps even at the regional scale.
 • Search locations worldwide.
 • Look through and sort your saved trips in My maps including synchronization to the mobile app.
 • Plan routes for a car, bike or even on foot and then follow them, offline and worldwide.
 
 In the Mapy.cz navigation you will also find: 
 • Offline voice navigation for motorists, cyclists and pedestrians in multiple languages (Czech, English, Polish, German, French, Spanish, Russian)
 • In-car navigation with lane changing alert and speed warning. 
 • Free bike and pedestrian navigation. 
 • Weather forecasts with temperature, wind and precipitation for 5 days for any place on Earth. 
 • Current fuel prices at petrol stations in selected European countries. 
 • Offline tourist map of the world with marked tourist trails and bikeways.
 • Tips for trips in the area. 
 • My trip syncs maps on all devices after signing in. 
 • Tracker for recording and sharing routes showing your precise movements. You can even set it to stop recording automatically. 
 • Offline route planner with unlimited number of waypoints, height-profiles for car, bikes and pedestrians. 
 • Offline winter maps with cross-country trails and ski resorts. 
 • Boating information for Czechia, including navigation for rivers and weirs. 
 • Aerial maps of the whole world, panoramic images from Czech streets and 3D view. 
 • Upload photos to places feature. 
 • Offline search for places, coordinates, categories, including opening hours and contacts. 
 • Marked parking zones in cities in the Czech Republic. 
 • Timetables at public transport stops. 
 
 Recommendations and tips: 
 • You will need an internet connection to download the map. 
 • Turn on location services in the phone settings for the application to work properly. 
 • If you have any questions or problems, use the contact form in the settings.


Note: Running the app in the background with GPS running may significantly drain your battery power.
releaseNotes: Small improvements and fixies
reviews:
Unfortunately Mapy.cz is no longer supported on iOS 15.7.2. On that OS 6.35.1 is the last supported app version and that is quite frequently crashes when zooming out.

It was a great map but sadly I have to say goodbye to it. I don’t quite understand why a map has the need for the latest and greatest OS, since Google Maps still works just fine (although I am not a fan of that map), but whatever… | goodbye | I’d give it 5* especially as a map for hiking trails on a mobile except for it crashing on iPads. Still, disregarding its crashing on iPads, best map for hiking trails. Hopefully it gets fixed for iPads as that would make it easier for planning hikes. | A Scottish friend told me about mapy. It’s a great app but would like to create an account to access festires like saving etc. I have tried many times to create an account. No matter how I try I can’t send them the needed text to verify an account. Tried the help page (issue not addressed). Tried contacting on Twitter (X) Nothing. My friend tried. Nothing. | An awesome app 👍👍 | It doesn’t calculate well from my home to work, supposedly other app tells me that I do 16 minutes but this app tells me that I do 7 minutes please fix the traffic live | لماذا لاتوجد لغه عربيه | This app was invaluable during our trek on TMB. It showed TMB trails and variants.  I’ll use it for future hikes! | The visualization and readability of Mapy is second to none. And their routing instructions (voice and pointers, etc) are super. 
What I find frustrating is that the app doesn’t seem to be able to find destinations unless they are entered exactly as in the database. A misspelled name (maybe a “Wisslerstr.” Vs a “Wißlerstr”, a slightly different postal code (eg D-61234 vs 61234) or other things -  and the  the search comes up empty!

And occasionally the routing is not functioning (try walking to Venlo station from Germany sometime… you end up standing in front of an empty field) or is really silly (like going around three corners just to return to the original street). 
But there’s great potential there, and it has supplanted my other guidance apps (except for Google maps, I still keep that to check…) | Absolutely amazing!!! Awesome tool if you’re planning a hike or a bike trip. | Have enough maps.  Used windy for weather. Will delete app now that it is map and not weather. | For Georgia, the map is very old. There is some building from 2018-2017 and some routes, with not seen in app. Take maps from openstreet maps ♥️ | I have been using Mapy for five years and have found it incredibly useful for hiking in the many places I have been (US, Europe, North Africa). The amount of detail is astonishing and always correct. Even in the kasbahs of Morocco it proved useful. The tracking feature is handy for documenting my hikes. Unfortunately I have been unable to open an account since that seems to require a Czech email address. | This app combines benefits of general Google-like street map with reasonable level hiking map. It is a good compromise for both. | Gôigo | Well done | Excellent maps and totally free. No commercials. Five stars for that.
One downside is a very poor integration with other apps by seznam.cz. | “What’s the news” note is on screen when I open app. I am not able to close the note and go to map, because the “go to map” button is below and out of the screen view, so I can’t go to the map. I have an iPad Pro. Their web site email site is not in English, so I can’t sent call for help!

Update: deleted app and redox loaded it again, so now it is working.
Another problem with app is when traveling the interstate highways the app wants me to get off at exits and get right back on?
Also directions are sometimes very wrong, so I have to carefully review and change by adding stops.
This is a overall a great app, especially using it for biking paths and recording trips. | By far my favorite mapping app. It’s so good to zoom in and in until you see walking paths at mountains. Plus it’s the rare map that displays house numbers along the street. | How do I switch from kilometers to miles? | I have been using mapy.cz for 5 years for trail running/hiking and I love them for good quality offline trail maps. I’ve been using them in Czech Republic, Ukraine, USA, they are pretty good everywhere

Only issue I ever had is that once it happened that my offline maps became inaccessible and required an update at an inconvenient moment: while I was out in the mountains with bad connection. Thanks God, the connection was good enough to use online maps at least. Otherwise, I would be screwed | Supr appka, nejlepší aplikace pro pěší výlety a podobně. Dále je možné stáhnout mapy offline.
Chtělo by to vylepšit možnost ukládání oblíbených míst, ideálně možnost přiřadit danému místu ikonu, tak jak to lze např. v aplikaci Peepkey. Díky za vylepšení!! | Well designed layout.
OK routing engine. 
Excellent for the quick trip planning. 

Missing on some very important features:

1. Lacking ability to save favorite places and routes without need to register / login / internet access (other apps alike allow for that functionality) 
2. Lack of detailed TOPO layer maps missing on many beautiful routes. 
3. For MTB you are better of using their Hiking routes for the most part. Their MTB / road routes include forest gravel roads but exclude any narrower gravel or dirt roads even those are highway like to MTB or CX or Touring bike. 

Overall great app with room for improvement. 

Cheers! | Best app for hikers, cyclists or skiers. This app helped me to find the correct route in sticky situations. You can download the maps to your phone for free. Thank you Seznam.cz for this awesome app. | App was highly recommended for euro biking. It will not let me look at bike routes between cities a few days in the future; will only start at my current location. So far it’s of no help. Here We Go is free and works. | The app doesn’t run, it crashes! | Very nice guide for biking, walking and hiking. All bike ways in Italia as well. Likely it is memory related problem. Will keep trying with mr10. | And it is czech product! :) | We live in Cesky Raj and have recently taken up cycling. Having downloaded the offline version of the Czech Republic on to an iPhone 6s, the chances of us getting lost are pretty well zero. Even with a poor E signal the app pinpoints exactly where we are. The cycle trails are very clear, the cartography is much above average and we couldn't be more pleased. The app offers route choices for car, cycling and walking and can open up more information about points of interest. There are many more features available and the price is right! | Mapy.cz konecne dostaly podporu pro ipad, konecne jsme se dockali. Rozhrani je sice telefonni (stahnout spravnou mapu vyzaduje pomalu pravitko...), ale aspon uz mapa zabira temer cely displej.

Dekuji za (konecne) nejlepsi mapu CR :-) | Nova verze vypada velmi slibne. Chybi mi moznost kdyz mam v planovani vice mist pro jeden vylet, chybi moznost jednoduse menit poradi cilu, stejne jako na webu. | This app saved my butt numerous times, got me thru Prague driving, and even shows house numbers in the small villages. Offline map saves your data allotment. IMHO, this is the one real must-have besides Google Translate. | Super app, from small country. | Doufala jsem, že budu moct používat tuhle app při jízdě na kole. Ale jsem hrozně zklamaná. Aplikace “nenaviguje”, neotáčí se jako klasická GPS, není možné upravit trasu, při schování na pozadí (kvůli šetření displaye baterky) se “vynuluje” cílová destinace… radši bych zaplatila i 50 USD za update, aby to fungovalo, než mít aplikaci, která mě brutálně frustruje…. :( | Myslel jsem, ze aplikace využije na tabletu všechny moznosti, ale jsme totálně zklamaný. "Stáhněte si aktualizaci mapy" bohužel vždy skončí na hlášce "Chyba. Něco se pokazilo ..." Tento problem přetrvává dlouhodobě. | Great app, just wish the information about sites had an option to translate. | Opět bez chyb, pokud nepočítáme iPad. | Byl bych moc rad abych mohl používat mapy i pro Ipad nato se neda dívat jak Jeto zvětšené. Jinak apk super jen tak dal | I am very satisfied!! Perfect! | Nejde naplánovat trasu!?

title: Wolt Delivery: Food and more
description:
Wolt makes it incredibly easy to discover and get great food, groceries and anything you might need delivered in your city. Whatever you’re in the mood for, we’ll make sure it gets delivered to you. Just pick a restaurant or shop, choose what you want, swipe to order and let us do the rest!

No time for cooking? Don’t want to leave the house to do your shopping? We’ve all been there. That’s why we became the online experts on the greatest local shopping experiences and restaurants. Anything you need, we’ve got you covered with our 35 000+ restaurant and shop choices.

You’ll be kept in the loop on the status of the delivery in real-time, with a minute-by-minute countdown. If staring at a clock isn’t your thing, don’t worry – we'll also send you notifications so you know when your order is about to arrive.

We don’t like to brag, but we take customer support seriously, with a team of wonderful, friendly people in every one of the 23+ countries we operate in. They are just a chat away and respond in seconds.

Getting your food should be as simple as possible. That’s why you can pay conveniently and securely with your credit card or Apple Pay. Whatever works for you.

Wolt is currently available in 145+ cities located in Japan, Germany, Israel, Finland, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania, Czech Republic, Hungary, Poland, Croatia, Serbia, Georgia, Greece, Slovakia, Slovenia, Cyprus, Malta, Azerbaijan and Kazakhstan. More are added all the time!
releaseNotes: At Wolt, we work tirelessly to bring you the best app we can. That means adding and improving features and functionality, squashing bugs, polishing design, and trimming texts. If you see something not quite working properly, chances are we're already working on a fix.
reviews:
They will deliver you expired groceries and refuse to refund you when you submit proof. Use one of the other delivery apps instead | Wolts become my favorite delivery app, orders are generally delivered very quickly and the app is very easy to use. The only downside is the customer service bot before connecting you to representative can be annoying but I have to say.... Wolt has always stood by their service and has always refunded in the case of a mistake made without dragging me along. For that great app.... If something goes wrong you don't have to worry.... Some might say too good lol I've ordered over 80 times this year it's too convenient. | I ordered khinkali from “shemometchama” restaurant , I was waiting for 1 hour and 30 minutes, then I have received a call from restaurant and they told me my order is ready already for 30 minutes and no one picked it up!!!! SO IT WAS COLD!! I texted support and they told me that they are “sorry” I said I won’t pay for the cold food because it is their issue not mine. I asked them to cancel the order but instead they blocked my access to my cash payment!!! Bravo bravoo you idiots I won’t use you app anymore !!! | საუკეთესოა ქალაქში 💯 | Wolt application is great but the service itself is the worst I’ve ever experienced on delivery market. Every second delivery is late for 1 - 1,5 hours and there is zero customer support | Nice and user-friendly design :) | The worst app and service i have ever seen | Much easier to use | order food, get it raw, ask customer support for help and they confirmed with kfc that they did everything all good. my dog liked those wings | Expect a wait, and expect the estimated time to be 30 minutes to 2 hours later then it says. I’ve had 100+ orders and most of them are very late. | An empathetic app if there ever was one, with user flows that fulfill your every desire in a delivery app. The drivers are always delightful which speaks highly as to how the company treats people. | Service in Serbia is horrible, i deleted app because of the customer service . Very bad and unproffesional. | There is no way to register on this app. It wont send me SMS verification code. Support is terrible, taking forever to answer and not helping with anything. | всегда долгая доставка еда остывает пока доедет и многие заведения не правильно кладут заказ всегда чего-то не хватает или там волосы | Ordered from Wolt Market, order accepted waited for 30-35 minutes, and order rejected. | After a 3 week trip to belgrade back in october, i am back again and one thing I have been looking forward to is Wolt! It’s a thousand times better than doordash or glovo, I tell everyone back at home in america to stop using doordash so they are forced to step up their game! | Pls allow adding photos to delivery address | If you want to be disappointed with your order, you can try ordering from them | Worst customer service in budapest | Do not expect any help with your orders. If you have any issues regarding your order, they will fight back tooth and nail be ever giving you a refund. | If you’re a tourist or a short term resident or you enter your card number incorrectly a couple of tomes the app will automatically ban you and you can’t order food or do anything about it | Prevaranti, dobijes kredit i samo ti blokiraju da ne mozes da koristis i nikome nista... | Their couriers contact you via third party applications (Viber, Whatsup, Facebook, Instagram, etc…)

They use rude and commanding language. | I ordered a surprise gift for my moms bday. They couldn’t find my address ( I have had deliveries to my address before may times without any issues). And they charged the poor driver when I said it didn’t get delivered to my mom. Imagine you are a teller and they take every shortage of your teller cash from your paycheck. It’s crappy and unfair to drivers. The app only makes sure it gets its money without any expenses. | Amazing delivery time and very concerned to find the right person, good energy!! | Great app, love it!
Please make iPad version.
Dynamic island support would be great addition. | I’ve been consistently disappointed with Wolt’s food delivery service. The customer service is unhelpful, and there’s a recurring issue of missing items from my orders. Despite reaching out, the policies seem to favor the company rather than addressing the customer’s concerns. It’s frustrating to encounter these issues repeatedly, and I’m considering exploring alternative food delivery options. In each food delivery, I have to spend more time on the support of the order than enjoying the food and delivery. Not acceptable and not recommended! | App said they sent me a message but I never received the SMS | I had to recently travel to Europe to study abroad and this app saved me! They deliver very late and it is always efficient. It is not very expensive and my food was always delivered in 15 minutes or less and still hot. Compared to food delivery here in America that is a Treasure! This app is awesome. | It’s terrible that they don’t have a plus for customers that order over 10’times a month like I do so we can’t get free delivery and pay monthly…support has no idea what they are doing as well as IT sector…this is specifically for Serbia and I’m done with this app | It’s all fun and games until you have a problem. I had a couple of issues  with restaurants not delivering items. Restaurants can’t send missing items so I had to attempt resolving issues with Wolt’s customer support. First the bot asks several questions in the span of 3-4 minutes each and then a person takes over, with even greater delays. In both of my cases they declined repeat delivery and offered credit for the missing items, which wasn’t satisfactory as they never reimbursed for the trouble. I regret getting food through Wolt.  I’ll know better next time. | Apple Pay intermittently works and credit cards are totally broken (as an American user sending food to friends in Europe) | I would expect a live activity on the lock screen from nothing but Wolt, it’s a necessary feature that’s missing for whatever reason 
Otherwise the app is extremely well done, I love it | jako jako losa usluga ponasanje im je krajnje ne profesionalno. | Dev team deserves a raise. Great looking app, easy and efficient to use. The haptics, widgets, animations, everything is top tier and beats the competition out of the water. The service itself along with the support team is also superb but kudos to the dev team | Customer support is subpar, with excessively long response times, absent manager communication, and an overall unsatisfactory service experience. | I placed an order, but it was canceled after 40 minutes, which resulted in a disappointing experience. | Incredibly negative experience with the extremely unprofessional and clueless customer support. 

After spending over 1000$ in the app in a two month period, when an order was not delivered to me, I was told there was “nothing they can do” because the courier said they delivered it. No offer of a refund, no offer to deliver the order again. Just a “too bad” you’re out 30$ with no food. 

I loved using Wolt but after this experience, I cancelled my pro account and have transitioned to a new delivery app. | if it’s available in your country, opt for Glovo or other courier services. every order is late 20 minutes minimum, and when you complain about it, the answers are slow, automated and quite unprofessional. You have to beg and check in three times with order support to merely *get* your order, and even then it’ll be 20 minutes minimum or more late than when you originally ordered it, and will come cold and hastily packed. The app was way better a year ago, now it’s a disaster | Occasionally they take the money without give us an order and they took the money and told us to text them in 3 days but after that they didn’t give us any solution and they stole the money so i don’t advise to pay and make an order from this app | In my 24 years of presence on this planet, never have I ever experienced such magnificent customer service as Wolt’s. 5 stars, no second thoughts. | შეკვეთის სისტემა აქ ძალიან ცუდი, თუ უკვეთავ ერთი რესტორნიდან 3 ერთიდაიგივე პროდუქტს სხვადასხვა შემადგენლობით ჯერ მარტო ერთი უნდა აირჩიო და მერე შეკვეთა უნდა დააკორექტირო და ამატო პროდუქცია, და ეს დამატების ინფორმაცია ღილაკადაც არ არი გამოტანილი ქვემოთ წერია წვრილი შრიფტით, ცუდი გამოცდილებით გავიგე ეგ დეტალი, ამ მხრივ გლოვო უფრო მარტივია და ფიდბექის კმაყოფილიც არ დავრჩი როდესაც ცხელ ხაზს ვესაუბრე | Ne koristite wolt uzasna aplikacija podrska ne odgovara poz | i ordered food waited more than 2 hours half of food came courier said that another part will be in 30 min then support not responding already 5 hours worst app ever i used stoled my money and no answers . | How an app can get worst instead of better? The logistic in it simply don’t work. Couriers go opposite direction. 10 min delivery become 40. The support has a bot that does not solve anything. | I travel the world for work and used many an app and in many a city. In a sea of poor packaging, disappointing portions and flavor,  Wolt in Ljubljana has been the absolute best so far. Delivery is better than predicted, restaurant choice is solid, taste and portion sizes are phenomenal. If you aren’t feeling up to venturing out, let Wolt help! You won’t be disappointed. | They are slow to deliver and their eta is never accurate.  Customer support is useless. Avoid | Невозможно зарегистрироваться, код не приходит ни на один из телефонов, ссылка на почту приходит битая. Попробуйте нормальных разработчиков нанять, вместо шимпанзе | I asked support to message restaurant to heat food a little bit more (from previous experience I know that it is not as hot as I like), but he ignored my request and said it's would be hot. As expected it came cold and support didn’t acknowledge that it was his fault. | The biggest bad app to deliver food try glovo its better 😂

title: Vinted: preloved marketplace
description:
Join Vinted, your community marketplace for buying and selling pre-loved pieces. Need a clearout? Get extra money in your pocket while you do it. Sell without fees and browse unique items from vintage fashion to second-hand homeware, from pet accessories to kids’ toys, to great-value books, and more. 

Selling is simple
Take photos of your item, describe it, and set your price. You’ll get notifications about favourites or purchases, and all the info you need in one place. 
- Declutter and earn extra cash. Sell clothes you don’t need to someone who’ll love them. 
- There are 0% selling fees on Vinted, so everything you earn is yours to keep. 
- Shipping made easy. Download pre-paid shipping labels and track parcels all within the Vinted app. 
- Sell securely. Our integrated payment system means you can send your funds straight to your bank. 

Shop smarter
Discover something on Vinted that suits your style no matter who you are. Shop for your favourite brands at great-value prices. 
- Rare finds make great wardrobes. Uncover unique, quality items – including one-off deals that help your budget go further.  
- You’re in safe hands. Our Buyer Protection, including our refund policy, helps keep your money safe if something goes wrong. Purchase securely with payment methods such as Vinted Balance and credit or debit card. 
- Delve into a range of categories, follow members who inspire you, and customise your feed to find the items you love. 
- Ship your way. Choose a shipping method and price that’s right for you, whether it’s delivery to a pick-up point or your doorstep. 

Join a global fashion movement
Become part of a diverse community of over 75 million members worldwide who share a passion for second-hand style. Chat with buyers or sellers directly, and ask your questions all in one place. Explore wardrobes and trade easily with members across the country. 

Ready to join the conversation? 
Download the second-hand fashion app. 

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@vinted 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/vinted
Find out more in our Help Centre: https://www.vinted.co.uk/help
releaseNotes: We’ve been working to fix what needed fixing. This update: less bugs + faster app. Treat yourself to it.
reviews:
Many shipping issues and customer support will not reply for days. | Thank you so much! Everything is perfect :) | Very good seller | The purse shows no flaw.very satisfied of my purchase. | Thank you everything is perfect ! | Great seller. Very accommodating and ships my jacket right away. Thank you.  May God bless you in Jesus His Son.  With much love,  Grace | Thank you ! | This app use to be my favorite now it’s gone down hill the shipping prices are crazy high it’s like every week they add something new to charge I’m about to delete this app | A scammers paradise!! Sellers frequently steal tracking numbers from the dark web and then never send the items they sell. Since the tracking numbers show delivery, it appears legitimate and there is nothing that can be done for the buyer. There is NO PROTECTION for buyers. I had over $100 stolen from me. Wish I had known about this scam | Envoi très rapide et montre en très bon état comme mentionné dans la description 👌 | Omg this is perfect! Thank you so much! | I made a listing that was authentic and I have proof of my purchase yet I was blocked for “illegal activity/scamming” through the automatic detector. It’s ridiculous and the checks are not thorough. My listing looked exactly like the others for similar items and I used my own pictures I took through my iPhone so I don’t see the issue. I would never use this selling platform again! | Amazing! | Won’t let me look at anything without forcing me to make an account, you can close out of the pop up but it reappears constantly and quits you out of your search | The item was in perfect condition, delivered fast. Thank you so much! | I tried to use this app twice to buy and both times did not receive my item. One was cancelled and one never showed up. The customer service was, in addition to being very hard to find, of no help. Such a pity. | Desperately needs to let us categorize our favorites! I would purchase double the amount I do now if I could put things in categories to compare them! I thought it used to have this function, why get rid of it? | Beautiful thank you!!!! | The items we’re packaged with care and arrived in pristine condition!  Shipping was fast. Highly recommend ! | Amazing seller!!! Managed to organise and have items delivered in time for me leaving for holiday. Great communication. | well actually my butt looks kinda small in these LMFOAOA but they r so cute i love first order and im luvin this app! brought them from the sweetest person ever she reassured me that i was not getting scammed and all so sweet will buy from her again 😜😜😜 | Great seller ❤️ | Don’t even bother to download the App.. as soon as I made an account it was suspended for no reason at all.. NOT WORTH THE DOWNLOAD! | Fast delivery, everything is in tact | You are disgusting I registered myself the first time in my life and you excuse me of fraud…i can’t talk to the support snd nobody tells me what is going on | My account got blocked for suspected fraud. I don't know why :( | Good app if you are selling cheap stuff, wouldn’t recommend it for expensive stuff, my original item got removed and i received zero customer assistance despite waisting a boosting as well. I would suggest more professional apps like Grailed. | My package arrived promptly and the item was exactly as described! Thanks so much! 😁 | The ads given stop my music I am listening to and it is very annoying, makes me exit the app because of how much of a nuisance it becomes. | This is a good app with solid design and functionality, but I’ve experienced too many lags! Pages will not load and I’m stuck with the dreaded spinning wheel. It happens every time I use the app. | Love everything about Vinted, but when I use it it is constantly popping up an error message “whoops! Something went wrong” it’s hard to navigate when this message is constantly popping up. | FAST shipping, FAST communication really really nice and easy to deal with !! Thanks so much !!!!!! | Excellente ♥️♥️♥️ | Fast easy transaction. Recommended ! | Good communication and fast delivery, thank you :) | Everything was in good condition and fast shipping. Great communication and great pricing service i am a satisfied, customer. 😃 | Fast shipping, item just as described ✨ | Vendedora súper amable. El abrigo una pasada🥰. Todo perfecto | Customer support is terrible if you ever have an issue. Sure, the prices are great and you might get lucky with some great finds, but if you EVER have an issue with it, you’re toast. I bought a bag on here that was a little pricey after fees (even after I made an offer), and it came smelling like straight smoke and beef jerky. Because I made an offer, Vinted said they can’t do anything about it. Tried to contact the seller and silence. I’m stuck with a bag that makes me nauseous but I spent too much money to give it to Goodwill 😭 STICK WITH MERCARI AND POSHMARK. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. | Vendedora de 10. | Gracias!! | Perfcet seller | They blocked me after I record face oil next box. I wanna show that oil is full and new. They framed me that cosmetic is used. You wrote with robot and nobody cares that is not true 😞 | 😍😍😍 | Everything was fine, I like the items and they are better than they’ve been described 😂 | Tout est parfait 
Le pull l’emballage la livraison 
Mille mercis | You can only translate to  English on your computer and not on your phone app. This makes it really hard if you use your phone mostly. I hope they update this app to make it more user friendly for international users. 

Also watch out for scammers! I got scammed immediately. I scanned a QR code and it directed me to a site that was identical to Vinted. It told me to put my information in to receive payment.  There is no way to get your money back if you do this. If your new don’t scan any QR codes, it will direct outside of the website or app. Don’t expect any photos as payment. I’m blocking scammers almost every day. | Initially, I was excited to use their platform, seeing it as a valuable resource for selling items. I dedicated substantial time and effort to photograph each item personally, meticulously ensuring that the photos were clear and professional by using a white background and even going the extra mile to watermark my images to prevent them from being copied.

However, my enthusiasm quickly dwindled when, shockingly, Vinted deleted all my listings, unjustly claiming the photos weren't mine. This accusation couldn't be farther from the truth, as I personally took each photo. 

What makes this situation even more frustrating is the apparent lack of a reliable mechanism to verify the originality of images, leading to unjustified deletions of authentic listings. Such experiences not only waste the seller's time and effort but also significantly undermine trust in Vintive's systems and policies.

After this ordeal, I made the decision to delete my account, concluding that Vinted is not the supportive and reliable platform I initially believed it to be. This incident has been incredibly disheartening, and I feel compelled to advise others to reconsider using  their services.

Potential users, please proceed with caution. | i’ve tried Poshmark and Marcari they are horrible | I have found so many amazing finds and i have to give Vinted 5 stars for the fact i found so many rare items on the app.

title: foodora Czechia: Food Delivery
description:
Do you fancy a meal from your favourite restaurant or would you like to do a quick shop from the store? Treat yourself to a juicy burger, fresh sushi, healthy salad, sweet cake or restock your fridge. Order whatever you want, whenever you want.

Download the app and order

Our app is full of great restaurants and shops, including our online supermarket - foodora MARKET. Download the app and order.

How foodora works

Enter an address you want your order to be delivered at, we'll come to where you need us. It's morning and you have an uncontrollable craving for steak and mash, or maybe you're out of toothpaste and you're in your pajamas? Download the foodora app and your order is with you in minutes. And if you're wondering where the courier is, you can track your order in real time. 

Why foodora

Looking for popular restaurants in your area? Want to try new food? Or try out how our grocery delivery or foodora MARKET works? Order whatever you want. Our courier will be at your door in minutes, while you can make the most of your time.

Contact us

Have you ordered from us before? We are interested in your opinion so that we can continuously improve.

How did we do? Email us at zakaznici@foodora.cz

For more information, visit: www.foodora.cz
releaseNotes:
Along with the new foodora brand, we have now launched a unique program we are excited to offer our customers: foodora PRO.
Aiming to our most loyal users, the program will offer an exclusive suit of benefits through a membership fee.
reviews:
Regularly withholds the order for 30+min from the restaurants because it doesn’t have enough drivers in Prague. A 20-30minute predicted wait typically becomes 90minutes 

Would not recommend | I don’t understand why you don’t support live activities. I like Foodora, but Wolt supports live activities so I usually order from there now. | Jako jídlo přivezou ale doplatek za malou objednavku? Jako vážně? | I’m tourist in CZ and ordered food but delivery men didn’t notice me (can’t call) and cancelled delivery but I don’t get money back and compensation and I left without money and food vey bad service I try to contact to help service and they said no compensation and etc but delivery men didn’t come to home I wait for home outside of my home | Tried to verify various phone numbers, but the text message never came through. | Let me tell you what buddy. My fiancé and I had been out of the country for weeks. We had begun to feel just a little bit homesick. And delivery McDonald’s at 11pm on a Friday night was just what the doctor ordered. Specifically , a mcchicken, fries, and some of that absolutely slapping Coke Zero. Could not have accomplished this without the help of this app. Have ordered like 4 times with it since we been here now. Always quick, orders arrive accurately, and food is warm/hot. | In Czechia/The Czech Republic this service is better than Uber eats by allowing grocery delivery and food delivery and providing a vast array of goods and foods | Downloaded the app to use their 200kc discount but it was refused. Tried again on my wife’s phone, refused. Deleted the app and picked up food myself. Probably not to use delivery services anyway, bad for restaurants. | Compared to Bolt the user interface is terrible. We cannot see a map showing where the rider is. And the estimate is just not right. It always says less than 5 minutes away and then you have to wait another 20. | The deliveries are often 1-3 hours late. Support can't even contact the drivers or restaurants and even when it's obvious the food isn't coming, they won't give refunds. Try literally any other delivery service in Prague. | have been burned multiple times where orders are just not delivered at all. use wolt. dame jidlo is trash | Někdy to je dobrý ale někdy mě tak naserou ze už ani nemám chuť jist | The app is very easy to use requiring minimum number of steps to order food. The selection of restaurants is also very good. Great job! | Ordered a pizza at 7pm.  Dame Jidlo said 25 minutes.  90 minutes later they cancelled my order. title: Meteoradar
description:
Meteoradar – nejpřesnější předpověď srážek pro Česko

Aplikace Meteoradar je jednou z nejstahovanějších aplikací na iPhone a iPad. Aplikace nabízí řadu zajímavých funkcí. Zobrazí nejen aktuální srážky nad Českem, ale i jejich předpověď na následující hodinu. Nechybí ani údaje o aktuálních teplotách, větru, srážkách nebo stavu počasí. Meteoradar umožňuje sledovat vývoj počasí téměř v reálném čase. Data jsou aktualizována každých 10 minut.

* Srážky a jejich předpověď (radar)
Aplikace na mapě zobrazí aktuální srážky nad Českem a Německem s přesností až 1 km. Nechybí ani předpověď jejich vývoje na následující hodinu (dostupné u českého radaru). Přesně tak poznáte, kdy přeháňka dorazí přímo do vašeho města. Radarové snímky Česka poskytuje ČHMÚ a snímky Německa poskytuje DWD.

* Údaje z meteostanic
Na mapě jsou dostupné údaje z více než 150 meteorologických stanic. Meteorologické stanice zaznamenávají teplotu, vítr, srážky ale i vlhkost nebo tlak vzduchu. U každé stanice je v grafu uveden vývoj teploty.

* Blesky
V případě bouřek aplikace zobrazí i místa, kde uhodil blesk. Na základě radarového snímku potom poznáte, jak se bude bouřka nadále vyvíjet.

* Meteozprávy
Aplikace zobrazuje informace o počasí přímo od uživatelů, kteří sledují počasí v daných místech.

* Přidávejte informace o počasí
Aplikace umožňuje zasílat informace o počasí ve vaší lokalitě. Pokud se u vás vyskytuje například silná bouřka, stačí v aplikaci vytvořit hlášení o počasí, které si následně přečtou stovky lidí. Přidat můžete aktuální fotografii či popis počasí. Ostatní lidi tak varujete před nepříznivým počasím, které panuje ve vašem městě a pravděpodobně zasáhne i další.  

* Widget
Díky přehlednému widgetu získáte rychlý přehled o aktuálních srážkách na našem území.

Poskytovatelem radarových snímků a detekce blesků z Česka je Český hydrometeorologický ústav. Poskytovatelem radarových snímků Německa je DWD. Databázi kamer poskytl sever Webcams.cz.
releaseNotes:
- Zobrazení aktuality o počasí (lze povolit / zakázat v nastavení)
- Nově lze nastavit průhlednost radaru
- Tmavý režim a optimalizace pro iOS 13
- Opravy chyb
reviews: Love that you can see so much territory and get a whole one hour forecast. Thanks! | Po otevření aplikace okamžitě zčerná a sama se zavře.. | Konečne nejaký radar aj pre CZ/SK. Účel spĺňa, ale dizajn je hrozný - ako port z Androidu - zapracujte na tom.

title: Sleep Monitor: Sleep Tracker
description:
Are you a room shaker or a snorter? Sleep Monitor is your professional sleep assistant to help you optimize your sleep and improve your overall well-being.

With advanced technology and a user-friendly interface, our app is designed to help you fall asleep easily, track your sleep cycles, and wake up refreshed every morning. Discover the truth with Sleep Monitor together! 

KEY FEATURES
【Fall Asleep Easily】
-Say goodbye to tossing and turning! Breathing exercises will quickly help you relax and focus your energy, making it easier to fall asleep. 
-Choose from over 130+ sleep sounds, including mindful meditation and relaxing music, to create a soothing environment that promotes deep sleep.

【Sleep Talk Recorder】
-Ever wonder what happens during your sleep? Use Sleep Monitor to capture any snoring, dream talk, coughing, teeth grinding, or other noises you make while sleeping. 
-This valuable information can help detect sleep apnea and guide a treatment plan.

【Track Sleep Cycles】
-We all go through different sleep stages during the night. By tracking your sleep cycles, you can gain insights into your sleep patterns and understand how well-rested you truly are. 
-Usually, sleepers will pass four sleep stages in one sleep cycle: Non-REM 1(between waking and sleep), Non-REM 2(light sleep), Non-REM 3(deep sleep), and REM sleep(dreaming). From non-REM stages to REM sleep, we provide a scientific perspective on your sleep quality.

【Bedtime Reminder & Smart Alarm Clock】
-Allow notifications to remind you when it's time to wind down and prepare for sleep. 
-Wake up feeling refreshed in your light sleep phase with our intelligent alarm clock, featuring gentle nature sounds.

【Detailed Sleep Analysis】
-With Sleep Monitor, you'll receive a comprehensive analysis of your bedtime behaviors and sleep patterns. Weekly or monthly sleep reports allow you to track changes over time.
-Dream analysis can help individuals gain self-awareness, understand unresolved issues, and promote personal growth.

【Mark Sleep Factors/Add Sleep Notes】
-Discover how external factors affect your sleep quality by marking sleep factors such as caffeine consumption, late-night meals, exercise, or any other relevant notes. 
-Gain a deeper understanding of what helps or hinders your sleep.

【Apple Health Integration】
-For a complete overview of your health, Sleep Monitor seamlessly integrates with Apple Health. 
-Exchange steps and heart rate data to gain valuable insights into your overall well-being.

TARGET USERS
-People who are suffering sleep disturbances (difficulty falling asleep, frequent wake-ups, dreaminess, insomnia);
-People who want to do self-diagnosis whether there are signs of poor sleep quality;
-People who want to understand their sleep quality and improve their sleep;
-Sleep Monitor is especially helpful for those who want to monitor their sleep quality, and don’t want to spend money on wearable devices such as smartwatches.

REQUIREMENTS
√ Place your iPhone near your pillow or next to your bed
√ Sleep alone to eliminate distractions
√ Sufficient battery

ABOUT SUBSCRIPTION
-It will be charged from your iTunes account after the purchase.
-The subscription will be auto-renewed 24 hours before the subscription period ends with the same kind of subscription you already bought at the same price. To avoid automatic renewal, you must cancel the subscription at least 24 hours before it expires.
-You can manage or cancel your auto-renewable subscription by entering the user settings in iTunes after the purchase. It's not possible to abort the subscription during the time it's active.
-Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase the premium subscription.

-Terms of Use: http://sleepmonitor.emobistudio.com/doc/termsofuse.html
-Privacy Policy: https://www.emobistudio.com/SleepMonitor/PrivacyPolicy.html
-Feedback: sleepmonitordev2@gmail.com
releaseNotes:
Dear user,

We are pleased to inform you that the latest version of our application software is now available! To provide a better user experience and functionality, we have made the following updates:

Performance optimization: We have optimized the performance of the application to improve its responsiveness and stability. 

Bug fixes: We have fixed some known issues and bugs to ensure that you can use our application smoothly.

- Explore new ideas

Explore billions of ideas to turn your dreams into reality. On Pinterest, nothing is impossible:
Finding easy recipes for cozy weeknight dinners? Discovering the secret to the perfect winter glow? Exploring ways to make your home more homey? Creating a life you love?

It's Possible.

title: Telegram Messenger
description:
Pure instant messaging — simple, fast, secure, and synced across all your devices. One of the world's top 10 most downloaded apps with over 800 million active users.

FAST: Telegram is the fastest messaging app on the market, connecting people via a unique, distributed network of data centers around the globe.

SYNCED: You can access your messages from all your phones, tablets and computers at once. Telegram apps are standalone, so you don’t need to keep your phone connected. Start typing on one device and finish the message from another. Never lose your data again.

UNLIMITED: You can send media and files, without any limits on their type and size. Your entire chat history will require no disk space on your device, and will be securely stored in the Telegram cloud for as long as you need it. 

SECURE: We made it our mission to provide the best security combined with ease of use. Everything on Telegram, including chats, groups, media, etc. is encrypted using a combination of 256-bit symmetric AES encryption, 2048-bit RSA encryption, and Diffie–Hellman secure key exchange. 

100% FREE & OPEN: Telegram has a fully documented and free API for developers, open source apps and verifiable builds to prove the app you download is built from the exact same source code that is published. 

POWERFUL: You can create group chats with up to 200,000 members, share large videos, documents of any type (.DOCX, .MP3, .ZIP, etc.) up to 2 GB each, and even set up bots for specific tasks. Telegram is the perfect tool for hosting online communities and coordinating teamwork.

RELIABLE: Built to deliver your messages using as little data as possible, Telegram is the most reliable messaging system ever made. It works even on the weakest mobile connections. 

FUN: Telegram has powerful photo and video editing tools, animated stickers and emoji, fully customizable themes to change the appearance of your app, and an open sticker/GIF platform to cater to all your expressive needs.

SIMPLE: While providing an unprecedented array of features, we take great care to keep the interface clean. Telegram is so simple you already know how to use it.

PRIVATE: We take your privacy seriously and will never give any third parties access to your data. You can delete any message you ever sent or received for both sides, at any time and without a trace. Telegram will never use your data to show you ads.

For those interested in maximum privacy, Telegram offers Secret Chats. Secret Chat messages can be programmed to self-destruct automatically from both participating devices. This way you can send all types of disappearing content — messages, photos, videos, and even files. Secret Chats use End-to-End Encryption to ensure that a message can only be read by its intended recipient.

We keep expanding the boundaries of what you can do with a messaging app. Don’t wait years for older messengers to catch up with Telegram — join the revolution today.

title: Netflix
description:
Looking for the most talked about TV programmes and films from the around the world? They’re all on Netflix.

We’ve got award-winning series, films, documentaries and stand-up specials. And with the mobile app, you get Netflix while you travel, commute or just take a break.

What you’ll love about Netflix:
• We add TV programmes and films all the time. Browse new titles or search for your favourites, and stream videos straight to your device.
• The more you watch, the better Netflix gets at recommending TV programmes and films you’ll love.
• Enjoy a safe watching experience just for children with family-friendly entertainment.
• Preview quick videos of our series and films and get notifications for new episodes and releases.

Netflix membership is a month-to-month subscription that begins at sign-up. You can easily cancel at any time, online, 24 hours a day. There are no long-term contracts or cancellation fees. We just want you to love what you watch.

Please note that the App Privacy information applies to information collected through the Netflix iOS, iPadOS and tvOS apps. See the Netflix Privacy Statement (link below) to learn more about information we collect in other contexts, including account registration.

Privacy policy: www.netflix.com/privacy
Terms of use: www.netflix.com/terms
releaseNotes:
Get the best experience for enjoying recent hits and timeless classics with our latest Netflix update for your iPhone and iPad.

We want to help you find your next favourite programme. This update’s playback improvements will help make it look even better, too.
reviews:
I thought i loved Netflix but It’s a terrible service. Imagine watching a show with 3 seasons with only 2 available. Or a movie trilogy where the first is missing. Or the fact that there are some titles where they just show the last movie. I wouldn’t recommend this for anyone who loves movies and shows. I love watching everything but if its 1 thing i cant stand is watching a show with missing episodes or missing movies in a series. | I get it, some peeps share their Netflix password and Netflix has ‘ideas’ how to cut that. But those ideas SCREW UP THE EXPERIENCE for the ‘good actors’, peeps who have multiple devices in the same household. …. It throws you out of your account and you have to periodically tell Netflix that it’s still you - the one who’s been paying their salaries through membership for many years. wow - what a screwup. 

Deleting that app, canceling my subscription - don’t have time for Netflix’s anti-password share greed activities. 

Bye. Hello Disney, Amazon and Apple TV.

(Should be 1-star, but content is good, so 2-stars). | These is dose not have anything to do with the app but netflix i need all the inuyasha season's | Netflix is good but you can’t used it in other locations and they added adds now. It is like they only care about the money | So I tried to watch Netflix on my phone and for some reason I couldn’t get into my account. It said I had to put in the password so I did and it did not work. | It’s probs the best app for movies and shows etc. :DDDD | netflix is scamming at this point. high prices, low quality content, household policy. just switch | Hello, 

Just letting your company know what is happening with some accounts with the new Household and WiFi network restrictions. I saw that I couldn’t access my account anymore on my WiFi at my new apartment, so I was disappointed. I know my dad uses it at his house, but I also don’t want to pay more a month to watch the content. Luckily I have AppleTV, Prime video and Hulu to choose from after that! Bummer that I can’t watch Netflix anymore but at least I have those! Just went right to Amazon Prime after that. | Netflix can u PLEASE PUT SEASON1 AND 2 BACK UP LIKE PLEASE THATS MY FAV SHOW AND UR MAKING MY LIFE MISERABLE | With as much money as we’re spending on this app you would think we would be getting our moneys worth instead the app logs me out and says my device is not apart of the Netflix household even though the app has been downloaded on my tablet for years. And yes it’s been updated, yes the password and username are correct, yes the bill has been paid, and no it’s not my device. Fix it. | Netflix works great, problem is the dominos game was working now states “an error has occurred please try again later sorry for the inconvenience” 

Please fix the problem. 

Thank you. | It’s good but can you please add be the cartoon grinch,coraline, and all of the monster high tv shows/short movies | This app and company have been going downhill for a long time, but I've hit my breaking point. The app layout CONSTANTLY changes. None of these changes are ever necessary, and they make the app worse and harder to use. Not to mention that Netflix as a company keeps making worse and worse shows and movies, and cancel the rare good ones that they manage to squeeze out. But I kept it, because my family still used it on occasion. Today I opened the app for the once-in-a-blue-moon that I ever open Netflix, only for the app to tell me I'm "not a part" of MY OWN HOUSEHOLD. The only reason that had been left to use Netflix is that multiple people can share an account, but with the sheer audacity of them to charge an arm and a leg for ONE account, banning password sharing WITHIN A HOUSEHOLD is the last straw. I'd give negative stars if I could for this unusable app and scummy company. Your money is better spent elsewhere. | What is the point of even having the app is I can’t watch anywhere other than home? Netflix has gone down the drain in recent years and I will be cancelling my membership. It’s no longer worth spending money on and I will be moving to a different streaming platform. | Signed out of ALL devices from the website. Logged into 2 devices I use . The 3rd (my iPhone) gives the error message the device is not part of house hold , but only have 2/4 devices signed in per the website . HHHHHHOOOOOOOWWWWWWW!?!?!?! And yes I uninstalled and reinstalled the app. Same message!!!! | no me aparece nana😔 | These ads are straight unreal and ridiculous. For YEARS there has been no ads and now you guys put ads? Take them off before you lose more money. | La pollo | Can’t log in “password is wrong” (same password 8 years now works on the tv)
Can’t reset password “error email not found “ (same email address as always triple checked tried on several different days) | Won’t allow me to watch in my own home, it should be illegal. Cancelling all subscriptions with them, never use Netflix they’re bloody thieves | The new update is ok but I can’t find anything now and half of the stuff from continue watching is gone. Also, basically all of the anime I have been watching the past few years is gone and know I am basically left with none of my old shows.😭😭😭💀☠️ | the new household is stupid, canˋt watch anything if im not on my house is annoying and stupid. | I’ve always watched Netflix on my phone rather then my tv or computer, so as of recently I now have to get a temporary code to be able to use the service I pay for on my phone. So basically if you ever plan on not watching it on your tv you better be ready to have to go through a couple apps before you can have access to your account. Ended up cancelling cause they release a good show maybe once every 2 years anyways. A shame they raise pricing more and more then cut access to phone users | Netflix has become a greedy corporation and it seems to be worse than others. They kicked me off my family’s account because I’m not on the same network anymore as them. Sorry that I was military, got stationed away from home, and my father wanted to keep my expenses to a minimum. Y’all are absolutely ridiculous and not worth the hassle. | Greedy parasites just can’t seem to let go of their obsession with squeezing every last ounce of money they can from their consumers. I’m glad I canceled my membership because their catalog isn’t even worth the basic price | Unsubscribed | No real improvements to any of this.

The Netflix App is pretty much one of the worst in the market these days. It fails miserably on simple tasks, like it routinely shows you visually that it remembers where you left off (red bar is in about the right place, button text says resume), but when you try to resume, it simply starts at the beginning. This happens about 15% of the time when you stop and resume on the same device, and almost half the time when you are changing devices. The UI is also a disaster and just getting worse all the time. Your “My List” will randomly disappear or relocate itself, the team is proud of the dark ui changes they make, which make the product harder to use but artificially inflate their use/engagement numbers, and various menu items like notifications or whole content sections will randomly disappear and reappear or just bug out when you select anything. The app will only go into PiP mode about 80% of the time, and always pauses. The app also pauses on tablets when you slide anything over. Like, WHY?! The subscription has become much more expensive, and content quality is getting worse every day. The company seems to think their UI and processes are good, but really they’re not, they just had a great idea and implemented it before everyone else, so they were the only way and many people grew up with and got used to it, but it never made it good. Their foreign content (non-US) is still very good, but also seems to be on the decline, and their streaming quality is still very good. Their US content, however, only has a few good properties left and tend to be one-offs or seasons from much earlier that are wrapping up. They like to say they have the best products, properties, culture, etc, but they really don’t. I use the iOS products the most, but their android apps are no better, and I use the web and smart tv app on occasion and they are definitely worse. The frustration of using this app is no longer worth the price with so many other, better, cheaper options available. | I pay great money for the services and i can’t even use it on all platforms. they underpay actors and actresses for the streaming services, but then they overpay us, so where is the money going? Dont buy; just pirate shows. | I’m a college student under a Netflix my parents pay for, the household rule is ridiculous. They already have a limit to how many people can be on an account, is it really necessary to block people based on where they live? It’s such a blatant money grab, it’s honestly embarrassing for Netflix. Raising the price while making it harder to use is just going to send the (already dying) service into the toilet. | The new update to Netflix households is so inconsiderate to families with college students. I spend half of my year at school and the other half at home, but now I can’t access netflix at school. Terrible, truly do not care about their paying customers | 🤓🤓👍 | no total drama world tour?no no no😡 | Crazy how it keeps getting more expensive, with less content. Now they’re even blocking some movies behind a pay wall so their ‘standard’ isn’t good enough to be able to watch your favorite movie | PLEASE get rid of Netflix households. If anything it’s probably hurting you guys more then helping. It’s just annoying and Ik ur trying to stop hackers and get more money but some people can’t pay for subscriptions that’s why they share. Don’t get me wrong, Netflix has an amazing selection of shows but this is ridiculous. | I can stream on my browser on my IPad! So, is this a massive app update failure, or another way to try to squeeze more $ from people who are already paying top rate?
Either way, not a great look. | You don’t want me using your platform using my family’s account? Fine, I won’t use it at all. Remember blockbuster? You are next if you keep up this garbage. Keep pissing off your customers and see where it gets you. Greedy corporate goblins. | Add back ability to have multiple homes....this is absurd. If I spend a good part of my time on a seperate place's wifi, I should be able to watch Netflix there - especially at these prices. | I see why this policy was introduced but it’s actually ridiculous.

I’m a minor, i live with my mom and only see my dad on weekends, i use all of my dads streaming services including netflix; however i can’t use netflix while im with my mom which is the majority of the time. My mom doesn’t have netflix only my dad does. Since the policy i’ve only been able to watch netflix at his house, which is CRAZY. there was NOTHING wrong with how netflix functioned before the policy, but now it’s so irritating. This policy is greedy and unnecessary, so what if people were sharing their accounts with friends? ITS THEIR ACCOUNT THAT THEY THEMSELVES PAY FOR? I know other reasons is like people stealing accounts but instead of robbing people of being able to share their accounts netflix could enforce their security. | From fall to now, there have been Quite A Few titles that don’t have audio description on Netflix but they do elsewhere. Please fix.

To start out with. I am blind. I have Paramount plus, which has a heading that they update every month that is titled Enjoy Before They’re Gone. And then it has a lot of the movies that will be leaving that month or the next month underneath. And then Tubi TV also has a heading like that titled Leaving Soon. On Netflix, when you’re blind you have to go through the movies that you might want to watch every month to see if they will be taken off that month. I was wondering if you would create a similar heading, or put the leaving soon titles underneath the New and Hot tab. I don’t think it would be hard to do. This would be greatly appreciated. title: Kaufland: Supermarket Offers
description:
Discover the smartest way to shop!

Install the Kaufland app and you’ll always have your Kaufland Card in your pocket. Our clever shopping assistant can point you to the latest special offers, exclusive coupons and innovative ways to shop and pay, making your shopping experience as easy and efficient as it can be.

Here are all the benefits of the Kaufland app:

•	Giant selection of products from the Kaufland.de online marketplace
•	Access to exclusive coupons, partner benefits and prize draws
•	K-SCAN: Make your shop even quicker: Scan your own products
•	Kaufland Pay: Safe and simple! Just scan to pay!
•	Request digital receipts
•	Find nearby store locations
•	Browse through the current leaflets and offers
•	Make digital shopping lists
•	Discover mouthwatering recipes

Receive exclusive coupons for shopping in-store and on the online marketplace

Use your Kaufland app to regularly find exclusive new coupons which you can redeem on purchases in-store or on our online marketplace. The Kaufland.de online marketplace is integrated with the app. With more than 45 million products in 6,400 categories for you to browse, it’s a true shopping paradise. Just activate your chosen coupons in the app, then save big the next time you shop!

Reap the rewards of partner benefits and more with the Kaufland Card

The Kaufland Card gives you access to extra discounts not only on selected Kaufland items, but also on offers from Kaufland partners like Europcar or home24.  You can also take part in exciting prize draws every month, and you will receive loyalty points for every shop. Just scan at the checkout, collect points and redeem them for bonuses or exclusive coupons.

K-SCAN: Scan your shop yourself

Shop and pay faster: In selected stores, you can scan your items yourself before placing them in your cart. Then pay for your shop at the self-service checkout. No need to put your items on the belt!

Kaufland Pay: Scan to pay for your Kaufland shop

Forgot your wallet? No problem! Kaufland Pay is a payment system that lets you pay quickly, easily and safely with every shop. Just open the Kaufland app at the checkout, hold the Kaufland Pay QR code under the card reader, and you’re done! 

Keep an eye on your spending with digital receipts

Bye-bye, receipt overflow: Every time you scan your Kaufland Card at the checkout, your digital receipt will be saved in your Kaufland app, available for you to view on your smartphone at any time. Keep a close eye on your spending even when a receipt goes missing!

Find your nearest Kaufland store

With the navigation, you can find your nearest supermarket in seconds. Looking for a location with a fish counter or free e-car charging? The handy filter function will show you exactly which Kaufland store you need.

Browse current leaflets and use our offers

Browse through the most recent leaflets, be inspired and find the best in-store offers for your favorite products. Filter by category and add items to your shopping list with just one tap.

Create your digital shopping list and find your new favorite recipes 

Put everything you need from our recipes, categories or offers straight onto your shopping list and share it with family or friends. Our recipe database has more than 3,500 recipes for you.

Do you want to find out more or give us feedback? We love hearing from you – with your help, we can make your shopping experience even better. Just write to us at: feedback-kapp@kaufland.com
 
Find more from Kaufland at: www.kaufland.de
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/kaufland/?ref=ts&fref=ts
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/kauflandde
 
General terms & conditions: https://filiale.kaufland.de/nutzungsbedingungen-app.html
releaseNotes: In the updated version of our Kaufland app we have made minor bug fixes and improvements for you.
reviews: Failed to fetch reviews

title: Booking.com Travel Deals
description:
Download the highest-rated travel app and join thousands of people finding hotel, motel and holiday home travel deals. Find a stay for your holiday, weekend getaway or business trip, anywhere in the world!

Search for hotels, motels & holiday homes

• 27 million hotels, holiday rentals, homes, apartments and other unique places to stay
• Search by city, attraction, landmark or hotel name with just one tap
• Filter by price, review score, amenities and other things important to you
• Find your last-minute stay or book far in advance

Find a great travel deal

• Daily deals for every budget
• Free cancellation on most rooms
• Browse over 135 million verified guest reviews

Manage your booking on the go

• Get paperless confirmation
• Make changes whenever, wherever
• 24/7 customer service in more than 40 languages
• Contact your host, view check-in times and write reviews
• No booking or credit card fees
releaseNotes: Thanks for using Booking.com! This update contains several bug fixes and performance improvements, so you can enjoy the latest and greatest version of our app.
reviews:

title: Moje VZP
description:
Moje VZP je mobilní aplikací, která vám umožní kontrolovat vaše platby pojištění, historii plátců nebo přehled vykázané péče pohodlně z jednoho místa. Je určena pro všechny pojištěnce VZP, kteří s námi chtějí komunikovat elektronicky a nebaví je chodit na pobočku. Zaregistrovat můžete klidně celou svoji rodinu a z jednoho účtu kontrolovat údaje všech jejích členů.

Využívat služeb Moje VZP můžete:

Sami za sebe.
Za své děti.  
Jako opatrovník.

Jako zmocněnec například manžela, prarodičů, rodičů nebo kohokoli jiného, kdo vám k tomu dá úředně ověřenou plnou moc.

Co v aplikaci najdete? 

Přehled plátců zdravotního pojištění. Zkontrolujte si, kdo za vás platí pojistné na zdravotní pojištění. A kdo ho za vás platil v průběhu posledních 5 let.

Stav plateb zdravotního pojištění

Pokud sami za sebe platíte nebo jste někdy platili pojistné na zdravotní pojištění (jako OSVČ nebo OBZP), zkontrolujte si, jestli nemáte nějaké nedoplatky či nesrovnalosti v platbách.

Přehled o příjmech a výdajích OSVČ

Osobám samostatně výdělečně činným umožňujeme prostřednictví bonusové aplikace VZP Point podat přehled o příjmech a výdajích OSVČ bez nutnosti návštěvy naší pobočky či jeho zasílání poštou.

Přehled úhrad zdravotní péče

Zjistěte si, jakou zdravotní péči jste dle výkazů zdravotnických zařízení čerpali, a kolik tato péče stála. Můžete také upozornit na případné nesrovnalosti.

Poplatky a doplatky

Zkontrolujte si výši vašich započitatelných doplatků za léčivé přípravky a potraviny pro zvláštní lékařské účely s ohledem na zákonem stanovený ochranný limit, po jehož dovršení vám další doplatky budou v zákonné lhůtě vráceny.

Přístup k datům našich pojištěnců je možné zřídit pouze za předpokladu, že u nás mají aktivní pojištění (není ukončeno na základě pojištění v EU nebo dlouhodobého pobytu). Pro zřízení zástupu nemusíte být naším pojištěncem, ale budeme rádi, když se jím stanete.
releaseNotes: Oprava chyb a stability aplikace.

title: Waze Navigation & Live Traffic
description:
Waze is a community driven navigation app that helps millions of users get to where they’re going through real-time road alerts and an up-to-the-moment map. Thanks to our network of drivers, Waze saves you time by instantly alerting you to traffic, roadworks, crashes, police and more. From traffic-avoiding reroutes, real-time safety updates and low petrol price alerts, Waze is a community of drivers helping other drivers.


With Waze you…


• Get there faster: traffic-avoiding route updates
• Avoid tickets: know where police, speed cameras and red light cameras are located
• More accurate ETAs: based on live traffic, roadworks, weather and more
• Community-based navigation: real-time updates from other drivers
• Save money: find the cheapest fuel along your route
• Avoid tolls: see toll pricing when you choose a route
• Use Apple CarPlay: sync Waze to your car’s built-in display
• Live Speedometer: get alerts when you’re speeding and avoid costly tickets
• Customize your drive: get directions from your favourite celebs and characters
• No app switching: use your favorite audio apps right from Waze


Drive safer and smarter, with Waze!


You can manage your in-app Waze Privacy Settings at any time. Learn more about the Waze privacy policy here, www.waze.com/legal/privacy.


Waze directions are not intended for emergency or oversized vehicles.
releaseNotes:
Saving time & avoiding traffic is even easier with this update:

Fixed bugs to ensure you can update fuel prices in Waze successfully.

title: HC Sparta+
description: Užijte si spoustu výhod s mobilní aplikací hokejové Sparty! Pouze s ní získáte exkluzivní možnosti rychlého nákupu vstupenek. Neustále budete mít na dosah svou permanentku, kterou můžete zapůjčit svým přátelům. Díky notifikacím se k vám dostanou informace z vašeho milovaného klubu mezi prvními. Buďte ještě blíž ke Spartě díky unikátním pohledům do srdce nejtradičnější hokejové značky v Česku.
releaseNotes: Opravy chyb v aplikaci

title: Packeta
description:
Try Between us service! The easiest way how to send a parcel to another person in Czech, Slovak, Hungary and Romania. You can use our pick-up points or home delivery service. 
It's fast, without queues and long waits. No more paperwork, long forms or printing labels. All of that from 2,5 €.


What's in the app?

Send a shipment - Between us
No more paperwork, forms or printing labels. With our mobile application, in which you can find the Between us service, you can send a shipment in a moment. All you need is a phone and an online payment. You can pay online with card or via Apple Pay.

Returning the shipment
Do you need to return a shipment to the e-shop? No problem. The application enables a simple return of the shipment, you only need to enter the code that you received from the e-shop. You don't need to fill in anything else.

Tracking
Thanks to the detailed tracking of the shipment and the connection with our system, you will know exactly where the shipment is located.

Push Notifications
Be informed. The app will notify you immediately when the shipment is ready for pickup.

Delivery points
Thanks to the interactive map, you can search for the nearest delivery points in the area. At the same time, the built-in filter allows you to select those places where you can pay by card, for example. You will then find a description of how to get there, including photos or opening hours, in the details of the delivery point.

Shipment archive
In the shipment archive, you can view all your shipments that have ever been paired with your account.
releaseNotes: - Minor fixes and improvements.

title: Alza
description:
The end of the desperate searches on the Internet. You can get almost anything on Alza. Everything conveniently in one place, right in your pocket.

- Wide range of thousands of unique items (50 000+)
- Reviews, quality descriptions, photos and customer reviews
- Goods grouped by brands and parameters
- Order history and status tracking
- One-touch quick purchase
- Special offers and price deals
- Fast and convenient product search including search history
- Shopping lists for repeated purchases
- Convenient controls on iPhone and iPad
releaseNotes: This release includes bug fixes and minor enhancements based upon your suggestions and comments.
reviews:
Great | My only complaint is the app makes it too easy to part ways with my money. | I am enjoying Alza very much. If it would be possible to message me in English rather than Czech, I would appreciate it. I am an American living as a full-time resident in the Czech Republic. Thank you.
Henry Williams | Easy to buy. Hard to return. They stifle all reviews on web site and not on google reviews. If you may need to return abs item better to go to local retailer. | Always quality always on time | This app is great when ordering from ALZA! Skip the lines and pay boxes. It’s very convenient to order something and hit the button so when you arrive at a showroom your order is waiting for you. ALZA has great customer service and I’m happy to be able to shop and handle everything from my phone! | Páči sa mi to ! | Pravé jsem babičce oobrdnal ze spojených státu. Alza mi dokonce dokáže zatextovat na můj mobil. Babička samozřejmě žije v ČR.  Díky! Bude se hodit i v okolo Vánoc! 👍🏼 | The title says it all! | I do not like the fact Alza is forcing me to upgrade the App. Right now is not a good moment, it could wait for few days. Hey, Alza you need to version your backend APIs. | Jako servis výborný ale chtělo bychom levnější zboží | Je videt snaha, aplikace se postupne vylepsuje... Ale nektere veci stale funguji na webu vyrazne lepe. V posledni verzi treba nejde vybrat doprava alza express... | Some recent improvements to the returns department helpful and
this ordering application works somewhat well however...

Alza the company provides no competent human service for faulty products, refunds, or returns.

The problem then becomes solely the customers responsibility.

They do not use or respond to telephones, nor have any inter-office communications. It then becomes a "Kafka-esque" rabbit hole of burecratic denial and web based complaint forms.

No formal EU level customer support training for staff yet.

While the purchasing process has been simplified, customer support is then passed along to the manufacturer, and this retailer will not be concerned with solving or processing your concerns.

A narrow profit margin requires a narrow business plan to encourage return customers.

Will not be returning to use this application or support this company.

Keep trying Alza. Improvements  do not qualify success.

Customer satisfaction should be your ONLY objective.

Thank You. | Aplikace je fajn, clovek rychle najde co potrebuje - chce-li to ale koupit, napojeni na bankovni sluzby je pomalejsi, pada a meli by na tom jeste zapracovat.. | opravdu mohu doporučit. | Ale dobrá ;-) | Error sometime | Co řict? title: Stocard - Loyalty Cards Wallet
description:
Turn your phone into your wallet and elevate your shopping experience with Stocard. Join more than 70 million Stocard users and experience the smarter way to shop.

ADD ALL YOUR FAVOURITE LOYALTY CARDS
You can add the loyalty cards of your go-to retailers such as Tesco, Morrisons and Superdrug within seconds. Custom cards make it possible to also add the card from the small flower shop from around the corner. Organizing your cards has never been this easy!

COLLECT REWARDS POINTS
Whenever you are shopping, easily open your loyalty card's barcode on your phone and have it scanned by the cashier to receive your points. When you turn on our Card Assistant, we can make sure the right card is just one tap away when you enter a store.

DISCOVER EXCLUSIVE OFFERS
Browse curated coupons, discounts, flyers and catalogues in Stocard – all related to your favourite stores such as Marks & Spencer, Co-op and Waitrose & Partners. Get inspired for your next shopping trip!

MORE FEATURES
You can even save boarding passes, cinema tickets and gift cards in Stocard. Save time and store everything in one app.

Do you have any questions or suggestions? Our customer support team is just an email away - simply write to support.stocard.uk@klarna.com
releaseNotes: Great news! We're excited to unveil the newest version of Stocard. Explore the newly introduced sleek, modern redesign to elevate the look and feel of various screens within the app. Enjoy exploring the new update!
reviews:
App turns brightness down to ZERO after use and it takes CONSIDERABLE time to be able to open my phone after this occurs. It's been like this for YEARS. How is this still a thing?!?! | App does not allow you to store your cards in Apple Wallet. | Need an update to work for Iphone 15 models! | Would not open. Got a “preparing” message followed by “try again later.” Didn’t work later either | I’ve been looking for an app that keeps everything in one place like this one. I’ve downloaded and tested out a few others from competitors and I was impressed by how user-friendly it is. I also enjoyed the features like the Card Assistant option. 

I would love to see an option in the future to have the ability to organize by categories (dining, gym, frequent flyer, etc). I also would enjoy having the ability to add all my gift cards. I really am looking for an all-in-one app for my entire wallet.

It still gets 5 stars because it delivers as promoted and already surpasses Apple Wallet. | In my opinion, this app works well for me. I don’t have to carry cards in my wallet and I can access them from my phone. My only complaint would be that after the last update, the widget shows very small stores logos. If you open the app, the “recently used” section show larger logos and it was the way they were on the widget before the last update. Hopefully it will be addressed soon. Very difficult to see them. | Panda Express has just started it's loyalty system and when I added into the Stocard app, it has not shown up so I had to make a generic card and the color looks tacky. Please fix it. 

And also, because it's on Apple Wallet, please change the logo on the Wallet app. | Totally SUCKS😡😡😡👎👎👎 | This app is easy.  I have all my shopping cards stored pull them up and at the grocery store they scan it or BJs.  Etc. | Used this for a few years and was pretty happy until latest updates. Since a recent update, the app hangs on start and doesn’t show my cards when I have poor mobile reception. My local grocery store is such a place, so I annoyingly have to disable mobile data just to get to my card. Unclear what is so important to retrieve from the network when all my cards are already stored locally. | I don’t understand why the widget in iOS 17 is so small. The widget in the pro version of the store card before it was updated was fairly good-sized and easy to see. Macy Minor, but I use my widget a lot, and now it’s just really hard to use. | New version just displays a black screen for several minutes. | From day 1, Stocard has proved invaluable. No longer need to worry about forgetting a card, fumbling for and through wallet to find the relevant card. With Stocard, all of my scores of loyalty cards are available easily and instantly. Where before the act of pulling out and scanning my loyalty card sometimes meant I didn’t use the card as intended, with Stocard, it makes scanning my loyalty cards so fast and simple am able to use them every time. The app is very easy to use. Highly recommend as an essential app. | Version 10.25.0 when you first open the app it’s blank you have to close it and reopen it same thing with the widget. Hope that can be fixed soon. | Easy to use and don’t have to worry about not having a card or fumbling around trying to find the right one. | Great app to store cards in one place! Recommended by the YMCA, glad I got Stocard. | 1/2024 It seems you now require location ALWAYS on to use the assistant and took away the feature to search for cards.
