The app is not useful as is and is too intrusive to privacy. | Deleting a card makes me nervous because you’ll lose all the information of the card. Sometimes you may need to track back your transactions or double check if there’s still balance on it. | Each update is slower, bigger, more ugly, and more cluttered. Tons of added, useless features that no one asked to have, in updates for the past three years. Bring back the original Stocard app! 

The pink icon is disgusting and I will never update until it’s restored to red. Also, they don’t answer customer service emails for a while. | Зачем надо было удалять из Русского App store???? Но прога норм пользуюсь с 2020 | This app is perfect. You can make your wallet all digital because you add any card to this app. You can use your cards on your Apple Watch too. | So easy to have all my membership cards all in one place and not have a stack of them in my wallet. | This app is very user friendly. It gets the job done in the accurate amount of time and I never have to searching for the cards! | Спасибо за приложение. Это лучшее приложение среди всех конкурентов!

Example: Food King, I don’t have a good king within a 100 miles of me. They send me ads for women’s makeup. I don’t use makeup! | Costco will not accept scanning the card on this app. | Good app 
Definitely accurate and very helpful 
!!! | Got rid of the bulk - thanks!

Sounds dumb but this app does its part in helping keep her memory alive; I think about her every time I use it. | Not all apps scan tho other than that a great idea | This is a great option for all of my store cards that are not recognized by Apple Wallet. | Sto card is a great way to keep your name tags and cards and I love how you can scan and I can even add my school id | Very disappointed that Stocard doesn’t seem to work on the watch. description:
Want to keep up to date with the Premier League matches? As with all other competitions after IV. the district championship class and youth outcomes? title: Calorie-counter by Dine4Fit
description:
Would you like to become fit responsibly? FREE application Dine4Fit will help you. The application is based on the most extensive database of nutrition values of food in the Czech Republic.

The app provides the following:
- list all daily food and activities
- recommended amount of energy intake while losing weight
- information about daily energy balance
- following daily water intake
- body mass graph
- daily fulfillment of energy balance graph
- support for barcodes for food
- access your data from your PC on www.kaloricketabulky.cz
- Health app connection

Based on user preference, the app works with energy values in kJ or kcal.

For more information about Premium, see our Terms of Service (https://www.kaloricketabulky.cz/terms-and-conditions) and Privacy Policy (https://www.kaloricketabulky.cz/privacy-policy).

title: Sazka Klub
description:
Váš pomocník pro sázení na prodejních místech.

Roztočte Kolo Štěstí ve svém mobilu a získávejte odměny každý den! S aplikací Sazka Klub máte výhry v kapse.

Co v aplikaci najdete?
•	Kolo štěstí za sázku, los nebo naskenovanou sázenku
•	Ověření výhry kdykoliv a kdekoliv
•	Virtuální Sazka karta přímo v aplikaci
•	Příprava sázenky pro sázku na prodejně
•	Přehled všech loterií na jednom místě
•	Jednoduché přihlášení – stačí pouze telefonní číslo
releaseNotes:

title: Google Photos: Backup & Edit
description:
Google Photos is a smarter home for all your photos and videos, made for the way you take photos today.

“The best photo product on Earth” – The Verge
“Google Photos is your new essential picture app” – Wired
“Upload the pictures, and let Google Photos do the rest” – The New York Times

• 15 GB OF CLOUD STORAGE: Every Google Account comes with 15 GB of storage and you can choose to automatically back up all your photos and videos in Storage saver quality or Original quality. Your photos are safe, secure, and private to you. All photos and videos you backed up in Storage saver quality before June 1, 2021 do not count toward your Google Account storage. *Storage is shared between Gmail, Google Drive, and Google Photos.

• FREE UP SPACE: Never worry about running out of space on your phone again. Photos that are safely backed up can be removed from your device’s storage in just a tap.

• NO ADS: Google Photos doesn't sell your photos, videos, or personal information to anyone and we don't use your photos and videos for advertising.

• FAST AND POWERFUL SEARCH: Your photos are now searchable by the people, places and things in them—no tagging required.

• GOOGLE LENS: Search what you see. This preview enables you to identify text and objects in your photos to learn more and take action.

• SMARTER SHARING: With smart sharing suggestions, giving your friends the photos you took of them is painless. And they can add their photos, too, so you’ll finally get the photos you’re actually in.

• ADVANCED EDITING: Transform photos with a tap. Use intuitive and powerful photo and video editing tools to apply content-aware filters, adjust lighting, and more.

• MOVIES AND GIFS, MADE FOR YOU: Get automatically created movies, collages, GIFs, and more from your photos. Or easily create them yourself.

• LIVE ALBUMS: Share your latest photos with Live Albums. Select the people and pets you want to see and Google Photos will automatically add photos of them as you take them, no manual updates needed.

• SHARED LIBRARIES: Share without sharing. Grant a trusted person access to all of your photos.

• REDISCOVER: Get collages of photos you took a year ago on this day – perfect for #tbt.

• ON YOUR TV: View your photos and videos on your TV with Chromecast and Airplay support.


You can also upgrade storage for your Google Account, used for Original Quality photos and videos, Google Drive and Gmail by subscribing to Google One, an expanded storage plan. Subscriptions start at $1.99/month for 100 GB in the US. Pricing and availability can vary by region.

Storage subscriptions purchased in-app will be charged to your iTunes Account, and automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to iTunes Account Settings after purchase.

Google Privacy Policy: https://google.com/intl/en_US/policies/privacy
Google One Terms of Service: https://one.google.com/terms-of-service

Note: Face grouping is not available in all countries.

For the latest updates from the team, follow us on Twitter at @googlephotos

Using GPS in the background can decrease battery life. Google Photos doesn't run GPS in the background unless you turn on optional features.
releaseNotes:
Thanks for using Google Photos. This release includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

We fixed user-reported issues and added new features to ensure that your photos are automatically organised and up to date.

title: Google Drive – online backup
description:
Google Drive is a safe place to back up and access all your files from any device. Easily invite others to view, edit, or leave comments on any of your files or folders.

With Drive, you can:

• Safely store and access your files anywhere
• Quickly access recent and important files
• Search for files by name and content
• Share and set permissions for files and folders
• View your content on the go while offline
• Receive notifications about important activity on your files

Learn more about Google Apps update policy: https://support.google.com/a/answer/6288871

Google accounts get 15GB of storage free, shared across Google Drive, Gmail, and Google Photos. For additional storage, you can upgrade to a premium subscription plan as an in-app purchase. Subscriptions start at $1.99/month for 100 GB in the US, and can vary by region.
 
Storage subscriptions purchased from the app will be charged to your iTunes Account, and automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to iTunes Account Settings after purchase.
 
Google Privacy Policy: https://www.google.com/intl/en_US/policies/privacy
Google Drive Terms of Service: https://www.google.com/drive/terms-of-service
releaseNotes: * Bug fixes and performance improvements

Then the app opens to a generic location and not the location where my hyperlink directed. Also, I can conveniently see the names of all the folders. Is that the date the folder was created or is that the date The latest file was placed in the folder? Whatever, it’s unnecessary at best and misleading at worst. | Always telling me video is still processing after several hours 😐 | Gran equipo de trabajo | Great way to save your files. | Me encanta la energía con la transmite su talento y sobretodo el conocimiento que tiene para ofrecer me encanta 🙌😁 | I don’t know if Google is doing it intentionally for Apple devices, but the app got so much slower and buggier recently. It takes about 30 SECONDS for the app to open a link (given it’s on high speed Wi-Fi network. Slower networks make it even longer).
Overall, using the website version is much quicker and easier at this point. A shame. | I’m trying to send a simple audio file to my phone and it won’t save just keeps reading error. Also if I press save on an audio file I text myself it does t do anything. | I like the app and now I will learn how to use it. Thanks | Floating buttons block the files 3 dots menu button. The “convenient” + and scan buttons are terribly inconvenient to me. They only work around I’ve found so far is to go through the steps of opening the document and then clicking on the menu button from inside the document.

Floating buttons usually block other elements of the UI. This is a design trend I really hope dies.

The + and scan buttons should really be part of the bottom bar if they are that important to have on display. | They literally let me accumulate photos in storage over 20 years and then one day started blocking me from accessing all of my photos and saved documents and put notices on my email account, my google photos, and my google drive saying that if I want my stuff back I have to pay to get it! That’s sooo messed up!! What a corrupt way to handle business! | Super easy to use! Easy to keep files together! | Google Drive is super easy to navigate! | No, I do not want to sign in to google account everywhere I go

Update: quit being evil | I do | There’s nothing that’s “blowing my mind” about Good Drive, but that’s what I love about it. 
I use multiple operating systems across many different devices in my line of work, and Drive is a consistent place to store and pull information as needed wherever I’m at or trying to do. 
Virtual organization is such a hassle for a lot of people, myself included. So I know how easily things can seem overwhelming and incredibly stressful having many types of Documents, Resumes, Presentations, Media, (and countless other things), coming in from work, as well as personal life. And this has been a great way for me to easily organize and access anything in the proper way, and most importantly I feel it’s secure, and you have many options on how you would like to share anything you may have. It’s worth getting, and also worth the extra effort in making the switch from a current app or system you use to Google Drive. It’s consistent, the prices are fair and reasonable, and any “surprise” I have come across has been positive. Am still discovering new and possible things I am able to do on here. Keep up the great work, it’s appreciated! | Drive is my go to file storage and sharing app on iOS devices and my Windows lap top. | Muy buena aplicación no da fallo | Doesn’t work well enough to be considered usable on IOS. Can’t select multiple files at once, most I the time newly uploaded files aren’t there for hours, downloads are slow. I’d only like to see a feature make music play in a friendlier format like adding repeat or make a playlist but it’s still a very good app. | I didn’t even know these are here !
I’m so glad they’re safe here
Sincerely, Monique | This app used to be great, now it barely ever loads the files, it stays in a perpetual spin. Before this it was 5 stars, now it's virtually unusable. Good luck finding support. | Great for my schooling | Tarda mucho en procesar videos cortos de 1 min ó menos de 100 MB, porqué ??? En Amazon Drive y otros es en minutos y aqui tarda varios días, la verdad no es una solución así, estaría bién arreglar eso | This used to be perfect. The best storage system by far. I don’t have time to fight an app that I need to just work

Linkage is certainly not clear! | Très bien | iPhone 15 pro max. Doesn’t load files. 12 year user on android with no major problems. title: Shazam: Find Music & Concerts
description:
What’s the name of that song? Shazam will identify music playing around you or in apps like TikTok, Instagram & YouTube. Discover live shows, song lyrics, videos & more. Over 2 billion installs and counting!

“Shazam is an app that feels like magic” - techradar.com
“Shazam is a gift... a game changer” - Pharrell Williams, GQ
“I don’t know how we ever survived before Shazam” - Marshmello

WHY YOU’LL LOVE IT
Find the name of any song. Even when you’re offline (the app will save it and find it when reconnected), using headphones or multi-tasking.
Identify music in an instant! Add Music Recognition to your Control Centre and enable the Lock Screen or Home Screen widget.
Discover live music events based on artist popularity, recommendations or search.

WHAT ELSE?
Listen and add to Apple Music playlists.
Follow along with time-synced lyrics.
Watch music videos in Apple Music or YouTube.
Find out what is popular in your country or city with Shazam charts.
Open any song directly in Apple Music, Spotify & Deezer.

THOUSANDS OF 5-STAR REVIEWS
“OMG... this app will blow your mind...you press the Shazam button and boom, you got the name of the song.”
“So helpful in finding good and new music you truly love.”
“I literally find my song in 1 second…”
“I love Shazam...It is helping me build a great playlist of songs I dont recognise right off hand.”
“This app is literally part of my daily routine…”
“This is the bestest app ever PEOPLE! If you want to know the name of a song or artist, this is the app you want.”
“Love the smooth integration to my Apple Music...”
“Love the lyrics section!!! The lyrics match the words of the song…”

Availability and features may vary by country.
For more information on Shazam’s privacy practices, please read the Privacy Policy, available at https://www.apple.com/legal/privacy/.

Find out more and get support from AppleCare at
https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT210331
releaseNotes:
Thanks for Shazaming! We’re always working hard to make the app faster and better than ever. Update to the most recent version to enjoy the latest and greatest Shazam. 

Don’t forget to keep your Shazams safe and in sync between your devices. Simply turn on iCloud sync in Shazam Settings. 

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback is music to our ears, and it helps us make Shazam even better. Got a question? Visit support.shazam.com.

title: Google Translate
description:
Translate between up to 133 languages. Feature support varies by language:
• Text: Translate between languages by typing
• Offline: Translate with no Internet connection
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera
• Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference

Permissions notice:
• Microphone for speech translation
• Camera for translating text via the camera
• Photos for importing photos from your library

Translations between the following languages are supported:
Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Assamese, Aymara, Azerbaijani, Bambara, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bhojpuri, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Cebuano, Chichewa, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Corsican, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dhivehi, Dogri, Dutch, English, Esperanto, Estonian, Ewe, Filipino, Finnish, French, Frisian, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Guarani, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hausa, Hawaiian, Hebrew, Hindi, Hmong, Hungarian, Icelandic, Igbo, Ilocano, Indonesian, Irish Gaelic, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Korean, Krio, Kurdish (Kurmanji), Kurdish (Sorani), Kyrgyz, Lao, Latin, Latvian, Lingala, Lithuanian, Luganda, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Maithili, Malagasy, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Meiteilon (Manipuri), Mizo, Mongolian, Myanmar (Burmese), Nepali, Norwegian, Odia (Oriya), Oromo, Pashto, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Quechua, Romanian, Russian, Samoan, Sanskrit, Scots Gaelic, Sepedi, Serbian, Sesotho, Shona, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Somali, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Thai, Tigrinya, Tsonga, Turkish, Turkmen, Twi, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Xhosa, Yiddish, Yoruba, Zulu

title: Jízdní řády IDOS
description:
Oblíbený bezplatný nástroj pro vyhledávání spojení v novém! Nový design a uživatelské prostředí, vyšší stabilita a rychlost, aktuální data všech dostupných jízdních řádů pro vlaky, autobusy a MHD. 

Aplikace je podporována na iOS 8 a vyšším. Dotazy a problémy prosím pište na appdev@idnes.cz. Děkujeme.

Hlavní funkce:
	• Vyhledání vlakových, autobusových a MHD spojů včetně zadání zastávky z mapy
	• Online vyhledávání = vždy aktuální a oficiální informace včetně zpoždění a výluk
	• Offline možnost si prohlížet historii vyhledaných spojení
	• Inteligentní našeptávač zastávek a adres s návrhem oblíbených spojů
	• Automatická detekce MHD jízdního řádu a nejbližší zastávky dle GPS
	• Výběr dopravních prostředků v Rozšířeném nastavení a nastavení zobrazených možností v Nastavení
	• SMS jízdenky
	• Široké možnosti sdílení spojení
	• Zobrazení odjezdů/příjezdů z vybrané zastávky s možností filtrovat na konkrétní spoj
	• Uložení 6 spojení do oblíbených, 6 posledních hledání v historii s offline přístupem k výsledkům hledání
	• Vyhledávání bezbariérových spojení, spojení pro cyklisty nebo pro cestující s dětmi
	• Podrobné informace o spoji včetně nástupiště, koleje, čísle zastávky, zpoždění, aktuální pozice spoje na mapě, výlukách, orientační ceně jízdného a řazení vlakových vozů s popisem
	• Zobrazení trasy a polohy spoje na mapě
	• Kontextové propojení do prodejních systémů třetích stran pro rezervaci/zakoupení jízdného
	• Zobrazení legendy k použitým piktogramům
	• Nápověda - průvodce aplikací
	• Možnost odstranění reklam na vždy za poplatek (naleznete v nastavení pod ikonou Více)
	
Možnosti vyhledávání
	• Postupné zadávání názvu a zužování výběru z našeptávače
	• Zadání začátku názvu
	• Zadání začátků slov - např. "P H" = Praha Hradčanská
	• Zadání textu obsaženého v názvu - např.  "UAN" = Ostrava UAN, Brno UAN, Praha UAN
	• Možnost zadat jako cíl adresu nebo název objektu - např. "Praha, Divadlo v Dlouhé" nebo "Praha, Ve Smečkách" = najde nejbližší zastávku k tomuto bodu a spojení z výchozí polohy hledání
	• Možnost zadat "!" Před název zastávky nebo cíle a omezí se našeptávač na první nalezenou položku např. "!Ben" = Benešov
releaseNotes:
Updates in the 2.13.2 version

added less important features and utilities,
improved stability and bug fixes.
reviews:
This application is user friendly. I jus love that it gives you options for bus stops, tram stops, subways stations, etc. with the name or address you input. When ever there is a delay, the application lets you know. The only thing that I find problematic is that occasionally there are some routes or runnings that have been cancelled (for whatever reason- bus driver sick day, or heavy traffic, or an accident on the road,etc) and this application doesn’t let you know of these extraordinary situations. | No contact phone number 
No way to cancel the ticket 
No explanation 

WILL NEVER BUY TICKETS THROUGH THE APP EVER AGAIN!! What a rip off! | Stellar connection finder for CZ. A way better than google maps or whatever other maps apps that have the feature to look up connections on the market! | I use this app before so I knew that it used to have more functionality, namely that I can even find Polish railways/ trains to Poland, but I don’t know why I can’t search them now, and even the stops have been taken away from the app, can you explain why you developers had made this decision? hope this was just a temporary thing | Na rozdí od konkurence nereflektuje skutečný stav. U vlaků, které například z “provozních důvodů” nejedou, stále píše “bez zpoždění”. Údaje tedy nelze bohužel brát vážně. | IDOS je naprosto skvela sluzba, pouzivam ji kazdy den. | Aplikace je skvělá, má ale jeden zbytečný problém, který ji dělá na některých trasách prakticky nepoužitelnou. Jde o čas na přesun. Ten je pevně daný a připočítává se k času na přestup. Např. mezi trasami metra je přesun 3 minuty, přitom se dá pohodlně stihnout za dvě. Nebo na Nádr. Holešovice je přesun na tramvaj podle aplikace 2 minuty, přitom jedna bohatě stačí.

Kvůli tomu aplikace nenajde spoje, které se dají stihnout.

Navrhuji všechny časy na přesun zkrátit na polovinu. Kdo by to nestíhal, může si nastavit čas na přestup, který je vy výchozím nastavení 2 minuty (já používám 0). | Great app, but would be much better if it worked offline as well! | It’s always worked well for me, been using it a few years now. English version is great, easy to switch back and forth if you want to learn some Czech, too! | They finally brought back English! Thank God!

Now, if they will just bring back the favorites for stations, that'd be great. | Pokud máte uložených víc jak celou stránku oblíbených míst, tak při při skrolování dolů se nedostanete k prvnímu uloženému místu, protože ho kryje spodní lišta a dostane se tak člověk pouze na jedno nad ním. Prosím o opravu chyby. | Po poslední aktualizaci aplikace přestala zcela fungovat na iOS6! | The best *functioning* app. My only complaint is that it hasn't been updated since Feb 2013. Once this app integrates the iOS 7 design standard - it will certainly deserve all 5 stars. | Paradni aplikace - rychla, kompletni, uzivatelsky prijemna. Pouzivam ji kazdy den. | Aplikace byla super do posledniho updatu, ktery z ni udelal nepouzitelnou.. Pri kazdem hledani cela spadne.. :( Nepomaha ani restart telefonu.. | Jizdni rady nejsou aktualni, na aplikaci neni spolehnuti. | Prosím o přidání přímé podpory iOS 6 map na vyhledávání spojů | Hl výhody zdarma, aktualizované přímo z idnes, ale idos má pokročilejší funkce, ale je to App za peníze. doporučuji oboje! | Parádní aplikace!!! Lepší jak verze pro pocitac :)

title: Loopsie: AI Photo Generator
description:
We update new effects or presets every week!

Loopsie lets you create stunning photo edits with stickers, special effects, filters and theme presets! Our animation allows you to create 3D Photos, D3D Camera like videos and much more. All-in-one app without any professional equipment. Just a bit of creativity and your photos will come to life with a stunning cinematic effect!

Our motion photo effects make your short videos unique and let your content stand out from other photos and videos. Forget those old photo filters and photo editor, welcome our new breathtaking video loops.

— Popular Presets & Special Effects —
Anime, Legends, Vertigo, Motion blur
Butterfly, Neon, Sparkle, Cloud, Vapourware, vhs, Indie

— 3D Photo —
Add a new dimension to your photos.
You can use our integrated 3D camera or create a 3D photo starting from a normal photo.
You can choose between a vintage effect like a D3D camera, or a standard high quality 3D picture. Loopsie mimics many movement, from the classic 360 wiggle, to a vertical fast movement.

— Advanced Technologies —
Machine Learning Based Depth Prediction:
We built a Neural Network that accurately predicts the depth of every photo.

Augmented Reality Stickers:
Loopsie enriches the picture with 3D augmented reality stickers.

Advanced 3D Scene Reconstruction:
We developed a unique algorithm to fill the missing part of the 3D scene.

3D Segmentation:
The neural network we developed will segment the subjects from the scene for a more dimensional view.

— Subscription Information —
Subscribe to Loopsie Pro to unlock all the stickers, filters, effects and tools!

Subscription Plans:
Weekly, Monthly, Yearly or Unlimited Access

Payment & Cancellation:
Subscriptions are billed at the rate selected depending on the subscription plan. Alternatively a one-time payment plan is available to obtain “unlimited access”  (this is not a subscription). The subscription fee is charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
Subscriptions auto-renew at the cost of the chosen package, unless cancelled 24-hours in advance prior to the end of the current period.
You may manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings after purchase. Once purchased, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

Free Trial Policy:
Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

— Follow Us —
Instagram: @loopsieapp
TikTok: @loopsieapp

— User Feedback —
Developer e-mail: iOS.support@loopsie.it (Any feedback is appreciated!)

— Recruitment —
Loopsie is looking for creators to collaborate in our social media communities. If you’re interested to build Loopsie’s social presence together, feel free to contact us at info@loopsie.it
Thank you for your support!

Read more about our terms and conditions here:
https://bit.ly/2PWcXgi

Read more about our privacy policy here:
https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/8126812
releaseNotes:
Thank you for using Loopsie!
We would love to hear your thoughts on this update, please email us at ios.support@loopsie.it.
This update includes some bug fixes.

title: IKEA
description:
The IKEA mobile app is where your inspiration comes to life. Find that cute armchair you saw at your friend’s place or look through thousands of products and ideas just for you - to make your space truly your own.

Whether you’re looking to buy online or in-store, the IKEA app is your perfect shopping companion.

Scan the products while you walk through the store  - and skip the checkout line.

Are you planning a big project or small home improvements? Save and organise your favourites in lists for later. They are ready when you are!

Found the perfect IKEA furniture or home decoration? Let us do the heavy lifting. Order home delivery and be informed every step of the way, by tracking your order easily in the app.

The IKEA app is also a convenient home for your IKEA Family benefits. Access your IKEA Family card quickly and find all your past receipts conveniently in one location.

IKEA values your data privacy and believes in ethical use of customer data. That’s why you’re in control of all your data at all times.
releaseNotes: Bug fixes and performance improvements.

title: Weather & Radar - Storm alerts
description:
Key Features of Weather & Radar’s free app:

- Hourly and daily weather forecast
- 14-day weather outlook
- Worldwide live weather map
- RainfallRadar
- TemperatureRadar & WindRadar
- Pollen Count
- Severe weather warnings & Warning Maps
- Coastal and tidal information
- Weather Widget
- Snow & ski information

Weather App
Be up-to-date at all times with Weather & Radar’s free app! Always know whether the sun will be out, a thunderstorm is approaching, if it’ll rain, hail or snow. The weather app will accurately display current weather conditions for your exact position and any further location worldwide.

Weather Forecast
Everything about the weather at a glance! The latest specifics on temperature, rain, probability of precipitation, snow, wind, sunshine hours, sunrise and sunset times. Detailed displays of air pressure, humidity levels and UV-Index. Plan further ahead with the 14-day weather outlook feature.

WeatherRadar
More than just your standard weather map! See the latest enhanced radar map, which includes areas of cloud cover, sunshine, rainfall, snowfall, hail, thunderstorms, and lightning strikes. This feature allows you to see meteorological conditions for various locations at once. Trace the movement of cloud formations and active storms, to see, if they will hit or bypass your location. Switch to RainfallRadar and see rainfall only against a more subtle backdrop.

WindRadar & TemperatureRadar
Gone with the wind or not? Our latest feature, the WindRadar lets you track the wind, including wind direction and peak gusts. One click away you can find the TemperatureRadar, which allows you to see the temperature on a beautifully coloured map, up to 3 days ahead!

Pollen Count
Current information on pollen count: Weather & Radar provides free, reliable and local information on pollen count in your area with details of 14 types of pollen to tackle all forms of hay fever plus pollen forecasts for the next six days.

Severe Weather Warnings & Warning Maps
Activate severe weather warnings and receive push notifications when extreme weather conditions such as storms, thunderstorms, lightning, heavy winds or snow are underway. The Warning Map lets you see where warnings have been issued - Europe-wide!

World Weather
Scheduling a trip or have a family member in another country? Save any location and see current conditions for any number of global locations at once. World weather at your fingertips!

Weather Widget
The widget displays weather information for your current location in a compact format on the home screen of your device.

Coastal & Tidal Information
Live near the sea? You can rely on Weather & Radar's free app to see water temperatures, wave heights, high and low tide times for coastal areas.

Snow Info / Winter Sports
Planning a last-minute ski trip? Weather & Radar will tell you where the snow is! Access all ski and other winter sport info for major Ski locations in Europe.

Use the weather app free of advertising with the in-app purchase and profit from the option to personalise your main page!

Weather & Radar Ad-free is a subscription service that will be renewed on either a monthly or a yearly basis. Payment for the subscription will be charged to the user’s Apple Account at confirmation of purchase. The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. The user’s Apple account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Apple will identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of the Weather & Radar Ad-free, free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription thereof.

Terms and Conditions: http://www.weatherandradar.com/ios/terms-of-use/

Should you have any queries or comments, kindly contact us at info@weatherandradar.co.uk
releaseNotes:
With the latest update, you can now tap locations in the WeatherRadar to access the forecasts even faster. We are always working behind the scenes to make Weather & Radar even better! 

If you have questions or suggestions, feel free to send us an email on info@weatherandradar.co.uk.

title: Mobilní klíč eGovernmentu
description:
Aplikace Mobilní klíč eGovernmentu pro mobilní platformu iOS umožňuje jednoduché a rychlé přihlášení do Datových schránek i řady dalších webových aplikací veřejné správy bez nutnosti zadávat složité jméno a heslo.

Pro použití v datových schránkách si do mobilního telefonu nebo tabletu nainstalujte aplikaci Mobilní klíč a v Datových schránkách ji připojte ke svému uživatelskému účtu (Nastavení - Možnosti přihlášení - Přihlášení Mobilním klíčem). Pro přihlášení do Datových schránek pak stačí se přihlásit do Mobilního klíče otiskem prstu (nebo PINem, heslem či obrázkovým heslem - podle vlastní volby) a sejmout QR kód na přihlašovací stránce.

Jeden Mobilní klíč si můžete připojit k více datovým schránkám. Po přihlášení Mobilním klíčem vám pak Datové schránky nabídnou výběr ze všech dostupných uživatelských účtů.

Do Mobilního klíče mohou být také doručována upozornění na nové zprávy ve vaší datové schránce.

Pro přihlašování přes Národní bod se nabízí více možností. Poté co si aplikaci nainstalujete na mobilní telefon, můžete si buď do Národního bodu přenést svou identitu z datové schránky nebo si spárovat aplikaci Mobilní klíč se svým stávajícím účtem v Národním bodě za použití jiného elektronického prostředku pro přihlášení nebo si můžete na kontaktním místě veřejné správy (Czech POINT) založit nový účet v Národním bodě.

Mobilní klíč vyžaduje ke svému běhu iOS verze 11 či vyšší a zapnutý zámek obrazovky (nesmí být možné odemknout zařízení prostým odsunutím obrazovky, musí být nastaven odemykací obrazec, PIN nebo heslo).

Pokud má vaše zařízení Touch ID nebo Face ID a iOS alespoň 11, je možné se do Mobilního klíče přihlásit otiskem prstu (Touch ID) nebo načtením obličeje (Face ID).

Pro přihlášení do Datových schránek je potřeba, aby měl telefon či tablet přístup na internet - je jedno, zda přes mobilní data nebo pomocí Wi-Fi.

Aplikace Mobilní klíč zajišťuje pouze bezpečné přihlášení bez nutnosti zadávat přihlašovací údaje. Samotný přístup do datové schránky (čtení zpráv) probíhá i nadále ve webovém prohlížeči - aplikace nic jiného než přihlášení (a doručení notifikací) nezajišťuje.

FAQ: naleznete, zde: https://info.mojedatovaschranka.cz/info/cs/help/15.2.text.html#15_2

a zde: https://info.identitaobcana.cz/mep/

Podmínky používání Mobilního klíče eGovernmentu pro prokazování totožnosti prostřednictvím Národního bodu jsou uvedeny na následujícím odkazu: https://info.identitaobcana.cz/Download/PodminkyPouzivaniMEG.pdf. 

Aplikace používá ikony z Icons8.com
releaseNotes:
- Úpravy příjmu notifikací.
- Vylepšení přístupnosti aplikace.

title: KB+
description:
SIMPLE TO USE
Track all your services in one user-friendly app. You can easily order and manage individual services.

PLANS
Choose a plan that fits your lifestyle. A plan is a set of products and services for everyday banking, which includes an account, a card, payments, and ATM withdrawals.

MULTICURRENCY ACCOUNT
Use multiple currencies in one account. You can exchange money within your account in a few seconds and simply pay in the local currency abroad, wherever you go.

CHOOSE YOUR OWN ACCOUNT NUMBER AND NAME IT
Set your own account number, for example, your birthday or wedding anniversary. You can name the account whatever you like.

SAVINGS ACCOUNT AND ENVELOPES
Open a savings account online and have up to 10 savings envelopes. Organize your money into envelopes for whatever you need.

DEBIT CARD WITH MANAGEMENT TOOLS
You can get an account card online and set its limits as you wish. You can also lock or unlock the card and view your PIN at any time.

KB KLÍČ IS NOW PART OF KB+
You no longer need 2 apps to verify payments and logins. Now you can do everything in the KB+ app.

DRAG AND DROP PAYMENTS
Move money quickly and easily between your accounts and savings envelopes with a simple drag and drop.

TOUCH ID AND FACE ID
Make app login and payment verification easier with Touch ID or Face ID. Just use your finger or scan your face.

3D TOUCH
Long press the KB+ app icon on your mobile to choose from the most used features.

SPOTLIGHT
Explore the ability to search KB+ app features through Spotlight.

BUILDING SAVINGS
Get state support of up to 2,000 CZK per year and enrich your savings with a guaranteed interest rate for 6 years.
releaseNotes:
You can do more with the KB+ app.

Child savings account
- You can now open a savings account for a child.

Templates and beneficiaries
- You can find templates and beneficiaries under one menu item.

Vital Invest insurance
- You will see Vital Invest life insurance on the Insurance tab.

Bug fixing

How satisfied are you with KB+? Feel free to rate us!

title: Rohlik.cz
description:
Tired of endless queues, running across town, and wrestling with those heavy bags? Say hello to a new shopping era! At Sezamo, we’re your one-stop shop for everything you need, from groceries and farm-fresh delights to pharmacies, pet stores, & more. And the best part? We’ll bring it all to your doorstep, faster than you can imagine. Picture this: 60 minutes, 15-minute slots, and yes, we’ll even take it up to your 8th-floor haven! With Sezamo, you’ll have time for the moments that truly count. We’re not just delivering groceries; we’re delivering happiness to your doorstep.

Why choose Rohlik.cz?
All You Need in One Place!
*Explore a vast selection of over 24 000 products, from supermarkets and farmers’ delights to pharmacies, drugstores, pet shops, and more.
*Farm Fresh Delights! Savor the freshest fruits and veggies, delivered to your doorstep in as little as 6 hours from harvest.
*Crispy Baked Goodness! Indulge in the crispiest baked goods from your favorite bakeries or ours, freshly prepared when you order.
*Artisan Butchers Unite! Discover the finest cuts under one roof.
*Dive into the Deep! Find the widest variety of fish in town.
*Price Match Pros! We keep an eye on hundreds of prices daily to ensure you get the best deal.
*Private Brands for Quality & Value! Enjoy top-notch private label products.
*Plant-Based Paradise! Over 1000 plant-based products for those with a green heart.
*Special Diets? No Problem! We’ve got over 1 000 specialty products just for you.

Delivery Delights!
*Fast as Lightning! Get your goods within 60 minutes, in convenient 15-minute slots.
*Elevator or Not, We’ve Got You Covered! No matter your floor, we’ll deliver to your doorstep.
*7 Days a Week, No Exceptions! We’re here on weekends and holidays, ready to serve you.

Our Promise to You
*Satisfaction Guaranteed! Didn’t like something? No worries, easy online refunds without the fuss.
*Baby Club for Parents! Exclusive discounts, free delivery, and more - all for FREE.
*Premium Club for Effortless Shopping! Free shipping, up to 20% off, same-day delivery guarantee, and beyond.
*Shop in Seconds! Our intuitive app makes your shopping a breeze and is always evolving to meet your needs.
*Forgotten Something? Add it to your last order hassle-free.
*Keep It Cool! We guarantee the right temperature for your goods with an unbroken temperature chain.

We Care About Our Planet
*Eco-Friendly Rides! Our CNG or electric vehicles help save the planet while delivering up to 14 orders in one go.
*Greener Routing! Opt for our “Green Slots” to make your deliveries even more eco-conscious.
*Waste Less, Save More! With “Save the Food” tech, we reduce food waste by a staggering 4 times less than traditional supermarkets.
*Reusable Bags for the Win! Your groceries will arrive in eco-friendly, reusable bags.
releaseNotes: New Language Options: Rohlik now supports both Czech and English! Switch languages easily in the profile section to enjoy and explore Rohlik in your preferred language! Also, we fixed a few bugs and added some technical improvements.
reviews:
Great app, easy to use | Doesn't work on my iphone 11, otherwise service works great. But can't use it on a phone🤷‍♂️ | Skvela aplikace s intuitivnim ovladanim. | Skvela appka, lovely servis, potraviny a jidlo. | Fakt skvělá apka | I love the reliability and the quality of products provided by Rohlik! They are always adding products that I love. Making shopping easy. | So far had great experience! | Dnes objednavan poprve | Děkujeme za rychlou a skvělou službu | I love that I just did my grocery shopping while lying on the couch. | Yay | Rohlik je absolutně jedinečný!!! Objednávám potraviny pro bratra v Brně bez sebemenšíjo problému, přesto, že já se nacházím v Californii. Jedinečný service! Děkuji!!! | Great shopping experience. Rohlik rules. | Spolehliva apka i navazujici sluzba. Jinde uz fakt nenakupuji. Diky! | Rohlík is my long time go to supermarket. Great selection, reliable service and awesome user-friendly app. | This is how grocery shopping in 21st century | So convenient, excellent variety and customer service! I only wish it was possible to filter a search by ingredients to avoid my allergies. | The app is very good, but it should have an English version. | The app lacks the English language option so you have to resort to using the website or just YOLO your order. | Rohlik poskytuje skvely servis a už mnohokrát má zachránil napríklad i pri zabudnutej detskej party. Ďakujeme! | Excellent customer services. Great app. | Very helpful person walked me through my issues | I find it easier to use my Edenred card on Rohlik than it is on Kosik. 
Good to see reusable bags and ability to return glass bottles. 
Love it! | Využívám Rohlík již pět let a mohu říct, že jen málokterá (vlastně asi žádná) služba funguje tak skvěle. Jsou spolehliví a když se náááhodou něco nepovede, je to promptně napraveno. Do supermarketů jsem nevkročila ani nepamatuji a to, že mi nikdo vozíkem nevjíždí na paty, nemusím stát ve frontě na pokladnu a vláčet minerálky do patra je prostě k nezaplacení. | Awesome app. Great service irl. | Not much to add:) | The app is super intuitive (and the food is good). It saves my favorite items and shows them quickly. Someone is clearly doing a good job optimizing the flow, resulting in a very seamless shopping experience. We don’t go to the store anymore. | Po nějaké době jsem opět zkusil použit k objednání aplikaci a poprvé se to podařilo. Tak tedy verze 5.3.3 se zdá být konečně funkční. Gratuluji. | v aplikaci jsem automaticky měla celý nákup tak jak jsem si ho naklikala v počítači a mohla jsem velice jednoduše přidávat další položky v telefonu, tak jak mě napadlo! Dokonale, děkuji, že mi pomáháte dělat můj život jednodušší! | I’ve been using Rohlik’s app for several years and gotta say, it’s less buggy than 90% other apps out there. 

My main suggestion would be to make it easy to put a “watchdog” function on an item that’s temporarily sold out, something that the desktop version does well. That way you don’t have to check every half-hour of they got a fresh supply of local strawberries… | Great app that is despite the mobile format almost as rich and practical as the desktop version! Cudos to bred roll (rohlik :-) | Easy, fast and practical shopping with delivery to you house, height quality and reliability for price premium | Good app. Prices meh | English please | Wish I could have the app in English | The app is useless. All I get when I launch is a screen asking for my address. Then some error in a non-English language. The developer should be fired. Really incompetent UX. | Why does it give me an error message everytime I try to use it? | There are away too many expats in Prague for this not to have an English option. I would love to use this but it’s too tedious to go back and forth translating from czech. | Generally speaking, expats in Czech are a segment that has a higher than average income and more open to change and new ideas (like ordering food online which has been present in more western countries for many years already). It seems like a big missed opportunity to not have the ability to switch the app to English. 

I’ve been learning Czech for about a year but I’m still not comfortable enough to navigate the app and read nutrient descriptions in it. So it is still more convenient for me to go to the store where, due to the physical nature, I have an easier time navigating. | This app appears to work as intended. You can fill a card and order. The delivery options are pretty clear. The reason it gets only four stars instead of five is because the text is not electronically readable nor zoomable. This makes it very difficult app for the visually impaired who are naturally be a large portion of the customers because this app offers a way to shop without driving. I hope the app developer will remedy the accessibility soon.

title: Snapchat
description:
Snapchat is a fast and fun way to share the moment with your friends and family 

SNAP
• Snapchat opens straight to the camera — just tap to take a photo or press and hold for video. 
• Express yourself with Lenses, Filters, Bitmoji and more! 
•Try out new Lenses created daily by the Snapchat community!

CHAT
• Stay in touch with friends through live messaging or share your day with Group Stories. 
• Video chat with up to 16 friends at once — you can even use Lenses and Filters when chatting! 
• Express yourself with Friendmoji — exclusive Bitmoji made just for you and a friend.272

STORIES
• Watch friends’ Stories to see their day unfold. 
• See Stories from the Snapchat community that are based on your interests. 
• Discover breaking news and exclusive, original Shows.

SPOTLIGHT
• Spotlight showcases the best of Snapchat! 
• Submit your own Snaps or sit back, relax and watch. 
• Pick your favourites and share them with friends.

MAP 
• Share your location with your best friends or go off the grid with Ghost Mode. 
• See what your friends are up to on your most personal map when they share their location with you. 
• Explore live Stories from the community nearby or across the world!

MEMORIES
• Save unlimited photos and videos of all your favourite moments. 
• Edit and send old moments to friends or save them to your Camera Roll. 
• Create Stories from your favourite Memories to share with friends and family.

FRIENDSHIP PROFILE
• Every friendship has its own special profile so that you can see the moments you’ve saved together. 
• Discover new things you have in common with Charms — see how long you’ve been friends, your astrological compatibility, your Bitmoji fashion sense and more! 
• Friendship Profiles are just between you and a friend, so you can bond over what makes your friendship special.

Happy Snapping!

Please note: Snapchatters can always capture or save your messages by taking a screenshot, using a camera or in other ways. Be mindful of what you Snap!

For a full description of our privacy practices, please go to our Privacy Centre.

title: Airbnb
description:
FIND YOUR PERFECT STAY WITH AIRBNB CATEGORIES
Explore our curated collections of homes chosen for their style, location or nearby activities. Whether you’re looking for a cosy cabin with views or apartments by the beach, Airbnb Categories helps you find places to stay that are right for your trip. 

CUSTOMISE YOUR SEARCH WITH 100+ FILTERS
Narrow down your choices easily with filters that help you book homes that meet your needs. Search by certain amenities, like pools and fireplaces, or filter for confirmed accessibility features, like step-free bedroom access.

MANAGE ALL YOUR TRAVEL DETAILS EASILY
The Airbnb app keeps all your essential trip info in one convenient place, so you can quickly revisit or share your travel details with others. You’re also able to chat with your Host and receive up-to-the-minute booking updates, making it easier to get there, get inside and get connected to wifi.

TRY FUN EXPERIENCES LED BY LOCALS
Airbnb Experiences are fun activities led by Hosts. They’re a great way to immerse yourself in a new place with a local expert as your guide. Browse both in-person and online options, whether you want an Experience that gets you out and about or one you can enjoy from the comfort of your couch. Book, save or share your favourites – all with the Airbnb app.

IT’S NEVER BEEN EASIER TO AIRBNB YOUR HOME
As a new Host, Airbnb Setup matches you with an experienced Superhost in your area who’ll provide one-to-one help from your first question to your first booking – by phone, video call or chat. You’ll also have one-tap access to Community Support agents to guide you through anything from account issues to billing support.
releaseNotes: Feel at home wherever you travel with Airbnb. We’re always working to better your experience through improvements and updates to the app.
reviews:
I have been a loyal airbnb customer for 5 years. I will never use airbnb again. I heard people say they dont like airbnbs because they are never clean . Now I see what everyone means. My last 3 airbnbs have been disgusting and each time it gets worse. The worse part about airbnb  is they take the HOST side before the consumer and we pay all the money. They don’t compensate you for the dirty and unsafe listing. Airbnb support told me my host was being to kind for refunding me for the days after I cancel my airbnb ! As she should because I wont be there !!!! The blatant disrespect has lost a loyal customer. Airbnb should be ASHAMED ! | I rented an apartment and I got a notice of the host not paying rent. When I contacted air bnb they said they couldn’t do anything! I paid way more than the actual rent, since I had the bill, and was shocked to know Air Bnb couldn’t do a thing! I had to handle it with my host, is what they said. Why do I pay a service fee then? How can you allow someone to post a rental if it’s not paid for on the host side? The customer service has gone downhill dramatically in the last year. So many issues with so many properties and they never help. After 6 years I am done with this app. Hotels at least are more accountable than this platforms and it’s rentals. | So Awesome | Still trying to get help with my Airbnb account?
No one is listening! The account will not open or not update??? I have a black screen only! Going on vacation soon and haven’t been able to book or fix bookings! Help!!! This is so unprofessional that no one cares to respond? Did you die? No support or help so I will post everyday until I get someone’s attention??? Help!! | This company is a scam, it has absolutely no customer service. I have several issues with the app itself and for a stay I did using the app. I am chatting on the app and random people come and say they will work on the case but fee mins later they are gone and no updates for several days. Chat bot keeps asking do you still need help but that dumb bot doesn't see that airbnb has done nothing. I have called and talked to actual people but they say they will work but nothing is done by them as well. I previously reported issue to executive team and that person said let me work on it and get back to you but it has been more than a month and no one has responded. Disgusting app experience and with the staff of airbnb | I have used airbnb for years. They decided to remove my account with no further explanation, asked for an appeal and the information they based this decision on. Just denied my appeal and removed my account unfairly. This app was great, has been horrible this past year. | Don’t download this. For some reason it needed a card put in then it took $22 from my account. Very annoying | after years of dealing with discrimination, terrible customer service, rates above market price, and a platform that puts its hosts above its guests, I just had my last negative experience. Verbo and hotels.com are better in every way. | They don’t care anymore. 
Customer service will leave you hanging with no way to escalate issue to upper management. 

What are we suppose to do now | I had decent experience with airbnb. My issue comes in with the “review” system. I don’t feel it is fair that the app urges us to give the host a good review or it won’t be posted, but the host can write a bad review about the customer and it gets posted with no issues. Plus we have to “dispute” a negative review through support which takes forever if it even happens. It’s very dishonest and unfair to current and future users. All reviews about the host should be posted, good or bad because all reviews get posted about the customer no matter if it’s good or bad. I will not use the app anymore because of this. I deleted my account. | Verification system threw up random error messages on browser when trying to verify phone number.
Then after I try on the app it says I can’t confirm for 24 hours?!
Talked to customer service representative but they were VERY unhelpful. | I have used Airbnb for 6 years. On 4 different occasions I have booked an Airbnb 5+ months out from my scheduled trip and then had the hosts cancel on me right before. This year, Airbnb allowed the host to cancel on me 2 days before my trip leaving me to panic and scramble to find a new one. I tried numeorus times reaching out for assistance and got nothing in return. I can no longer rely on Airbnb, there is no point in booking one since hosts can cancel whenever. The hosts have too much power and Airbnb does nothing to protect or assist renters. | Just felt bitter about recent encounter with Airbnb. I had an excursion planned in Europe and my flight was cancelled in Amsterdam’s — thanks KLM. I didn’t make a flight and Airbnb would not try to workout a deal and charged $250+ even though it wasn’t our fault.
Peace, 
Max | Idk what I would do without airbnb honestly ! Wether it's for traveling , work, vacation, or lifestyle good or bad! It's definitely worth booking through, no resort fees or security deposits ! | 2 of the last 3 times I used AirBnB, the listings seriously misrepresented the property. One claimed to have 3 bathrooms; in actuality the property had only 1 toilet. The other claimed to be oceanfront / beachfront; in actuality it was ~1 or 2 blocks from the beach. (The 3rd one was honest and wonderful). 
I don’t know if I’ll use AirBnB again. It’s a risk. Owners seem fine with making stuff up and AirBnB seems not to have any mechanism to ensure accurate listings, they try to get you to “work it” with the owner. | When things go wrong your on your own.  They will not protect you and you will not get your money back, we call this a scam in business.  
What a joke.  They used to be good but now have no moral compass.  Sad. | I had a host accept my alternate stay and she never refunded my money back. I called Airbnb Support and she didn’t respond to them. I lost out on $687.09 . The Customer Service is in India so you will not get any help with that either. If the host withheld your refund, the host can negotiate what they want to give back. This is company is not about the customer it’s about the host. | I don’t know how people afford to book Airbnbs anymore. The fees are just out of control. Between the cleaning and booking fees, it’s literally half the price if you stay at a hotel.  Airbnb please reign this in and go back to basics. As far as the app, filtering options are limited…and quite inaccurate. If I search for waterfront, I’m not interested in your property that’s a 1 mi drive to the water. 🙄 | At lease at a hotel you can hold someone accountable and/or get a refund if the host doesn’t hold up their end of the deal. AirBnB does not have any interest in your complaints or concerns. The rental could be completely wrong, full of bugs, mold, and you will be stuck for the duration. Don’t take my word for it, just research AIRBNB nightmares and you’ll find that this organization is completely corrupt and the hosts are more often than not dishonest in their listings and Airbnb does not verify that listings are as advertised. A scheme all the way to the top. I lost months of funds while traveling due to booking extended stays at a string of listings that fell very short of expectation, including the bugs and mold. It was too late once I realized that no matter what listing I ended up at, none of them were as advertised and the company told me too bad. Video evidence, pictures. Didn’t matter. They just assumed it was in bad faith. They tell you to settle it on site with the host. They’ll tell you the host has THE ENTIRE DURATION of your stay to resolve the issue. Even if they make no effort to resolve the complaint, it still counts. RUN FOR YOUR LIFE. | Why do you hide addresses? I’m trying to book a place and I want to look up on a map how close it is to trails. Your built in map doesn’t show the trails so I need the address to look on a trail map. In the end I didn’t book through this app. Hiding the address is shady! Hotels don’t hide their address. I booked a hotel instead! Completely stupid business model! | The idea that Airbnb allows their host to charge crazy high cleaning fees is ridiculous. You should not be allowed to charge a daily cleaning unless you are cleaning daily!!!

Airbnb needs to get rid of the cleaning fees and let the hosts build that price into their rental rates - just like a hotel. | Why is it that I can’t use the app I have. If I can’t download new one it seems wrong to force me to upgrade to a new phone. | Air bnb used to be a good option, but now since all air bnb’s charge $200 plus cleaning fees on top of all the other fees, and built in rules…. Requiring you to clean…. It lost its luster. At least at hotels you don’t have to clean and you also get free breakfast. | Airbnb used to be so much better - now the customer service is non existent, with any problems you will be speaking to a robot, and my last 3 cases I spent useless hours and nothing was ever resolved! Pull it together Airbnb! No more robots for customer service - give us Real and logical humans! | Limited trust and safety. Multiple scams ongoing related to insufficient host/ fraud checks. Constantly see reviews purporting scams and false placements. | Their host are always so awful. they all just wanna steal your money. horrible app do not recommend. They will try to charge you on top of the total price. overall a horrible app. | Worst experience staying somewhere of my life. $20/night apt and the hosts never settled on how to pay for it. Then pressed charges when stuff was missing from her apartment after I left it in perfect condition minus a used towel. | After arriving at Arthur's condo in Phoenix we requested to cancel because it was the most unsafe area we had ever tried to stay while using Airbnb. I consistently use this service while traveling for work. After the poor and lack of communication from air bnb I will most likely not use this service anymore. 
To give an example the parking lot of the condo and surrounding area was littered with drug addicts dealers and what seemed to be a tent city across the street. I highly recommend not staying here. I'm from the South Side of Chicago and didn't want to get out of the car if you know what I mean. 
There has been no support from air bnb and we will be contacting our credit card company for a refund. | I came to the Airbnb service so that I would not have to worry about finding a place to live. I found 2 ads and both turned out to be fraudulent. How do you keep the service clean? I don't want to look anywhere for housing, I'm ready to pay extra for airbnb service. They are trying to deceive me, at first they tried to take me to their third-party site, then they say that the ad I chose is unavailable, the room is occupied, they offered another one for $ 300 more expensive. Well, I agreed, now they ask to be contacted by phone before confirming the reservation. I am dissatisfied with the Airbnb service, I will never use it again and I will not recommend it to anyone. | I’ve had continual issues with Airbnb over the last year, I can never reserve anything with a vague “something went wrong” error. Tried on multiple browsers and multiple devices until I inevitably get a “too many attempts message”. | Too much expensive . Booking hotel seems to be better than Airbnb | I went to Spokane from Ohio for my sons, chemotherapy treatments me and my wife and my son, when we first got there, we booked under my wife’s account and ended up having to leave the first Airbnb. We were at because of family emergencies and they needed their home and so we booked a different day well the night after we got there I got a notification from our Host stating that Airbnb canceled our reservation and we needed to leave immediately. I didn’t understand why so my wife went into her account to check to see what happened and they completely removed her account and said that we were partying even though they had no proof or evidence because we weren’t. Well, we asked for a refund for the rest of the nights because we spent $900 and they kept saying they would escalate our case escalate. Our case never contacted us back never put the account back up and never gave us a refund for our money. Well, we went and booked an Airbnb under my name on my account and ended up getting robbed. All of our belongings got stolen and Airbnb helped us with rebooking we rebooked the Airbnb. We had the hot tub didn’t work so we wanted to go somewhere else. They issued us a coupon and the second they issued all those coupons to my account, they sent me an email stating they were removing my account from the platform for party risk of partying, again with no evidence and no warning at all and now they are refusing to talk to us at all and I just lost over $900 again which is totaling out to about $1900 that we’ve lost within the last week and now they refuse to give us our accounts back or even a gift voucher with the amount on it so we could get somewhere else to stay. Do not book with Airbnb. They will scam you. | Mario is been the best host you can ever find, this is the second time using his house and his responses are fast and efficient, thank you Mario | I have been utilizing Air bnb since its inception and I will tell you that it is the hosts that define the quality of this product and not the app.  That being said, the Airbnb app is now the most convenient tool  to find alternatives to hotels in the travel biz.  I do find google search to run a close second to this app and find google infinitely easier to use- such that I find many Airbnb on google then get the details on Airbnb app.  

I still find Airbnb format, codes and operation extraordinarily ineffective in getting the whole picture.  Even many reviews reveal hidden codes as “cozy bed” meaning its rented for 2 people but its not even a queen bed -or- “rustic” surroundings meaning a junkyard is on the same block as where you are staying. 

Also, app navigation has never been that intuitive. I still find myself vetting stuck in places and starti g the app over. It is as if they never really knew what a “back button” was. 

In the end, I have had many good experiences and one or two exceptional ones, all being because the host made it so. 

March 2020 entry

The app has definitely gotten better with a few issues remaining. Receipts can be viewed but not printed, emailed, or otherwise utilized in any way!?? House rules seem to be more dodgy than ever. Sometimes they are easily found, sometimes theyare emailed after a reservation and almost all are rants of disorganized personalities 🤪 . Airbnb survives because of really cool people hosting the coolest and most diverse amenities ever offered. Airbnb serves this market with an average score of 3 stars. App now cuts off text messages and inhibits return messages even inside the app. Het twice the messages tou cannot respond to. Cool! Just keeps getting worse! This app is different but not better Has the search by map been removed or moved where I can't find it?? Why is taking longer to find more unavailable properties? Just updated again to try features and tools. App freezes... App is still clunky but better than it was but I just got recommended stays a surprising distance from my intended destination..... The app is worse than ever and the whole AIRBNB system is getting to be a frustrating mess. I have attempted to book 5 locations in the last 6 months with one success. After a major frustration I was offered over $100 instant credits and still chose not to book with AIR BNB...... This is getting unfriendlier and more "corporate" by the day. Earlier version .... Whoever released this needs to roll it back up! I have attempted to book stays with complete frustration and mix ups. The app has reversed it performance of user ease. Avoid this new version.... | It said to update so I did and now it’s just a black screen | $300 a night? lol, don’t forget $160 Airbnb fees, $150 taxes, and of course the $250 cleaning fee. Airbnb rates are a joke and so many renters know it and offer their properties on other sites or on personal pages for much less. I doubt you’ll ever find your best deal here. | Airbnb refused to give my handicap mother a refund, even though the property we tried to rent from Stuart Morley was not handicap accessible! There wasn't even room for my mom's wheelchair anywhere and we only stayed a few days out of the 25 that we reserved. Airbnb has this individual to steal from us with no ability to recover the money and the trip interruption insurance they offer is worthless too, and didn't cover anything! Don't ever use this service or you'll lose your money and never be able to get it back. They purposely allow people that they are being prejudiced towards handicap people to continue to be on there and make money from their service. Airbnb is a bunch of thieves. | Since New update, the app will not open on my phone. Just rotates the app symbol. | Most of my personal travel is with my four-legged friend. It is so much easier and less expensive to use AirBNB instead of hotel chains.  Occasionally I use it for business travel when I am looking for a specific area and can’t find a hotel. | I had always heard from friends how Airbnb scams its customers and it happened to me too. I was held responsible for existing damages in a cabinet and was charged $150 for the chipped corner paint. I have many other friends telling me how the hosts show repair documentation and they go and proceed to over charge for existing damages in a property and they try to hold you responsible for it. | THEY DO NOT CARE ABOUT YOUR SAFETY, AS LONG AS THEY MAKE MONEY OFF OF YOU. NARROWLY ESCAPED A DANGEROUS SITUATION. I recently experienced a concerning situation during a reservation with Airbnb, prompting me to share a cautionary tale with fellow users. Regrettably, my experience has led me to conclude that Airbnb’s commitment to customer safety may not align with their public image. Despite raising genuine safety concerns during my stay and providing detailed information, the response from Airbnb’s support team exhibited a lack of thorough consideration and logical coherence. The decision-making process appeared flawed, with the introduction of logical fallacies and an apparent disregard for the gravity of the issues raised. This experience has left me deeply dissatisfied with Airbnb’s customer service, as it seems the platform prioritizes financial transactions over the safety and well-being of its users. Consequently, I have chosen to discontinue using Airbnb for future accommodations. I urge potential users to exercise caution when considering Airbnb for their lodging needs. While the platform may offer a wide array of options, my unfortunate commitment to addressing safety concerns promptly and responsibly. It is essential for users to be aware that Airbnb’s customer support may fall short of expectations when faced with issues that require careful consideration and thorough investigation. The logical fallacies evident in their response, including appeals to ignorance, non sequiturs, and hasty generalizations, highlight a concerning lack of rigor in their decision-making process. Such lapses in reasoning raise questions about the reliability of Airbnb’s customer support and their ability to handle situations that involve safety and security. In light of these experiences, I strongly caution potential users against relying solely on Airbnb for their lodging needs. Exploring alternative accommodation options with a reputation for prioritizing customer safety and providing robust support mechanisms might be a more prudent choice. While Airbnb has undoubtedly revolutionized the way we travel and seek accommodations, my recent encounter has revealed a disconcerting aspect of their customer service that cannot be overlooked. As consumers, our safety and well-being should remain paramount, and I believe it is crucial to consider these factors when choosing a platform for lodging arrangements. In conclusion, my recommendation is to approach Airbnb with caution and to carefully evaluate their commitment to safety and customer support. It is my hope that this review serves as a reminder for users to prioritize platforms that consistently uphold the highest standards of service and safety. | App is very easy to use | It is nice to book and enjoy experiences but let’s hope nothing detrimental occurs because they have no resolution or policies for refunds | I used to love using Airbnb, now there is a ridiculous amount of fees added at the end and the total ends up being 3 or 4 times the advertised price. This kind of false advertising is very disappointing as Airbnb used to be much more transparent. There is a button you can select that gives you a closer number to what you will ultimately pay.  But I don’t like being tricked into a false sense of security by these fake prices. | To be clear, LOVE the service. This review is of the app's usability as a visually impaired person.

Text (as in 'how to get in' messages) cannot be zoomed in on. Nor can it be copied by a long press. This forces you into all sorts of cludgy work-arounds.

As noted, love the service but make the app more user friendly. | I’m a host with three years’ experience on Airbnb. In general, it was OK, but when I got a scammer guest who reserved in the wrong place and then lied and said my place was dirty, in order to cancel the reservation and get her money back, the support from Airbnb customer service was terrible. Though I was a “SuperHost” with all five-star ratings, they believed the guest and gave her all her money back.
I recently tried returning to Airbnb but found the customer service is still inadequate. They give you the runaround endlessly, seemingly trying to wear you out, rather than help you. I am done with hosting on Airbnb. I recommend using FurnishedFinder.Com. They don’t take a percentage of your rent, but rather a yearly fee of about $150. | If you get a bad air bnb rental don’t expect any help from air bnb. Scammers! | AirBnB is one of those services that when it works well and everyone involved is being honest is wonder but the moment you have a disreputable host you can lose a massive amount of money. I had a host mislead me on a listing and when I found out less than 48 hours later and attempted to cancel I was met with a 900 dollar cancelation fee, when I tried to contact AirBnB I was met with a we will reach out to the host and the host refused to give me my money back. Airbnb told me that it was up to the host who had mislead me in the listing to begin with. The real shame is that there are good and honest hosts but the fact that predatory ones are allowed to continue doing business makes it impossible for me to even consider continuing business with them. | The house owner used old item blame us for damage and charge me for damage which we never use and that item not even in my room. The review are fake. You can see one person put multiple 5 stars review make it looks like perfect place. 
Double charge for cleaning fee. Why we are still using Airbnb? | 点进行程单，提示 未能读取数据，因为它的格式不正确

title: Úžasná místa - tipy na výlety
description:
Více než 900 tipů na neokoukaná místa v Česku, která jsme pro vás osobně prozkoumali a vybrali

CO VŠECHNO NAŠE MAPA UMÍ

• Více než 900 tipů na neokoukaná místa v Česku, která jsme pro vás osobně prozkoumali a vybrali
∙ Jednoduché vyhledávání podle kategorií (např. rozhledny, zříceniny, větrné mlýny, lomy apod.) a regionů
∙ Místa si můžete prohlížet na interaktivní mapě od Mapy.cz
∙ Nebo si je můžete procházet podle fotek
∙ Vaše oblíbená místa si můžete uložit do oblíbených
• Přidávejte si do navštívených místa, na kterých jste už byli
∙ Tipy na výlety s dětmi, kočárkem nebo psem
∙ Výlety pro vozíčkáře
∙ Informace o místech a vstupném
∙ Fotky od profesionálních českých fotografů
∙ Neustále vyrážíme na nová úžasná místa a přidáváme je do naší mapy a na náš Instagram

PROČ JSME MAPU VYTVOŘILI?

Za mapou úžasných míst stojím já (Krista) a moje mamka Eva. Společně vlastníme cestovatelskou komunitu Úžasná místa v Česku @uzasna.mista na Facebooku a Instagramu, kam přispíváme fotkami z našich výletů a z míst, která nám posílají naši fanoušci. 
Procestovaly jsme skoro 40 zemí světa, ale přesto jsme přesvědčené o tom, že u nás v Česku máme na malém území tolik úžasných míst, že můžeme leckteré turistické destinace hravě strčit do kapsy. 

Vybraly jsme pro vás s mámou více než 600 překrásných míst v Česku, která podle nás stojí za návštěvu. Velkou část z nich pravděpodobně nebudete znát, což byl náš záměr. Nechceme totiž posílat tisíce lidí jen na profláklá turistická místa, kde se to už teď hemží turisty. Našim cílem je dávat vám inspiraci na stovky neokoukaných míst a rozprostřít tak turismus po celé naší nádherné zemi. 

Doufáme, že si naší mapu a tipy na výlety užijete. 
Děkujeme moc za stažení!
Krista & Eva Audiovi
releaseNotes: Opravy chyb

title: Sephora - Make-up, Beauty
description:
Do your shopping on the Sephora app: have access to over 16,000 makeup, fragrance, beauty brands and much more! 
Benefit from numerous exclusive promotions, make-up and skincare tutorials on the app. You'll be able to book an appointment with an expert in one of our stores and share your experience with the Sephora beauty community! 

This is your chance to take advantage of the various features now available on the Sephora app.

*SHOP FOR YOUR BEAUTY PRODUCTS
- Access all our products and accessories. Some of our products are even available in preview on the app.

- Discover our wide range of products: perfume, cream, day cream, tonic lotion, nourishing oil, hair mask, matifying care, mascara, eyeshadow palettes, foundation, lipstick, lip gloss...

- Find your favorite cosmetic brands, fragrances and beauty tools like Huda Beauty, Too Faced, Benefit Cosmetics, Urban Decay, Fenty Beauty, Kat von D, Beauty Blender, Charlotte Tilbury, Rare Beauty,Yves Saint Laurent, Christian Dior, Gucci, Make Up Forever ,Clarins, Lancôme, Clinique, Estée Lauder, Givenchy, Guerlain, Kenzo, Paco Rabanne, Jo Malone London, Armani, Bobbi Brown, Marc Jacobs Beauty, Dyson, Kérastase, Sephora Collection...!
- You'll also find all the products from Sephora Collection, an inspiring and ever-evolving.

Don't miss out on the facial care products, including the anti-imperfection serum that will purify your face, the aloe vera hand masks, not forgetting the wide range of eyeshadow palettes.

- Use our WISHLIST feature to save your favorite beauty products and fragrances.
- Enjoy exclusive promotions on makeup, perfumes, nail polishes, skincare, beauty accessories...
- Take advantage of Click&Collect even on the app.
- Smooth, easy navigation for fast, stress-free shopping!
- Feel free to check out our special offers/deals category. You'll discover all our current offers for successful make-up in collaboration with superb brands. 
You'll also be able to take advantage of free products (miniatures) above a certain purchase amount.

*IN NEED OF INSPIRATION?
- Many beauty tutorials are available on the app.
- Find all our tips, tricks and makeup, skincare and haircare trends, for the perfect look.
- Take advantage of personalized recommendations during your shopping session on the Sephora app.

*DISCOVER OUR BEAUTY SERVICES EVEN IN STORE
- Find the nearest Sephora store to your location and everywhere else.
- Book an appointment at the makeup bar for a complete makeover or at the Benefit Brow bar for eyebrow waxing, eyebrow tinting or false eyelash application....
- Our cosmetics experts will take good care of you, and you can enjoy a personalized makeup session in-store according to your desires.

*EXPERIENCE SEPHORA WITH OUR BEAUTY BOARD
- Join our beauty community and share your reviews on the Sephora app.
- Get inspired by the trendy looks created by our community.
- Discover your favorite makeup products, fragrances, looks, treatments and beauty routines on the BEAUTY BOARD.
- Shop and share your different looks and new make-up routines with the community.

***

The team is always ready to pamper you.

Thank you for using the SEPHORA app!
releaseNotes:
In this new version, we've redesigned the display of promotions for your favorite products. We've also improved the application to make it more user-friendly.
To get the best experience, we recommend that you update your application regularly. We also thank you for your feedback and comments.
The Sephora mobile team
