title: PID Lítačka
description:
The PID Lítačka app allows you to have all the necessary information about your journey at your fingertips.

The PID Lítačka mobile app is a comprehensive guide to transport in Prague and the Central Bohemian Region. It enables you to find current public transport connections based on your location and also recommends the type of ticket you need for your journey. The app works with up-to-date data about closures, disruptions, and so on. If you wish to use the app for buying tickets regularly, you can create an account and have your tickets safely under control. You can store your payment card in the app and pay with a single click, or use Google/Apple Pay. The app allows you to purchase tickets in advance and activate them gradually before boarding a vehicle. Furthermore, you can purchase a subscription ticket (coupon) from 1 month up to 1 year directly in the app.

A new feature in PID Lítačka is the ability to pay for parking in paid parking zones throughout Prague. This new functionality allows you to store the license plates of your personal and company vehicles and pay for parking as easily and quickly as for a ticket.

The app can be used even without registration.

What else does the app offer?

-Check-in via the mobile app, or the possibility to use the mobile app as an identifier for long-term time tickets
-Find the fastest connection including closures and restrictions, and optimal tickets for your journeys
-Display a map of connections including navigation to the stop
-Display the status of your long-term coupon and your identifiers
-Buy tickets in advance with the option of later activation if necessary
-Forward an unactivated ticket to another person who can simply activate it themselves
-Purchase up to 10 tickets and activate multiple of them at once, for example for family and friends
-Display current departures from the stop, including delays
-Show an overview of nearby stops, passing lines, ticket sales locations
-Display a map of P+R parking lots and their occupancy
-Browse current closures, disruptions, or news in transport
-Monitor the status of barrier-free facilities
-Ability to pay for parking in paid parking zones throughout Prague
-The option to use Google/Apple Pay for payment, or click to pay
releaseNotes:
* Visual notification of a 2-minute activation period in the ticket hopper in case of at least one unused ticket
* You can now share routes in the calendar or, for example, in an SMS
* Added user feedback on the app in the "More" section
* In the "Advanced" section, you can now find information in the connection details about whether the connection is air-conditioned
reviews:
This app let me plan each of our in-town and day trips simply. I could buy tickets on the fly or plan our route the night before. With tickets in hand, I always knew what stop or platform to go to. | Agree with others: easy to use, mapping a route provides cost and link to pay, Apple Pay enabled. One of the best transportation apps I’ve used. | Twice now I have tried to create an account. I signed up with one email and a message said I’d be getting a verification email. I have been checking for over 24 hours and there is no email. So I then tried a different email and still no verification email ever came. Update: the emails all went to my spam. That hasn’t happened in forever, therefore I attribute it to whatever is in the origin of the email sender. | Should be an instance for everyone else! | I was only in Prague for a few days but this app worked very well, the design and user interface was excellent, it was easy to use and figure out, each ticker gives you a bar code but we never got stopped so not sure if that works for the police. One thing to note is when you buy tickets on the app you need to wait 2 minutes after you activate before it becomes valid so buy tickets before you get on | Not a bad app, but the two minutes to activate is a major issue. The inspectors come and will fine you with as little as 10 seconds left before it activates, and since they can check whomever they want, they often target women, especially those riding alone. I just ended up buying the year pass, but for people who ride only once or twice, the two minutes is a huge pain. Either you get on before your ticket activates and hope, or you activate it before the bus/tram/metro even arrives—cutting into the amount of time you’ve paid to be allowed to travel. And if the bus is late, and so your ticket expires before you reach your destination? That’s a fine, too. Major design flaw! | Does exactly what it’s supposed to. Always very easy to use! | Everything I needed for public transport in Prague. It was super easy to register and pay via Apple Pay. | I enabled alert for “Exceptions” and found it was too many notifications. I disabled it within the app but still receive alerts. 

Otherwise, for purchasing lowest-price tickets I find it is the most useful app, even for long trips outside of Prague. | Every time I search for a connection and press "Search", it instead searches for the most recent connection from my search history. This bug has been there for months, there's no way to report it from the app, so obviously the developer doesn't care at all about their user experience. I'm switching to pubtran. | I was just about to buy two tickets on my phone and found out that only one has been purchased. I wanted to purchase another one for my wife and got an error, even though money was deducted from my account!
What do I do when an inspection comes?! | Terrible that the app doesn’t notify when you pass expires. This cost me CZK824 in fines. 

The app is very poor indeed and they refuse to reimbursement for their design flaw. 

No Apple Wallet integration. 

App redirects you to the crappy website so you have to login to a website within an app. | You can’t buy tickets with iOS 13 as your OS. The tickets do not show up so I was forced to buy a paper ticket. | Is this app not compatible with iOS 13? I am not able to buy any tickets, the screen to buy just says “ticket selection could not be loaded”. My wife’s phone had no problem on iOS 12. | Great app. Clear navigation options, accurate timetables and with Apple Pay integration, makes it super easy to purchase tickets. Other translation apps take notice! | Must have, works perfectly fine. It has all the live updates that you need. | It is decent enough when it functions properly, but in 90% of the time you'll see a message saying "At this moment there is no connection for the data entered."

And you'll need to click the 'search' button again and again and again in order to see the results. | Aplikace jako taková je celkem povedená, ale velmi často v ní dochází k této chybě: "Pro zadané hodnoty v tuto chvíli neexistuje žádné spojení." K této chybě dochází nezávisle na zadaných hodnotách a dochází k ní i na dobrém připojení, např. na 4G nebo WiFi. Pokud hledání např. pětkrát zopakuji, tak se většinou nakonec najde. K této chybě nedochází vždy, ale zhruba při polovině pokusů. Asi jde o přetížené servery nebo něco podobného.

Další chyba není tak závažná, ale je taky otravná: Když třeba omylem kliknu na zadání času odjezdu, tak se vybere nějaký konkrétní čas a už to nijak nejde vrátit na "teď". Jediná možnost je aplikaci shodit a znovu zapnout. | Skvělá aplikace bez reklam, jízdní rady včetně schémat PID a jednoduchého nákupu. Ma anglickou i německou verzi. Super. | Aplikace je v současnosti dobrá jen na kupování jízdenek. Vyhledat spojení a další funkce nefungují. Uvítala bych možnost i zjistit zastávkové jízdní řády. A neškodila by možnost zakoupení 1/2 denní nebo jednodenní sms jízdenky. | Coming first-hand from the Prague Public Transport Co., this is, hands down, the best public transport app for Prague. Take it from a local.

title: Action
description:
Met de Action app heb je nu 24/7 toegang tot al het leuks waar je normaal gesproken voor naar de Action winkel gaat. Je bent als eerste op de hoogte van de laatste weekacties en de nieuwste producten. Zie je iets leuks of iets dat je nodig hebt? Voeg het dan meteen toe aan je favorieten! Zo vergeet je nooit meer een boodschap. Dit wil je natuurlijk niet missen. Download snel de app en laat je verrassen door de vele leuke en handige mogelijkheden!
 
* Alles van Action altijd bij de hand  Met de Action app blijf je op de hoogte van al het verrassende dat je van Action gewend bent. Je ontvangt als eerste de beste weekacties, nieuwste producten en het laatste nieuws.

* Verrassende artikelen, speciaal voor jou geselecteerd Geef in de app je interesses aan en Action toont je de producten die het beste bij jou passen.

* Stel een lijst samen van al je favoriete producten Met zó veel verassende producten vergeet je soms welke je ook alweer wilde hebben. Voeg ze toe aan je favorieten. Zo vergeet je nooit meer een boodschap! En het mooie is dat je je favorieten op elk van je apparaten kunt bekijken.

* Gebruik de handige productscanner voor meer info Wil je meer informatie over een artikel? Met de app maak je van je telefoon in mum van tijd een scanner. Zo zie je in de winkel (of thuis) precies wat je wilt weten.

* Al je kassabonnen digitaal én op één plek Al je Action kassabonnen vind je nu netjes bij elkaar in de app. Scan je digitale klantenkaart wanneer je wat koopt in de winkel en de digitale bon verschijnt automatisch in de app.

Laat je inspireren door 6000+ artikelen
Scrol op je gemak door de app en laat je verrassen door de meer dan 6000 artikelen die Action je dagelijks te bieden heeft. Er is zo veel dat je gewoon niet uitgekeken raakt!
releaseNotes: In deze versie hebben we wederom een aantal verbeteringen doorgevoerd, waarmee we de stabiliteit van de app verder willen verbeteren. Veel plezier! Heb je vragen of feedback? Mail ons dan gerust op consumerapp@action.com

title: Survivor CS
description: Stáhni si aplikaci a sleduj všechno na jednom místě. Statistiky soutěžících, bonusový obsah a hlasování. Aplikace Survivor CS vás vtáhne do centra veškerého dění na ostrově. Co si myslí Ondřej Novotný o hře soutěžících? Kdo má největší šanci na výhru 2 500 000 korun? Záběry, které se nevešly do epizody, rozhovory, ukázky. Svět nejznámější reality show světa v jedné ikoně.

title: Sinsay - shopping online
description:
Ready for more benefits? Buy clothes, home decor and cosmetics even more conveniently! Clothes for ladies, clothes for children and babies, toys and men's fashion - all in one app. Special deals and discounts available only in the Sinsay app are waiting just for you.

From now on, you can create convenient lists of your favorite products. Thanks to the label scanning feature, you can quickly buy the desired model from within the app or check the availability of the product in another Sinsay store.

Easily transfer liked products to the shopping cart, which can now be accessed from any of your devices.

Looking for something specific? Use product filtering and find exactly what you need.

Want to locate the nearest store? You'll find it using a handy search engine; You can add your billing information and shipping addresses in the profile management field.

Was your shopping experience a success? Share it with your friends - share products on social media directly from within the app.

The Sinsay app will make your shopping a breeze.  Is your closet empty? The newest fashion for women and men as well as children's clothing at great prices are waiting for you! Or maybe you need to transform your interior? Discover decorations for the living room, kitchen accessories, bathroom accessories and other home extras! Is it time to add to your makeup bag? It doesn't get any easier - makeup products, hand lotions and other beauty products are also available at our stores!

Download the Sinsay app and enjoy even lower prices.

We value your opinion!
Explore our social media profiles:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Sinsay.BG/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sinsay/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@sinsay

Rate our app by leaving a review!
releaseNotes:
Attention! The latest version of the application is already available and includes:
- we have introduced the necessary optimizations and fixes to make using the application even more pleasant and convenient

Thank you for being with us!

title: Zalando – fashion & clothing
description:
Shop the latest fashion trends on Zalando.

We are Europe’s biggest online retailer - explore clothing, shoes, accessories, sportswear and much more. Our selection of fashion ranges from popular brands to sought-after designer labels. This combined with free returns, makes Zalando a one-stop, convenient shopping experience.

••• Style that’s as unique as you •••
- Explore options with a focus on sustainability
- Follow fashion experts to see how they style their outfits
- Follow brands to see more from them first, including new items and collections

••• Get inspired and never miss a trend •••
- Stay up to date with news and trends from fashion experts and brands
- Discover collections and lines from a wide range of designer brands
- Stay up to date with sales, discounts, promotions and discount codes

••• Fashion pieces for every style •••
- Wide range of affordable and designer fashion: trendy dresses, t-shirts, shirts, skirts, jackets, jeans and much more for all occasions
- Selection of the latest shoes from popular brands: sandals, heels, boots, casual shoes, sneakers and many more for women, men and kids
- Fashion accessories for every style: handbags, backpacks, jewelry, hats, scarves, watches, smartwatches, textile masks and more

••• Simple and safe shopping •••
- Free returns so you can try your look on at home first
- A variety of choices and easy ways to pay

••• We love hearing from you •••
- Stay in touch and connect with us on Facebook: facebook.com/zalando
- Show us your unique style on Instagram: instagram.com/zalando
- Get inspired by our must-have collections and trending pieces on Pinterest: pinterest.com/zalandouk

Let us know what you think about the App by leaving a review or writing to us at ios@zalando.de

App permissions
- Identity: Necessary to send you personalized notifications for vouchers, sale alerts and much more.
- Photos/Media/Files: Necessary to load product images faster. Zalando will not have access to your private photos or data.
- Camera: Necessary to use the photo search and barcode scanner functionalities.

You may not use or make any purchases via the Zalando FashionStore App (the “App”) outside of the countries in which Zalando operates and which are presented as choices for you on the App (such countries, the “Permitted Areas”). To make a purchase on the App, you must be physically located within a Permitted Area and provide a delivery address or pickup address and billing address within a Permitted Area. Further, even if you place an order for delivery or pickup in your area, you are prohibited from changing the delivery or pickup address, as well as your billing address, to an address outside of a Permitted Area. By using the App, you expressly agree that no sales via the App are permitted outside of the Permitted Areas and that you will not use or attempt to use the App to make any purchases outside of the Permitted Areas. 

ZALANDO MAKES NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES, AND EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS ALL REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, THAT THE APP IS APPROPRIATE OR AVAILABLE FOR USE IN OTHER LOCATIONS OUTSIDE OF THE PERMITTED AREAS. Those who access or use the App from other jurisdictions do so at their own volition and are entirely responsible for compliance with all applicable local laws and regulations.  Unless otherwise explicitly stated, all materials found on the App are solely directed to individuals located in the Permitted Areas.

By using the App, you agree and consent to have your personal data collected, used, transferred to and processed in accordance with the laws of the Permitted Area and our Privacy Notice.  If you do not agree to the collection of your data in accordance with the laws of the Permitted Area and our Privacy Notice, you must stop using the App immediately.
releaseNotes: Welcome to our app! We work hard to enhance your shopping joy. Bug fixes and performance boosts make your experience even smoother. Happy shopping!

title: Moje O2
description:
Mějte své služby od O2 plně pod kontrolou a navíc vždy při sobě. S aplikací Moje O2 si jednoduše, online a zdarma můžete spravovat své služby, získáte neustálý přehled o čerpání vašich dat, volání nebo SMS zprávách. V aplikaci si můžete na pár kliknutí aktivovat doplňkové služby, například Chytré cestovní pojištění, které se vždy samo zapne, když jste v roamingové zóně nebo si můžete třeba dokoupit chybějící data. Do aplikace se můžete přihlašovat pomocí otisku prstu, Face ID, zadáním uživatelského jména a hesla nebo jednorázovým přihlášením.

Budete vždy v obraze
Zapněte si mobilní oznámení a my vás budeme pravidelně informovat o novinkách

Co v aplikaci Moje O2 najdete?
- rychlý přístup ke všem vašim službám a vyúčtování
- dokup dat na pár kliknutí
- nastavení roamingu
- jednoduché nastavení doplňkových služeb
- možnost změny tarifu
- rychlou a bezpečnou platbu kartou
- dobití kreditu pro zákazníky s předplacenými tarify
- pravidelné soutěže a speciální nabídky slev
- seznam nejbližších prodejen
- propojení na další aplikace O2

V jednoduchosti je krása
Naši aplikaci Moje O2 děláme jednoduchou a přehlednou, aby se vám jednoduše a rychle ovládala. Aplikaci si můžete přepnout do oblíbeného tmavého režimu. Umí anglicky a ukrajinsky.

Je určena pro všechny zákazníky O2, včetně firemních i pro zákazníky O2 Family.
releaseNotes:
Nová verze aplikace Vám přináší:
- novou sekci Zprávy
- drobné úpravy a grafická vylepšení
Vaše O2

title: Disney+
description:
Bring home a world of endless entertainment with Disney+, bringing you the latest releases from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, National Geographic and more.
 
Stream must-see Originals like The Mandalorian, Loki and The Bear, blockbusters like Encanto, Avatar and Guardians of the Galaxy as well as binge-worthy series like The Simpsons, Criminal Minds and Modern Family.
 
With Disney+, you'll enjoy:
• Brand new Originals, blockbusters and epic series added frequently
• Personalised recommendations based on your viewing preferences
• Robust parental controls for family-friendly viewing
• No hidden costs and the ability to cancel at any time*
 
For help with Disney+, please visit: http://help.disneyplus.com. 
For our Subscriber Agreement and other policies, please visit: https://disneyplus.com/legal/subscriber-agreement 
*Effective at the end of the billing period. 
The content available on Disney+ may vary by region.
Some titles shown above may not be available in your country.
releaseNotes: This new version of Disney+ includes updates and fixes to help deliver an improved streaming experience across devices.

title: Seznam.cz
description:
S aplikací Seznam.cz máte celý Seznam v kapse.
Při prohlížení internetových stránek stačí kdykoli kliknout na „esko“ a jste zpět na hlavní stránce Seznamu. Ta je přizpůsobená aplikaci, takže její ovládání je pohodlné a přehledné.

EMAIL V APLIKACI 
- Vyřiďte jednoduše všechny zprávy, aplikace vás navíc upozorní na ty nové. 

VLASTNÍ PŘEHRÁVAČ
-  Poslouchejte všechny podcasty z Podcasty.cz bez přerušení nebo si je stáhněte offline. 

PŘEKLADAČ
-  Také vám přeloží cizí slovíčka i celé stránky a včas vás varuje před nebezpečnými weby díky spolupráci s předními českými bankami a ČOI.

HRY 
- A když se budete zrovna nudit, zabaví vás solitaire či sudoku. 

UKLÁDÁNÍ STRÁNEK 
- Používané stránky si můžete označit jako oblíbené a ty, které nestihnete dočíst, si snadno uložíte na později.

SYNCHRONIZACE 
- Díky synchronizaci účtu budete mít navíc všechna hesla, záložky nebo otevřené panely k dispozici na všech svých zařízeních.
releaseNotes: Zlepšili jsme stabilitu aplikace, kdy mohlo docházet k pádu aplikace.

title: HBO Max: Stream TV & Movies
description:
HBO Max is a streaming app that combines all of HBO with even more must-see TV series, blockbuster movies, and exclusive Max Originals.

With unlimited access to thousands of hours of entertainment, we’ve got something for everyone in your family—from award-winning shows and movies to fan favorites from DC and animation for every generation. Settle in and find your next binge-watch.

Here’s what’s waiting for you:
• All of HBO with even more critically-acclaimed movies, groundbreaking TV series, and all-new Max Originals.
• Curated collections hand-picked by our editorial experts—not robots.
• One-of-a-kind kids experience with flexible parental controls.
• HBO Max Hubs devoted to beloved brands including Warner Bros., the Cartoon Network Collection, DC, and more.
• Download episodes and movies to your phone or tablet to watch offline, anytime.
• Up to five viewer profiles with customizable profile images.

Content and feature availability on HBO Max may vary by region. Some titles and features shown above may not be available in your country.

Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. Your iTunes will automatically be charged at the same price for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period. You can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.

Purposes disclosed in the App Privacy label may vary based on features or services that may not be available in all regions.

HBO Max is only accessible in certain territories.

For help, please visit help.HBOMax.com.

Privacy Policy: https://www.hbomax.com/privacy
Terms of Use: https://www.hbomax.com/terms-of-use
releaseNotes: Mostly bug fixes and performance improvements this time. Keep your app updated to enjoy the best streaming experience.

title: Captions: For Talking Videos
description:
MEET CAPTIONS APP, THE AI POWERED CREATIVE STUDIO 

Captions harnesses artificial intelligence to allow anyone, anywhere to produce studio-quality videos from their iPhone with just a few taps. Use Captions to support every part of the video creation process, from scripting and recording, to editing and sharing. 

TOP FEATURES TO FUEL YOUR SUCCESS 

Automatically generate the most accurate captions and subtitles for portrait, vertical, square, and landscape video formats in over 25 languages.

Generate compelling scripts in seconds using AI technology, which seamlessly integrates into our Teleprompter feature.

Use the Teleprompter with any camera app, allowing you to deliver your key messages as effectively as possible.


Use our AI Eye Contact feature to correct your eye contact and make it appear as if you’re looking directly at the camera, even if you’re reading from a script.


Edit your videos faster with AI Edit which can add automatic jump cuts, images, emphasis, emojis, and more — all with one tap.


Expand your reach with Autodub and translate your exact voice into another language. Remove language barriers! 


Simplify your posting process with AI-generated video titles, descriptions, and hashtags, all automatically provided by our app.


Export your transcript text in SRT format or seamlessly integrate it into any other app or platform.

Experience stunning 4K and HDR support for the highest-quality videos.

Easily share your creations on popular platforms such as Instagram Reels, TikTok, YouTube, YouTube Shorts, Twitter, or directly to your photo library.


THE MOST ACCURATE AUTOMATIC CAPTIONS AVAILABLE 


Powered by cutting-edge speech recognition technology, the app also allows users to add eye-catching dynamic word-by-word captions (video subtitles) using Whisper speech-to-text by OpenAI – the world's most powerful speech-to-text engine.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR CONTENT

With Captions, you have the freedom to choose from a wide range of captivating caption styles. You can also upload your favorite fonts directly to the app. 

IGNITE YOUR ENGAGEMENT

Don't let your videos go unnoticed! Boost your engagement within seconds by adding dynamic captions. Research shows that 85% of viewers prefer to watch videos without sound. By incorporating captions, you ensure that your message will be effectively communicated to the maximum number of potential viewers.

IMPROVE YOUR CONTENT’S ACCESSIBILITY

Captions also play a crucial role in making your videos more accessible. With over 6% of the world's population experiencing some degree of hearing loss, it's essential to prioritize inclusivity with your content. By adding captions, you enable individuals with hearing impairments to fully enjoy and engage with your content.


Captions offers creators the easiest way to create and edit content, simplifying the creation process so one doesn't get lost in the weeds. Try it today and see the difference it can make. Download now!

Terms of Use: https://captions.ai/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.captions.ai/privacy/policy
releaseNotes: bug fixes and improvements

title: KFC CZ
description:
Crunchy chicken goodness at your fingertips!

KFC CZ application contains all the necessary functionality for fans of delicious chicken specialities in the Czech Republic.

- You can find the nearest restaurant and all the important info
- You can check the restaurant menu
- You can directly order KFC Delivery service in the Czech Republic
- You can order&pickup into your favourite KFC restaurant in the Czech Republic
- You can use special coupons and limited offers for KFC Delivery service in the Czech Republic
releaseNotes: In the new version we have fixed some bugs and made some improvements.

title: George Česko
description:
Want to have control over your money no matter where you are? Create a Standard or Plus account in mobile George and join 2 million clients taking care of their financial health with us. With George you get an overview of your income and expenses, change your card limit, get into the world of investments, arrange travel insurance, or save money with the Moneyback discount program! Logging to George and payment authorizations are quick with a Touch ID or Face ID, or you can choose another convenient method of security

 
Be always informed 
· Want to know when your paycheck arrives or a standing order goes out? Set up mobile notifications, and you won't miss a thing! If you exceed your set limit when paying by card online, you'll get an alert message providing you with advice on where you can adjust the limit to your needs at the moment. 

 
Safety first 
· With George, you have many ways to keep your finances under control. 

· Do you want to pay in a foreign e-shop and be sure everything goes smoothly? Adjust your card payment limit or create a one-time or permanent virtual card with its own limit. The one-time card is cancelled right after payment, max within one hour. 

· If you lose your payment card, you can block it instantly in the app and immediately request a new one. 

· Forgot your card PIN? No problem. George will happily tell you. With George, you can also quickly and easily withdraw cash from an ATM using a QR code, without touching the ATM or pulling out your card. Fast, hygienic, and safe. 

· Login to George and payment authorizations can be confirmed biometrically, by Touch ID or Face ID. 


Easy payments 
· Whether you need to send a payment to a friend or send money abroad, George makes it easy. 

· Payments to all domestic banks that, like us, allow instant payments, are sent to the recipient's account within seconds. 

· Pay quickly and error-free by scanning the QR code on any invoice or payment slip. You can even set up a standing order in just a few seconds using a QR code. 

· Need to get paid by someone? No problem. With George, you generate a QR code, share it with the other party, and they can send you a payment instantly. 

· Made a mistake and sent money to the wrong account number? We all make mistakes, but George will help you out. Just click a button right by the transaction to ask for help, fill in a few details, and George will take care of the request for you, for free, and you don't even have to go to the branch. 

· Like to pay with your mobile or watch? Add your card to Apple Pay straight from George. And your Apple watch as well. 

 
Save with George 
· Pay with your card online and at retailers and get some of your purchase money back (so-called Moneyback). Offers change regularly, so don't forget to check them from time to time in your George. 

 
Easy investing 
· Don't like to see your money lose value due to inflation? Check out what we offer in terms of securities and check out the graphs showing their performance over time. Found something appealing? Great! You can conveniently purchase selected securities right from your George. 


Online product arranging 
· Want to apply for a credit card or travel insurance from your bed? Absolutely! Even contract signing can be done remotely. You'll find everything easily in the George Store, from housing to business. 

 
We care about your financial health 
· We're the only Czech Bank that cares about your financial health. With George, you'll get ideas on how to look forward to a carefree retirement with sufficient funds. It checks if you're eligible for any state subsidies, helps you set up a savings plan, and build a financial reserve. Advice on how much you can save on housing, compares energy prices, and offers free financial coaching. 

And that's, of course, not everything. Download the app and discover what else George can do. It’s here simply to make your life easier. And it’s always learning new things. 

Yours Česká spořitelna
releaseNotes:
For quicker orientation, you can find the contract number of all your insurance policies directly in the George overview without a single click. For the Round Up Savings feature, now you will see the deferred amount directly next to the transaction it belongs to. What's more, you can also arrange car insurance along with your single trip insurance, saving you complications. We hope you like the news.

Your Česká spořitelna

title: Discord - Chat, Talk & Hangout
description:
Discord is where you can make a home for your communities and friends. Where you can stay close and have fun over text, voice, and video chat. Whether you’re part of a school club, a gaming group, a worldwide art community, or just a handful of friends who want to spend time together, Discord makes it easy to talk every day, and hang out more often.

CREATE AN INVITE-ONLY PLACE
•  Discord servers are organized into topic-based channels where you can collaborate, share, have meetings, or just talk to friends about your day without clogging up a group chat.
•  Send a message directly to a friend or call them up with our voice chat feature
•  Voice channels make hanging out easy. Got a free moment? Grab a seat in a voice channel so friends can see you’re around and pop in to talk without having to call. You can even watch videos together!
•  Reliable tech for staying close with friends. Low-latency voice and video chat feels like you’re meeting in the same room.
•  Easily talk with friends while gaming and steam roll the competition.
•  Be a meme messenger with easy image sharing
 
STAY CLOSE WITH TEXT, VIDEO, AND VOICE CHAT
•  Wave hello over video, watch friends stream their games, share stories over voice calls, or gather up and have a drawing session with screen share.
•  Snap a photo and turn it into your own custom emojis and share them with friends.
•  Share anything from funny videos and stories to your latest group photos, and pin your favorites to remember those moments later.
•  Hang out in group channels or talk privately with direct messages
•  Zoom through convos with friends using topic-specific channels!
 
FOR A FEW OR A FANDOM
•  Custom moderation tools and permission levels can group up your friends or teams, organize meetings for your local book club, or bring together music fans from around the world.
•  Create moderators, give special members access to private channels, and much more.
releaseNotes: We’ve been hard at work making Discord better for you. This includes bug fixes and performance enhancements. For more detailed information, go to your profile in the app and scroll down to “What’s New”.

Works fine on iphone, android and PC though… | I don’t give a $h!t about some stupid poll option, move the camera option back out of the photos so I can send them easier. | It’s an amazing app however my screen sharing doesn’t work anymore and I can’t seem to fix it at all | I’ve used discord for a few years and it always worked fine for me. I really enjoy it. Ever since the new UI update changed things around, my app on my phone has been incredibly buggy. It’s slower when switching between servers and messages. Whenever I’m in a call with someone, sometimes I can’t send messages. The entire keyboard disappears. Whenever an alarm goes off or I mute myself and then unmute myself, my discord audio just stops working. I am having to constantly close the app and restart it to get it to work now. I am not the only one having these issues, I’ve spoken to other people that also have these issues. Both on android and iphone. I’ve been waiting on them to fix these issues but it hasn’t happened yet so I figured I would write a review to let you know these things are happening. I love this app, please bring it back to being useable.

Edit: I keep my app regularly updated. It’s your fault discord, not mine. | Been a member of discord for 4 years haven’t had any issues but recently when me and my girlfriend get into a call, we cannot hear each other whatsoever. We’ve tried multiple things to fix it and found no success. If this problem wasn’t affecting us I would give discord 5 stars, I haven’t had an issues with it until now. | Discord is a great application to talk to your friends and make friends in different servers and the nitro features are also really good but today i bought the nitro subscription again but i didn’t got it if a discord administrator reading this please give me a refund or the nitro | I use discord on iPad and it has been unusably buggy with no signs of improvement, only getting worse, for over a MONTH. Every new update only adds more bugs and doesn’t fix any old ones. I am unable to properly select channels, the whole application randomly goes dark when I click on a different server, and (extremely disappointing as a nitro user) I am unable to select all the emojis from a server—I only have a limited list that seems to be selected at random. I am sick of discord’s terrible customer service and worsening quality. | this app is horrible , like banning someone for not having no money is crazy . | I often get lost in bigger servers, (especially roleplay servers) because the highlight thing stays stuck on the first channel I click, and when I click on other channels it doesn’t appear. | Buggy it’s glitches out servers making it look like nothing is there fix the problem please. | I’m trying to sign up but when it sends me my verification code it says a user already has the code | iOS 17.4, iPhone 15 Pro, can’t hear voice room’s sound, I tried rebooting my phone, checking if I accidentally open deafen mode, checking if Discord has enough permission form iPhone, checking if it’s my Bluetooth headphone’s problem, but nothing worked, so maybe it’s a incompatible problem? | They make a lot of unnecessary updates that can sometimes break the app.

Recently, about three updates ago and that hasn’t been changed: Gifs and videos posted in app no longer move or play while in a Discord call. This seems to only be an issue on the Mobile app, or on the Mobile iOS app. This can be extremely frustrating as I’m often in a call with my friends when they send certain gifs or videos that they’d like me to react to!

On top of that, they removed a feature where you could use emojis from a server you aren’t apart of if you have Nitro. This was a nice, quality feature for everyone. I’ve only seen disscontempt for the change and I share it as well, I add and make my own emojis and stickers for for my group chat. If anyone they send those emojis and stickers too sees that and likes them. I’m completely okay with them using those emojis and stickers! I’d rather that person enjoy my creations rather than have a silent random in my group chat that doesn’t wanna be there but is forced to just to be able to use my emojis/stickers!

Also. After the big update recently. Forcing a huge square to be present on the screen in mobile version while in the call, even if screenshare isn’t on; is extremely ugly and gets in the way a lot. I constantly have to move it around, accidentally press it when I’m trying to do something else, and find myself always repositioning it in odd positions when I want to take a screenshot :(

Besides these three issues, Discord seems to be on the up! Calls rarely ever drop anymore like they used to and I don’t find myself having many issues with it!

I truly love Discord. I don’t mean to be harsh. But these three things are important! And I want nothing but to see discord thrive! | I am a YouTuber and I use discord to talk to my friends, but no screen recorder can record a call while I am playing a game, when I talk to them about this issue, they say that it’s because discord doesn’t allow outside things from recording calls to be replayed, is this possible for you people to fix? If not, can you make a screen record option during a call so I can edit it together or something? It’s annoying.. but the app is overall good. | I had my account disabled and despite contacting support repeatedly, they have not responded in over 3 weeks. Only get bot replies, can’t get through to a human. | The app opens dodgy links randomly from OFF-SCREEN without any clicks, user interaction, or prompt. This behavior is extremely dangerous. FIX IT NOW.

title: Bageterie Boulevard
description:
Máš hlad? Honí tě mlsná? Lednička je daleko? Sporák není tvůj parťák? Nevadí. Objednávej svoje oblíbené jídlo z Bageterie Boulevard jednoduše a rychle přímo ze svého telefonu.

V několika málo krocích, pohodlně a přehledně. S rozvozem nebo k vyzvednutí na pobočce. Je to na tobě.
releaseNotes: Tato verze aplikace obsahuje opravy drobných chyb a vylepšení přispívajících k lepšímu uživatelskému zážitku. Děkujeme vám za vaši podporu a cennou zpětnou vazbu, která nám pomáhá neustále zlepšovat naši aplikaci.
reviews: How is it possible that there’s no way to specialize sandwiches? You can only choose the bread type, but can’t say “no onions” or anything like that. It makes the app useless for me. It’s possible in the restaurants on the machines, but not the app? Absurd.

title: ROSSMANN CLUB
description:
Stáhněte si rozšířenou aplikaci ROSSMANN a zapojte se do věrnostního klubu. Jako člen věrnostního programu ROSSMANN CLUB získáte spousty slev a výhod. Sbírejte body za nákupy a vyměňte je za kupony s exkluzivními bonusy. Veškeré své výhody a slevy uplatněte i při nákupech online. V eshopu ROSSMANN CLUB naleznete své oblíbené produkty v přehledně rozřazené dle kategorií.
Díky ROSSMANN CLUB výhodám CLUB se už v nakupování Vašich oblíbených produktů omezovat nemusíte.

Získejte zákaznickou kartu v mobilu a s ní i speciální slevy a bonusy:

- Jako člen ROSSMANN CLUBu získáte uvítací kupon s 20% slevou za registraci, věrnostní kupon a také narozeninový kupon
- Využijte slevy z dětského programu Rossmánek
- Mějte přehled o aktuálních slevách z letáku
- Inspirujte se ROSSMANN tipy na líčení a trendy zdravého životního stylu
- Informace o všech prodejnách ROSSMANN máte vždy po ruce
- Kartu v aplikaci můžete využít i bez připojení k internetu
- Své nákupy online vyřídíte pohodlně kdykoliv a odkudkoliv
- Online nákupy k vyzvednutí na zvolené prodejně už do 60 minut, nebo s doručením na Vámi zadanou adresu
releaseNotes:
V této verzi přinášíme:
• drobné změny a opravy

title: ShortTV - Watch Dramas & Shows
description:
Welcome to the Exciting World of ShortTV - your personal hub for all kinds of engaging Short Dramas!

Step into the realm of ShortTV, where an array of engaging short dramas and movies awaits your exploration. Immerse yourself in a diverse range of episodes and elevate your drama experience to new heights.

Indulge in a Tapestry of Genres
With ShortTV, you'll relish an assortment of genres spanning drama, romance, suspense, and thrilling mysteries. Embark on time-travel adventures, unravel enigmatic cases, or get swept away in the fantasy of romance with a pretend billionaire. Our collection of stories is as vast as your imagination!

Lose Yourself in Miniature Dramas
In just minutes, you'll be completely absorbed in these enthralling short narratives, igniting your passion for drama like never before.

Unveiling Exclusive Selection
ShortTV proudly presents a meticulously curated assortment of short plays. Each episode is carefully crafted, brimming with creativity, emotion, and depth, designed to transport you effortlessly into a multitude of imaginative realms.

Here's What Awaits You on ShortTV:

- An Array of Genres
  From inspirational comebacks to enigmatic time-travel adventures, from the allure of ancient tales to modern love stories, ShortTV caters to every drama preference you desire.
- Tailored Recommendations
  Our smart recommendation system ensures you easily find shows tailored to your tastes.
- Effortless Viewing Experience
  With each short drama lasting just minutes, you can seamlessly enjoy them during your commute, breaks, or moments of leisure.
- Exclusive Original Content
  Engage with bite-sized, drama-packed original shows that will keep you coming back for more. The entertainment never stops!
- Always Fresh
  Stay up-to-date with real-time updates, ensuring a steady stream of the hottest short dramas and movies. Discover new favorites every week!
- Your One-Stop Platform
  ShortTV simplifies your viewing journey by providing a unified platform, eliminating the inconvenience of switching between sources.
- Visual Brilliance
  Delight in high-definition visuals that capture every detail, creating an immersive feast for your eyes.

Embrace ShortTV as your gateway to the world of short dramas and movies, where limitless possibilities await. Download now and embark on an exhilarating journey through a universe of captivating short dramas, immersing yourself in the drama-watching experience!

Your use of this application is governed by the Terms of Service available at https://www.shorttv.live/terms-of-service.html
Collection and use of your data are subject to the Privacy Policy available at https://www.shorttv.live/privacy-policy.html

2. Optimize user experience and fix bugs.

title: Můj T-Mobile
description:
All you need from T-Mobile in one app. Available anytime & anywhere.

Why it's good to have our app:

-	You can see information about your current spending, how many free minutes, SMS and data you have left. Top-up data is easy in our app.
-	Manage all your T-Mobile services in one app.
-	Pay your bills - without charges, within minutes and safely.
-	Top up Twist credit quickly and with bonus credit for calls, texts and data. Not only to yourself, but also to your loved ones.
-	Take your chance in regular contests or use one of our special offers.

Other useful tips how to use our app

- Add more T-Mobile numbers to your app
- All of your services in Magenta 1 are put together in the app overview and you can easily distribute shared data between numbers in Magenta 1.
- You can also easily change the tariff, extend the contract or purchase a new phone.
- Receive notifications. We will remind you that you have a new bill, or let you know what's new in the app.
- View your bill history. You can also download them in PDF. You can pay your bills to yourself or anyone else. Check the online list of services to see in detail what you pay for.
- The application will log you in automatically when you are connected via our data network. If you are dating over WiFi, you can use a one-time login using a PIN that you will receive by SMS to your mobile phone.
Help & Support.  This is a section to help you find answers to frequently asked questions.
releaseNotes: - small bug fixes
reviews:
The mandatory updates every one/few months with 270MB download size are just ridiculous. Especially for an app that IMHO does not have any added value over a simple website with the same functionality. The “best” is when you run out of data and need to get more and find out the app needs to be updated. At least the mandatory updates should be once a year at most.
The app works (hence the two stars), but seems unnecessary. | Good | Just give me free stuff. | 👍 all good, works | Vždy se vše podaří najít a vyřešit, funkční aplikace | Not enough content gets localized. | The app is extremely easy to navigate and also helpful in terms quick access of bill payments | Ios 12 not supported anymore? Why, pls?

title: My Air CZ
description:
Aplikace My Air vám přináší mobilní bankovnictví Air Bank a chystá pro vás nové nápady. Ty jsou nyní ještě v dílně, už teď si ale můžete užívat vyladěné bankovnictví.

Stačí například mrknout na úvodní obrazovku aplikace s Chytrým přehledem a hned vidíte, kolik máte na běžném i spořicím účtu nebo jak to vypadá s půjčkou. 

Limity plateb změníte díky aplikaci pohodlně třeba ve frontě u pokladny. Peníze pak odešlete i prostým ofocením QR kódu. Aplikaci si ale oblíbíte i kvůli možnosti potvrzovat platby v internetovém bankovnictví pouhým dotykem. A jestli jste zvědaví, budou se vám líbit oznámení o zůstatku. Když budete chtít, aplikace vám pošle oznámení o všem, co se na Vašem účtu šustne.  

Ztratíte občas účtenku? Pak budete velebit náš Šanon, díky kterému můžete všechny důležité účtenky a faktury ukládat do svého internetového bankovnictví a kdykoliv je máte po ruce.

Ale co si o naší aplikaci jen číst. Tisíckrát lepší je, stáhnout si ji a vyzkoušet. Ať vám dobře slouží.
releaseNotes: V nové verzi jsme upravili detail platby tak, aby pro vás byl přehlednější. Vše důležité v něm uvidíte na první dobrou. Aplikaci jsme také přichystali na překvapivou investiční novinku. Ta se na vašich displejích objeví v druhé půlce března.

title: YouTube Music
description:
Connecting you to the world of music:
● More than 70 million official songs
● Music content including live performances, covers, remixes and music content you can't find elsewhere
● Thousands of curated playlists across many genres and activities

Get personalised music, perfect for every moment:
● Personalised playlists and Mixes
● Activity mixes made for you
● Create playlists with song suggestions or collaborate with other music fans to create the perfect playlist
● Neatly organised Library to see all of your liked and added songs, playlists you created and artists you subscribed to

Stay on top of the trends and discover new music:
● Take a look at new releases
● Discover music-based genres (Hip Hop, Pop, Country, Dance and Electronic, Blues, Indie and Alternative, Jazz, Kpop, Latin, Rock and more)
● Discover music-based mood (Chill, Feel Good, Energy Booster, Sleep, Focus, Romance, Workout, Commute, Party)
● Explore top charts from all over the world

Enhanced your listening experience with unique features:
● Song lyrics so you can sing along to your favourites
● Upload songs from your devices so you can enjoy them in one place with YouTube Music
● Listen on your phone, desktop, smart speaker, smart TV, car, smart watch and within your favourite apps.
● Compatible with Google Maps, Waze, Google Assistant and more.

Upgrade to Music Premium (available in selected countries) to enjoy:
● Listen ad-free
● Play music in the background
● Access your downloads, including smart downloads
● Switch seamlessly between audio and video, only with YouTube Music

------------
If you subscribe via iTunes:

Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Accounts will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of the selected plan. Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase.

YouTube paid service terms: https://www.youtube.com/t/terms_paidservice
Privacy policy: https://www.google.com/policies/privacy
releaseNotes: We update our app all the time in order to make your YouTube Music experience better. We polished a few things, fixed bugs and made some performance improvements.
reviews:

I’ll click music to play it and it will show that it is playing but not play (I do not use Bluetooth nor have my volume down at all) and if you try to skip a song or even pause it most of the time it doesn’t work. | I love music and you tube music is allowing me to play the different genre of music that I adore!!! 🥰 I'm going to love you tube music forever and a day🔥🔥🔥🔥💥💥🔥💥💥🔥💥🧩🧩 | Best music service in my opinion. | I love the way I can watch the video too with the music and the sound quality is amazing. | I switched from Spotify to YouTube Music about a year ago and absolutely recommend it to anyone else who enjoys listening to music. It has all the desirable features of any music player and has a very simple, understandable, and helpful layout. The subscription of course carries across all devices, and is absolutely worth it if you’re an avid music-listener. I find myself a lot more content using it over Spotify as well, having many more hours of usage than I did before and makes it really worth the money. | Needs internet to even access your offline content like your paid music you paid for to use while your offline, Somehow it separates your google play music from your mp3 vs google play where they all were together You have to download each google play song separately, imagine if you have hundreds of songs vs downloading them all at once, you shouldn’t even have to download it if it’s already on your phone, this makes no sense! They are following apple with the Apple Music by making YouTube music

Ridiculous: 03/22 YouTube music replaced Google music, I paid a lot of money in buying MP3 from google music. Google transition, you download all the songs you paid for but the catch, the software only works on YouTube music! Now today, I find I can’t listen to many of the Songs I paid for! Because if you live in NYC and use the trains, many spots are offline and it says expired for offline listening, then it’s not a MP3 then! | I can get all kinds of music and videos here without interruptions. From dance music to how to dance videos. And I can download them for when I’m traveling and away from WiFi. Again, one of the few remaining reasonable priced deals around. | Very much appreciating the ad supported version to this app. YT music catalog is unrivaled when it comes to finding new music/artist, YT has captured every phase we went through over the years. Recommendations not only push popular artist, but also artist of whatever genre you search for. Lots of unreleased music/underground artists can be found here which makes the app the go to for someone like me with alternative taste. When it comes to saving the music I like, if the “liked” tap had more organization, such as alphabetically organizing every song or by date added, it would make YT music that much better vs scrolling through every song I’ve ever liked! | Can you please add equalizer to iOS because I need it 😭😭😭 | youtube music has helped me find songs and remixes i never would have found on spotify, not only is it a lot less restrictive on skips but it also allows you to listen to the song you look up when you look it up! overall in discovery and in use YT music is the most convenient and consistent app i’ve ever used for music. 
thank you youtube 
-Rylee | Can’t press little square. I HAVE TO TURN MY PHONE TO MAKE SCREEN GO BIG. THE BUTTON SHOULD WORK TO MAKE THE VIDEO GO SIDEWAYS LANDSCAPE!!!! I WILL UNINSTALL IF NOT FIXED LESS THAN 1 WEEK KEEP GODZILLA FOREVER OR LOSE HIM TO TIDAL. U CHOOSE. PLEASE FIX BORTOM RIGHT WHITE SQUARE FOR MUSIC VIDEOS OR I WILL LOSE MY SANITY!!!!!!!!!!!! THANK U NEXT PLZ!!!👽✊🏾🙏♒️😹🚀🔥🖖🎰🖖 | Downloading and removing needs to be fixed. Even deleting a song someone’s won’t delete. | It decent with as much as I pay it shouldn't lag as this bad | Have had no problems! 
I love how it keeps… my music! | It amazing there’s song that I like cause they are videos, but with this app you can play those song u like plus you have the whole YouTube songs inventory, it’s simple just amazing app | La música que me recomienda es justo lo que busco, me encanta esta aplicación ❤️ | Shuffle is a joke, I have thousands of songs in my playlist but it keeps repeating the same few | Stop changing my music it gets annoying I can’t hear my own music every time I play it’s changes with other songs that aren’t it I can’t find my music anymore it really frustrating just stop messing with my playlist | Everybody watches YouTube, but YouTube Music takes all my favorite songs (even the hard to find ones) and puts it in one app! It’s all right at the tip of my fingers and I absolutely love it! None of the other music apps, paid or free, even come close. | Every time I load up a song, artist, album, or playlist, it crashes every time I loaded it up on it, though. So yeah! Please fix it soon on that crash on that update please. Thanks! 😁

Device: iPod touch (7th generation)
iOS: 15.8.2 Device doesn’t update anymore, though. | Add YouTube music to Xbox series x please | There are several issues. For example,
1. when you tap on an artist, I want it to take me to their songs in MY library, not their whole discography! (Instead I have to go back and search their name, then tap “my library”.)

4. they should clean up the mess artists make by having a million versions of a song in different places. They should help the artists have a better organized collection. 5. Name of the album would be nice to have too, when we are listen to a song. We could tap on it to see the rest of the album (just like tapping the artist’s name) instead of jumping through multiple steps to finally get to it.
6. When you go to album, it should be very easy to select “show me the songs from my library” or “show the whole thing.” | Yes, I know apps have to make some bank somehow, but why can I not play music in the background with YouTube music free? Spotify and SoundCloud both allow me to play music in the background for free, but not YouTube music—which I was interested in BECAUSE I was told it plays music in the background—. This app does give you like two weeks of premium or whatever it is called, which is nice, but after that you have to pay which is stupid—when it comes to playing the songs without the app open on my screen—. If YouTube would just change that one thing, I would probably recommend the app at higher points but until then, 3 stars is all I can give. | I was just trying to listen to music but whenever I still have the app open but it just turns off and doesn’t play my music so that’s why it’s stupid | Best music platform!! Much appreciated. Lower the monthly though. | Love it the samples are a nice way to find music without searching and looking for hours on end and I love how you can go back and skip ahead in the song unlike some apps, no ads too which is amazing! title: Raiffeisen bankovnictví
description:
S mobilním bankovnictvím od Raiffeisenbank máte své finance v bezpečí a pod kontrolou. Jen posuďte sami.

RYCHLÉ A BEZPEČNÉ PŘIHLÁŠENÍ
Při aktivaci si nastavte vlastní S-PIN, kterým se budete přihlašovat a autorizovat všechny platby a operace. Jednoduše se přihlásíte a potvrdíte platby do 5000 Kč i pomocí Face ID nebo Touch ID.

VŠECHNY PRODUKTY NA JEDNOM MÍSTĚ
Na hlavní stránce naleznete základní přehled a informace o všech svých produktech a službách.

NEKONEČNÁ HISTORIE POHYBŮ
Všechny platby a karetní transakce naleznete ve Vaší transakční historii ihned po jejich provedení. Pro lepší orientaci většina obsahuje i logo obchodníka a má přiřazenou kategorii.

JEDNODUCHÉ DOMÁCÍ PLATBY
Nevyplňujte složité formuláře. Příjemce vyberte ze seznamu těch nejčastějších. Nebo použijte QR kód pro jednodušší vyplnění parametrů platby. Platbu mezi vlastními účty můžete provést tak, že na hlavní stránce podržíte prst na jednom z účtů a přetáhnete jej na jiný účet.

MÁTE PŘEHLED, ZA CO NEJVÍC UTRÁCÍTE
Nejen ke karetním transakcím automaticky přiřazujeme jejich kategorie. Kompletní přehled výdajů v jednotlivých kategoriích za daný měsíc si pak můžete zobrazit v přehledném grafu.
A to zdaleka není všechno, co naše aplikace umí. Nevěříte? Tak si ji stáhněte a přesvědčte se sami.
releaseNotes:
S novou verzí aplikace máte lepší přehled o detailech Vašeho spořicího účtu - snadno a rychle uvidíte aktuální úrokovou sazbu, i počet provedených plateb kartou pro splnění podmínek.

V aplikaci už zadáte i zahraniční platbu, v uživatelském profilu jsme zjednodušili možnost sjednání schůzky na pobočce a přidali jsme i spoustu dalších vylepšení.

Oprava chyb a drobná vylepšení.
reviews:
Pod iOS 16.4.1, iPhone SE 2. gen, nefunguje potvrzovací tlačítko pod změnou limitů karty. V app tedy vůbec limity nejdou změnit, musí se na web. Velmi nepříjemné. | EDIT: Nefunkcni historie plateb na kreditce. Nezobrazuje zadne transakce.

Vyhodte lidi kteri jsou za ten paskvil zodpovedni. Nova app je absolutne neprehledny a chaoticky vytvor, ktery snad nemuzete myslet vazne. Je mi z toho soufl! | Docela nepříjemná chyba. Platba z účtu na účet. Dám změnit zdrojový účet, vyberu jiný a zároveň s touto změnou se změní kód banky u cílového účtu na  kód zdrojového. Jinak jako klient equa bank musím říct že aplikaci měli lepší. | I don’t have iOS 15.  The app download says it will load last compatible version but it won’t and I can’t find any way to upload the correct version.  And until then I am shut out of my online banking.  Fix your app download interface!! | I had trouble eKonto not showing English for many days. During that period, I was unable to make any transaction. | [Edit] After my initial review, they fixed the issues. Everything runs well and English is functional again. Thanks for the quick fix, devs. (Original review:) Since the last update, the app will not revert back to English, despite my settings being set to English. The app also crashes often. | This was the best bank application I had ever used. But a new update was installed on my phone a few days ago and, since then, the application will not display information in English — only in Czech. I am an expat living here since about two years and, unfortunately I do not understand enough Czech to navigate this app. So this is really a serious problem for me. | This is the best Bank app that I have used. It very easy and intuitive, and support with a Bank rep is always available when needed. | Whether you’re checking your account balance at the register, or trying to send money to a friend, or just going over your accounts at home at 7:30 on a Wednesday, there’s no time when RB isn’t likely to suddenly not work on your mobile phone! 

Service outages occur day or night, planned and unplanned, and conveniently affect customers whether they are at home, or abroad. 

Expect this consistent quality of service from any Raiffeisenbank offering. | Mobilní aplikaci po update na verzi 3.7.0 nelze spustit. | Od 1. Okamžiku používaní této aplikace mohu jen chválit. Funguje velmi jednoduše, velmi přehledně. Ovládání je skvěle intuitivní. Díky za ni 👌🙏 | Awesome app | After the latest update, I cannot write 4 or 5 digits number to the ‘amount’ section. It always converts it back to x CZK or xx CZK. I cannot understand how bank is releasing this update without checking one of the core functionalities... It takes me 5 minutes to send money from my account.

Edit: with the latest update, they corrected their mistake. Only after 17 days. Increasing stars from 1 to 3. | Testujete tu aplikaci před vydáním? Jak je možné, že od začátku co nabízíte informace o platbách formou notifikací, nefunguje u těchto notifikací zvuk?! Testováno na více zařízeních s více účty. | - Když mě aplikace po nějaké době odhlásí, protože byla dlouho na pozadí, tak nepotřebuji potvrzovat dialog, který mě informuje o něčem co každý vidí na první pohled.

- Verze pro iPad je nově bohužel kompletně stejná jako pro telefon, pouze zvětšená. Aplikace by měla být optimalizovaná pro zařízení na kterém běží.

- Aplikace je zbugovaná (timeouty, popisky)

- Chybí důležité informace (např. mohu si deaktivovat cestovní pojištění u karty, ale nemohu zjistit jaké pojištění tam vlastně mám a kolik za něj platím ...)

- Aplikace není moc přehledná, působí dost přeplácaně, speciálně v porovnání s konkurencí jako Revolut ... | Mam novy ipad (ten co vysel v listopadu) a aplikace je na nem hodne rozbita, funguje jen v portrait modu. | Konečně aplikace může začít konkurovat aplikácím ostatních bank! Nová podoba se povedla! | How is it possible to make your job worse and worse? The home page of the new interface is stupidly filled by the absolutely unusable information. WHY did you make SO SMALL fonts? To make for your clients maximum inconvenience? RB should fire ASAP these IT morons to keep its good reputation! | Po novém updatu instantne aplikace spadne po spuštění. | Chci zpet puvodni verzi!!! Touch ID stejne nefunguje pro potvrzeni platby, je naprosto zbytecne. Netusim, proc si jiz nemuzu nastavit jako primarni napr. firemni ucet??? Ten potrebuji ihned po spusteni aplikace a ne nejake stupidni reklamni nabidky...

Bezte se radeji proskolit do sesterske Tatra Banky. Jejich aplikace je o generaci pred temi vasimi pokusy... | Již potřetí se samo deaktivovalo | Je naprostá ostuda, že aplikace stále nepodporuje rozlišení iPhone 6 a novějších. | Naprosto děsivé. Nepřehledné. Ale nejhorší je, že je to k ničemu. 20 minut jsem se pokoušel nyní odeslat jednu platbu a stále mi to házelo time outy. Pak ani nevíte, zda se platba odeslala, nebo ne. Takže hrozí, že platbu neodešlete, nebo odešlete vícekrát (protože se vám nezobrazí, že platba nebyla odeslána). Navíc zabezpečení je dost nízké: při návratu to otevřené aplikace to po vás ani nevyžaduje PIN. | V poslední verzi padá. :-( je to hrůza. | Useless

title: Google Sheets
description:
Create, edit, and collaborate on spreadsheets with the Google Sheets app. With Sheets you can:

* Create new spreadsheets or edit existing ones
* Share spreadsheets and collaborate with others in the same spreadsheet at the same time
* Work anywhere, anytime - even offline
* Format cells, enter/sort data, view charts, insert formulas, use find/replace, and more
* Never worry about losing your work -- everything is automatically saved as you type
* Open, edit, and save Excel files

Google Sheets is part of Google Workspace: where teams of any size can chat, create, and collaborate.

Google Workspace subscribers have access to additional Google Sheets features, including: 
* Easily add collaborators to projects, see changes as they occur, receive notifications for edits that happen while you’re away, and chat with colleagues in the same spreadsheet. All changes are automatically saved as you make them. And with offline access, you can create, view, and edit files wherever and whenever
* Get insights fast, powered by Google AI
* Work seamlessly across Sheets and Excel
* Maintain control with enterprise-grade security
* Analyze data from other business-critical tools
* Build custom solutions
releaseNotes: * Bug fixes and performance improvements
reviews:
Extremely easy to use!!! | App | Slightly better than a post-it note
Awkward to use, and very limited in what it can do. | I like this app so much it has great use for work. | No, I do not want to sign in to google account everywhere I go

Update: quit being evil | 난 너무 행복합니다 | Grew up on excel and continue to think that way. Sheets is a decent free app! | Our HOA keeps tracks of dues payments, equipment logs, and maintenance schedules. All of our board members have access to these very important sheets and are able to update them in real time. Google sheets is a solution for everybody. | I don’t know if it’s iPad or Sheets: When accessing sheets via my iPad it barely works. Many functions don’t work at all, some very slow. | Sheets is the most time consuming tedious eye squinting frustrating invention which gives people who swear by it a false sense of security that those who are proficient or better at it are actually good in their job roles. Just because someone can scramble an egg does not make them a cook or a chef. | I just updated the app and now the sheet I was working on has disappeared. | Not every function is on the app compared to the computer version and that is annoying and frustrating!! All functions should be available, otherwise it's not as useful. Can't even delete a row or column or make checkboxes in the app. | Thank you that is so helpful | Poor knock off of Excel. | I hadn’t posted since 2022, and found a mystery post.🥲🤔🤨Wondering how this could happen 🤷‍♀️; and if I could trust it to post further information? | It is so easy to use and love being able to share between all my devices | Google sheet’s stopped importing stock prices into google sheets about a week ago. I cannot figure out how to correct this. | Doesn’t do anything and won’t let me sign out of my account to change it to another. Hate it | So great for on the go organizing and planning. I would like to see more tools made easier to access in the mobile version, or perhaps just made more intuitive. Otherwise, it’s a trusty staple for someone who’s always organizing multiple projects at once. 4/5 | I just love sheets it’s so useful for my daily life | It is simply just another useful tool that only Google provides that is just very organized and simple, there is nothing that can top it off and there is no reason to, it simply is just there, always there when you need it. Just like Docs and Slides, so many uses and so easy to edit. Google Sheets is just overall useful. | So hard to use. Where is the currency button? Can’t drag down cells to copy automatically. Can’t recognize patterns when trying to drag two cells. | Helpful for RSVP list.  Maureen | Awesome tool | Google wants you to use the app instead because they won’t allow you to use the browser version. The app won’t even let you split screen view. | Years of trying to improve time management skills has finally become obvious to me at least this is the place that integrates with EVERYTHING & EVERYONE!

If wasn't even weeks ago that CRM’s. Portals, CMS’s, Industry developed apps for efficiency were being developed & still be developed sold & used.

With some exceptions of course to be realistic & totally truthful Google Workspace along with all the other complimentary apps, tools, assets, attributes, Beta Testing, accommodations, schedulng, tracking using all the strictest business best practices of course is obvious to me that everything that any person or AI computer can think of realistic or not is already being used by those who see this is the future now. | It working beautiful for me | I use sheets to track my work outs. Every day sheets bugs out. When I lock my phone and open back to the app a lot of the time when I go to select a cell it will select one like 3 of 4 cells down. Won’t unbug until I close the app. Really annoying. | Love that I can use on all my devices and very similar to excel. I also love that it’s free, really free not fake news free, lol! But my only negative is you can’t add images, and if you can I can not figure out how. This is great software but not as intuitive as excel, though it has many similarities.

Update: It’s been glitchy adding formulas (they are erroring out,  formula is correct and worked in some cells and not in others) and with data sort drop down is glitching looks like background coding issue giving random symbols and sporadic letters and numbers but only in some cells, other data sorts are working this is all within the same spreadsheet. | App doesn’t allow you to set the number of decimal places after you have formatted the cells to numeric | Horrible, hard to use on phone. Not intuitive or user friendly. | You can’t up load to zoom there is no 
Limit no tap zoom
Email
Or any thing 
It’s not easy to up load sorting a meeting 
And share | برنامج جيد | Muy buena herramienta para hacer mis tablas | Please add the option to remove duplicates. It is not on the mobile app but on the computer version. | I use Google Sheets and post them in a Google website where students can check them and see weekly updates.  The data on the worksheets have links to websites. Win Win for everyone. | Más fácil que excel | Love this app | User friendly. | Amazing service | I really enjoy using it in my note taking .It helps organize my business and personal matters in an order I can then share with my family as needed. | it’s pretty good i guess but i wonder why i can’t format spreadsheets :/ i just want to easily make the rows alternating colors…. | I use Google Sheets every day, and every day I force quit the app 3-5 times because of inexplicable glitches and bugs. That has remained constant across the past year, through many app updates and versions. If it were a random app from a small developer, I would chalk it up to normal cost of doing business, but this is Alphabet—if any company on earth should solve bugs, it is them.

About 10% of the time when open a sheet, I see no fields populated, only highlighted colors. I have to force quit the app and reload to see the data. Most frequently, there are glitches when you try to toggle quickly between editing multiple fields. I often cannot edit a field after selecting it, or close the editor after entering data. In both cases, I have to force quit and reload the app.

Again, it’s a powerful and useful app, but it feels like freeware somebody made in their garage, not a mainstay Google product. After so long, these should be high-priority fixes. | I tried to put a simple math formula =(2+5)/(8+3) and it wouldn’t appear. 	I was using it for a school project and it was difficult to use but, not terrible.  The typing method is weird because you type in a small box at the bottom of the screen but, your text shows up where ever you want. The boxes are annoying and finicky and copying can be challenging. Overall, it was okay.

title: Qerko
description:
Qerko was born from our desire to make paying in restaurants, bistros and cafés easier. We didn’t want to spend any more time waiting in the queue at the bar or complicatedly separate the bill with our friends at one table.

And we pursued this smart payment system beyond gastronomy borders! Download the app, scan the QR code and easily pay with just a swipe. You will get your receipt right after payment in your e-mail and in the profile in app, too.

Registration and adding the payment method can be done in less than a minute. Qerko app represents revolution in payment, so let yourself be part of it and decide on your own, when and how you are going to pay. 

What is more, with Qerko, you can get rewards in the loyalty program too.

Benefits of the app:
• Easy pay your bill or its part in a restaurant.
• No more wasting time waiting till the waiter comes.
• Comfy payment via QR code in a restaurant or at your TV screen.
• You need only your mobile phone to pay.
• You get rewards in the loyalty program just for paying.
• Many payment methods so everyone can choose - Visa, Mastercard, meal voucher cards Edenred, Sodexo or Benefit Plus or Apple Pay
releaseNotes: • Few minor improvements, so the app runs smoothly
reviews:
I was just trying to pay (walked out without realizing the payment wasn’t complete - boo!-), then tried to correct the problem by trying to pay again and several more times with my Apple Card. Eventually, on a whim switched to a local bank debit card which worked. Angry my Apple Card wasn’t accepted. Used the Apple Pay process with both cards, if that helps the developer track the issue. | I tried a Visa credit card, a Mastercard credit card, my Bank of America debit card, Apple Pay.

Nothing works.

For foreigners visiting Czech Republic, this app is worthless. | Seems to work fine until it comes to actual payment. The payment is declined by the bank (Chase bank in my case). Could use some work, maybe there’s security issues?

title: Uber - Request a ride
description:
We’re committed to your safety at Uber. We’ve established a Door-to-Door Safety Standard to help you feel safe every time you take a trip.

And with Uber, your destination is at your fingertips. Just open the app and enter where you want to go, and a nearby driver will help you get there reliably.

TAKE A TRIP FROM ALMOST ANYWHERE
Request a trip from 600+ airports and in 10,000+ cities around the world. The Uber app is a great way to make your travel plans stress-free. Request a trip on demand or schedule one ahead of time.    

TAKE A TRIP TO ALMOST ANYWHERE
Whether you’re looking for style, space or affordability, Uber can help you find the perfect trip to fit your needs:

Enjoy elegance and premium features with Uber Exec
Ride with extra room (and more of your friends) with UberXL

Uber Travel
Whether it's your usual commute by train, escaping the city with friends in a hire car, a coach trip to Cambridge, or even the Eurostar to Paris, you can now go anywhere with Uber.

All of these transport options and more are available in one place with the Uber app.

SEE PRICE ESTIMATES
With Uber, you can see your price estimate up front before booking. That means you’ll always have an idea of what you’ll pay before requesting your trip.

YOUR SAFETY DRIVES US
We’re committed to making every trip with Uber as safe as possible. That's why – in addition to our Door-to-Door Safety Standard – we've built new safety features and updated our Community Guidelines for respectful and positive experiences.

You can share your trip
Give your loved ones peace of mind while you’re on a trip – you can share your location and trip status so they know you’ve made it to your destination.

You can contact emergency services
You can call the emergency services directly from the app, and your location and trip details will be displayed so you can share them quickly with emergency services.

TIP AND RATE YOUR DRIVER
After every trip, you can submit a rating along with comments. You can also let your driver know you appreciated your experience by adding a tip for them directly in the app.

Not all products are available in all markets.

To see if Uber is available in your city, visit https://www.uber.com/cities
Follow us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/uber
Like us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/uber

Questions? Visit uber.com/help
releaseNotes:
We update the Uber app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. Here are a couple of the enhancements you'll find in the latest update:

- Updates to improve localization across the app
- Various bug fixes & improvements
  
Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback keeps the Uber engine running. 
Any questions? Tap Help in the Uber app or visit help.uber.com.
