title: EasyPark - Parking made easy
description:
EasyPark has been making cities more livable since 2001. With millions of drivers, businesses, and operators using our services in more than 20 countries, we continue to develop convenient, easy-to-use solutions to save you time, and money and remove the unnecessary stress of car parking.

EasyPark is the nr. 1 parking app in Europe when it comes to coverage. With our mobile parking solution, you can pay for parking in a garage or find a parking spot in the street, in the city center or in the airport, at home or abroad - wherever life takes you! You can also charge your EV, and go even further.

Price: In most locations, we charge a service fee on top of the parking cost the operator charges. The total price and fee breakdown are shown in the EasyPark app when you set your end time and before you start to park, as well as in your parking receipt when the session has ended, so you are confident about how much you’re paying. Please see your local easypark.com site for more details.

With the EasyPark app, you can:
- Start your session from your mobile phone.
- Stop your session at any time, paying for the active time.
- Remotely extend your session if you need more time.
- Find parking near your location or destination before traveling.
- Charge your electric car with the same app.
- Pay for parking, whether privately or for work.
- Split your private and work-related parking or charging costs.
- Pay with secure methods such as Visa, Mastercard, ApplePay, or monthly invoices for business accounts.
- Get notified when your parking is close to expiration.

You can pay for parking and EV charging with the EasyPark app in: Rome, Madrid, Melbourne, Berlin, Copenhagen, Paris, Amsterdam, Stockholm, Helsinki and so many more!

Please note that the EasyPark app is unavailable in the United Kingdom. To park in the UK, please use the RingGo app instead.
releaseNotes: We update the app often to give you a fast, reliable service so you can park with confidence. Activate automatic updates to have the best experience. Let us know of ways to make your parking or charging sessions better.
reviews:
I used this app twice >2 years ago on a trip and haven’t been back to Iceland. Suddenly I started getting EasyPark charges to my credit card this year. I cannot access my account because their MFA won’t send me text messages and they refuse to refund the charges. | Terrible app, stay away from this app at all costs.  Apple pay does not work, nor does credit card | I visited Iceland in June of 2023. As of January 2024, I’m still getting charges on my credit card. I emailed the company asking for help, and they never replied back. | Unfortunately only 1 star here, no support at all. Private account is working perfectly.
Was multiple time contacted by sell department regarding open business account, now when I decided to open one, have issue to setup and no one willing to help. Try to call, the staff on the phone ask me to send email. Send email, no answer.
Sad and disappointing. | Entered my phone number, and then spent 10 minutes entering and re-entering different card numbers, and every time it says fraud. | My card was removed from the app. It’s impossible to add new card. Please fix it. | I’ve tried opening new accounts with multiple credit cards and phone numbers and still no luck. Please fix. | EasyPark is really a good App and I would have rated it higher except for one thing that could be easily corrected.  
You have to be careful if you use the very useful camera feature with a car once it is no longer in your possession  - for instance after you finished renting the car or you sold the car.  If you don’t delete the license plate from the App you will pay for the next renter’s parking. 
I wish that the App made this clearer at the time I added the license plate rather than relying on their terms and conditions to inform me.   It would be even better if the camera triggered a request to my App to approve the parking first and not automatically bill. The parking App Pango has such controls built in . | The EasyPark app and system make parking in various cities throughout Europe a breeze. Not needing to worry about carrying around enough change for the meters is wonderful! | I used the app in Italy in a rental car. I still get charged on my card 3 months later by probably somebody using the rental and get automatic bills by the camera  recognizing the license plate. | A very good app. Easy to setup and use. Very good customer service. | The app works very smoothly. I love the ever-present countdown timer on the dynamic island.  Very slick! | Very smart app. Makes parking in Iceland super easy | Foreningers have to buy a lot of roaming data just to park… more expensive than parking ticket itself | Need a membership to use the app. No thanks | I visited Iceland for 3 days and used this app successfully during our trip. Returned to the U.S. on March 31. Today is August 16. This is the second time now I’m being charged for whatever strangers out there that rented the same car we did (same plate) after we returned home.

Can’t login to my account. It doesn’t allow me to reset my password. I never received the security text code the app says it’s sending to my phone. Zero options for English speakers to get assistance through customer service. I am being forced to file a dispute with my credit card. Absolutely do NOT recommend this app for tourists using rental cars. | Very disappointing. It just sits and displays a turning circle at a phone number screen. Don’t count on it in Strasberg. | The app wants to send a text message with a code to my American number and the text never arrives.

Called customer support and they said many have called about the same thing and they didn’t have a fix for it.

I have also emailed customer support but they never replies back to my emails. | Wonderful invention! | So much better than trying to navigate a payment at the meter. Can add or stop to the meter remotely. | The only app that declining all my cards | I downloaded the app, entered my phone number and I am not getting sent the verification code.

There is no way to get help from customer service - there is not an English chat bot nor an email address.

Very frustrating. | The add payment method page will not load. With that I won’t be using the app. | There is a quirk in the EasyPark system that causes their system to create a double charge the first time you use them. We were in Tromso, Norway and the only parking near the Polar Museum was operated by EasyPark. We pulled into the lot and downloaded the app. We then started the online meter for our parking. We also used it that same day when we parked at Polaris, the aquarium in Tromso. EasyPark charged our credit card for both parking activations. After we got home Hertz then attempted to charge us for the same parking; I showed them that I had already paid but they said EasyPark would not reimburse them for their charge. I contacted EasyPark and this is what they said:
Hi James.
Thanks for your inquiry.
The space in the license plate has no meaning and does not affect the parking registration as the camera systems/controllers also do not register them. 
From what I can see here, you have been read in on camera at Pellerinbryggene where you actually were, and then you've gone ahead and manually started a parking in a place you weren't. Had you had camera parking enabled in your own app, it would not have been read in on hertz's account, but your own. It is your own responsibility to make sure your parkings are started at the correct place, as the system will not know it outside of cameras.
I am sorry we cannot help you with this.
Have a nice day.

To translate Patrick's response: we can double charge you because before you activated the parking on the app our camera registered your license plate. That is correct, I pulled into the parking lot, downloaded the app, and started the parking BUT because I had not registered the license plate before entering the lot, they went ahead and charged Hertz as the car belonged to them. | Son unos estafadores. De la nada te están cobrando una suscripción y cuando la quieres cancelar te cobran dos meses porque según ellos es lo que dicen sus términos y condiciones en los cuales solo aparece un mes. Les recomienda que utilicen cualquier otra app para parking.

Su servicio por correo tarda una semana en contestar si contestan y el servicio por teléfono te hacen esperar 15 minutos para no poderte dar ninguna solución | Visited Iceland last summer. Discovered that my credit card is still being charged whenever the rental car is parked in fee zones since then. The app does not allow you to remove your credit card, only update it. | I downloaded the app to park on the street, I adjusted my time for 6 hours, and discovered that I have instead selected 180 hrs. When I pressed stop parking, it gives me an error. When I try deleting the account, it says I can’t delete it because of the ongoing parking session. I am no longer parked at the location but am still being charged money. | What a great way to park and manage our time.  This makes it so easy for me.  Thank you | I downloaded this app while traveling in Europe.  The app asks you to link your PayPal account.  DO NOT DO THIS.  They won’t tell you that you are agreeing to prepay for parking whether you use it or not.  I did not use the service and these scammers charged my PayPal account €31.40.   I tried to dispute it but PayPal sided with these guys.  I was supposed to provide a copy of the user agreement as if I had access to such a thing.  Stay away from this scam.  You’ve been warned. | First asked me for a previously used license plate to activate the account. I’ve always used rental cars so had not idea. Deleted account and trying to register again, but when I put it my UK phone number and select Australia as the parking country, nothing happens. I don’t understand why they can’t just do regular accounts like everybody else. | Easy Park is a great app. It was they only one out there that let us - US citizens - pay for parking - easy to use, easy to extend - LOVED IT - until our acct was hacked. Two weeks after we left The Netherlands our credit card was being used daily for some pretty expensive parking and my phone number that I use had been changed. Had to cancel the credit card and get a new one. Easy Park needs to up their security. We only used the app once in The Hague. | I used it multiple days a week without a problem and loved the convenience. However, since a little over a week I all the sudden cannot even get into the app.  The app screen opens asking for my phone number to send a confirmation code to. I never receive the code and there’s no other way to get back into the app. There seriously should be some sort of way to trouble shoot or work around not receiving the text. I’m typing in the correct phone number and country code, I’ve checked countless times.

Super frustrating. 
So I’m back to having to use coins to pay for parking the old fashion way. | Makes parking so much easier with no coins or over payment! Thanks 👍🏾🙏🏾👍🏾 | I find EasyPark easy to use and adjust time as needed.  I appreciate partnerships like QPARK, where EasyPark can be used in place.  If I am unsure whether I need to use EasyPark in an area, I launch the software and it will either show me a pop up of the parking space number so I can set the parking time or it will tell me there is no EasyPark parking option in that area. | So many steps and then the verification email won’t show up right away. Frustrating when you just want to get going and have to spend 10m signing up to just pay for simple parking. Can’t you just accept Apple Pay with no sign up necessary?! Please make this easier. 

Plus you can only sign up with an address from a handful of European countries. | This is a simple and very functional app that avoids the problem of lacking change for parking meters. The ability to add or delete time is genius. | I’m from the United States with a US cell number parking in Switzerland being charged in Swiss Francs and they are billing my PayPal in Norwegian Kroner? Currency exchange fees add up quickly. | (in addition to easy, also extremely reliable offering high confidence of use” | If you’re traveling and happen to be switching rental cars now and then, which is pretty common on trips in foreign countries, please BE AWARE that you need to make sure to change the registration number for the car in the app. If you forget to do this, you’re TOTALLY SCREWED. I paid for parking, but we had just switched to a different rental car and I forgot to change the registration number in the app. I got a slip on my car window telling me I owed them a fine that was over 3x the amount of the parking. I submitted a complaint saying I had actually paid, just under a different registration number and I gave them that number, but no, that’s my fault and I have to pay the fine. PLUS, they’re keeping what I paid for parking under the wrong registration number!??? How is that fair?? Poor business practice and extremely unforgiving. I PAID FOR PARKING!! | Het bedrijf blokkeert direct je (zakelijke) account als een betaling mislukt. Dat is niet zoals het zou horen. Voor mij een reden om over te stappen naar een andere parkeerprovider die wel klantvriendelijk is. | Just do it, so simple! | Not sure what happened. App was working as intended but now it won’t let me make any payments. Tried reinstalling and it never sends and confirmation codes to add a new account. 

Found a backwards way through their website to create an account and now it won’t take any of the credit card info I was using before. 

Seems like a server-side issue. | It used to work, but I got signed out and I’m unable get back in. The issue is that I don’t get the SMS to verify my phone number. | App is supposed to be charging regular price in Zurich, not 15% extra. Zurich plates, Zurich address, Zurich phone number, Zurich parking place…. But app still thinks I am not in an area with the no-surcharge pricing. Please fix. | Très pratique et facile! | good app if it would work but it doesn’t allow me to perform the payment with apple pay for some reason (Apple pay is set up properly on my phone and works for other services). Neither does it allow me to just add a credit card.
I get this error since at least 6 months. | We have successfully downloaded the app, everything went well, till we started the parking: an  unhandled error occurred, please try again.. yeah, it’s really “easy”park.. thanks | Installed the app, easy breezy.
Credit card info and payment, no problem.
Installed app on different device with same mobile number, app demands a login and password. “Secure numeric code sent to mobile phone”
No place on app to set up password.
No message sent to mobile phone (yes, I entered it correctly)
Help section says to contact via email - no email on app or website for help.
Help section opens in non english language. 5 minutes later open in english.
Stockholm, there is a problem with your basic app function. | Went to Iceland on vacation and returned to
the US. Unfortunately, I forgot my password. I tried using the password recovery numerous times and I have received an sms message. I had to call my credit card company to stop this app from charging my card. Somehow they have found a ways to charge my card even though I disputed the charges and had them blocked. | Seemed to be >30% fee on top of cash fee.

title: MOL Move
description:
Download the MOL Move app, register in a few steps, confirm your e-mail address and you can start collecting points. After that you can enjoy a nice Fresh Corner welcome gift!

You receive points for almost anything you buy with the digital MOL Move card. You can access your digital MOL Move card in the most convenient way: choose the ‘Your card’ option in the app.

As you earn more points, you can move through each tier and experience a different range of exciting benefits. You will start your journey in tier Basic, after that it’s up to you how quick you reach the next Silver, Gold or VIP tiers. You can check your point balance and your current progress any time on your home screen. 

You can also earn extra points by completing our questionnaire or by recommending MOL Move to your friends. You can find them in the app under "My profile".

With the app you always have your favorite MOL Move discounts, coupons, challenges in your pocket and you can participate in the most exciting prize winning games. 

With the MOL Move app you can easily find the service stations where you can enjoy a cup of milky Fresh Corner coffee or a fresh hot-dog. Furthermore you can plan the route directly to the spots.

In order to access some features, you will need to register or provide your consents. You need to be over 15 to register in the app. You can read our General Terms & Conditions on molmove.cz.
releaseNotes: Bug fixes and performance improvements
reviews: Failed to fetch reviews

title: Notino: perfumes and cosmetics
description:
Notino: The whole beauty world in your pocket, anywhere, anytime!

Notino is the largest European online store selling cosmetics and perfumes. We have almost everything in stock from more than 1,500 global brands. Plus offers tailored to suit your tastes, authentic reviews and lots of smart tools to help you choose the right foundation, lipstick or perfume.

title: PictureThis - Plant Identifier
description:
PictureThis® identifies 1,000,000+ plants every day with 98% accuracy-better than most human experts. Get your gardening questions answered and become a “green thumb” with the plant identification power of PictureThis!

Encounter a beautiful, unknown plant during your walk? 
Want to inspire your children? 
Need advice on how to care for your plants? 
Simply take a photo of the plant and PictureThis will complete a plant identification to answer all your questions about it!

Our revolutionary plant identification engine is constantly learning from experts and specialists - and now it’s all at your fingertips.  Simply discover plants around you, take a quick photo, complete the plant identification, and discover a new appreciation for nature.

Key Features:

- Identify plants, flowers, and trees instantly with an AI-driven plant identification system
- Diagnose plant problems automatically and get treatment suggestions
- Get advice from our botanists in one-on-one conversations 
- Use our plant guides to help you choose and grow beautiful, healthy plants
- Keep notes, get reminders, and record the growth of your plants, trees, and flowers
- Take better photographs with our easy-to-use interface

PictureThis has been featured on the App Store in over 100 countries.


User Comments:
“Very impressed. While not perfect, it can distinguish with high accuracy between different species in our collection of rare plants. It can even recognize down to cultivar sometimes-amazing. Amazed how it can work with any photo and it will give recognition a go-with impressive accuracy.”
-San Fran Today

Simple and Easy 
“I am very pleased with this app. I used three others before breaking down to use the PictureThis app and I have to say it is a lot more convenient and accommodating than the others.” 
-FoodCake


[About PictureThis Premium]
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• The account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase


Terms of Use: https://api-java.picturethisai.com/static/user_agreement.html
Privacy Policy: https://api-java.picturethisai.com/static/privacy_policy.html

CONNECT WITH US
Facebook.com/PictureThisAI
Twitter.com/PictureThisAI
Instagram.com/PictureThisAI
releaseNotes: Thanks for exploring the world of plants with PictureThis. In this update, we polished the designs of some screens and fixed a few minor bugs to make your plant care and identification experience as delightful as possible. Update now and enjoy!
reviews:

I’ve been using the free part for years but I’m buying it today because the developers deserve it.  Thank you and keep on working 💕 | Three years ago this tree was cut down and every once in a while shoot comes up and is cut down. But now we have leaves to identify. Some of us are poor 😅 | A friend told me about this App. It’s not the first plant ID I’ve used, but it is the best!  It helps identify invasive plants and weeds in my yard & garden, as well as any plants I find while hiking. And it’s very easy to use and mostly very accurate. Highly recommend! | This is a very good app. It is fast. Let me know what I’ve got growing in my yard or in my garden. Today is showing a task I completed a few days ago, but the 5 things I need today have to be hunted. Not good if you are depending on their at-a-glance reminder.

Great App, but Developers…please fix the reminder area. | I’ve been using this app for several years and love it. The app has made my plant and location choices better in not just identifying plants, but in providing size, care and pictures at various stages of growth. | Good God | I will answer or continue with my review once I get the answer to my question. I am stumped. I have spider rats that are curling around the root system, and I don’t know how to get them to straighten up or get the roots the plant system to be upright, so that I can get one in the soil and one in the air. | This app is one of the best apps i have on my phone!! It tells you if a plant is poisonous,sick,or healthy!!! It is one of the best apps ever!!! It tells you what species it is what type of plant it is it’s just…AMAIZING | Great tool for the landscape industry. Must have if not for work then educational. | Very helpful app | Details of care may be somewhat wrong. | I have found this app to be extremely helpful in determining plants, whether they are weed, tree or what not. I recommend this app very much. | If identifying a common plant, it seems to do fairly well… however, all too often, it will give more than one plant ID for the very same plant. It’s very frustrating! With this type of inconsistency, I’m left not knowing to leave a plant in the ground… or, pull it. | It’s cool | Been using this app exclusively since its launch. I’ve tried other apps here and there just to see how they compare and this one is far superior. Still won’t identify fungus, mushrooms, mold, etc but I understand why as well. It’s very handy to have and I literally use this daily. It has given me a greater love and appreciation for plants. Thank you.
Great app and it has definitely saved me from Virginia Creeper vs Poison Ivy. Gets a little quirky when there are other plants nearby. The only reason I am giving it 4 stars is it won’t identify fungi. I wish it would let me know what was safe and wasn’t. I had my dog get a hold of a mushroom and I wanted to know if it was safe or not. It would be much quicker to look it up here than Google. Also I wish this app would say it is this but if not it might be... sometimes I know it’s not a certain plant but it keeps saying it is. Easy to use and nice to have when you are hiking or gardening. | This app is very helpful regarding education for your property | Simply one of the most amazing apps i’ve ever used & purchased.  It’s ability to identify and give you all of the info you need on any plant, tree, etc. is amazing.  Throw in the light meter and this app will turn your brown thumb green! | Awesomely helpful and informative | I love the app. The identification is spot on and amazing. The ability to create garden and learn about your plants is splendid. It has so many features that it is an incredible deal.

However, I bought the family plan to share with my friends that also love plants and could get plenty of use out of it. I did not know that that required making a family sharing plan with Apple. I was hoping for a separate system that allowed me to individually select who I wanted to share with. This was not, explicitly stated when I went to purchase 🙁 | This is one of the most valuable apps I have ever seen, and I’m grateful to have it you can’t go wrong with it | I’ve had Picture This for at least 5 years, I think, and it only gets better with each update. I have introduced so many friends and strangers to it and they are also amazed at how well it works!
First of all the few plants I had when I added it are mostly thriving where in the past most would be dead and replaced with others that probably wouldn’t make it. 
Second I’ve become brave enough to branch out of my cactus/succulent zone to orchids and houseplants. 
Now I’m starting a butterfly garden with both container and in ground plants to attract butterflies and hummingbirds!  
My husband uses it too for his vegetable garden!
The only problem I’ve had with Picture This is that it doesn’t recognize my Rainbow Eucalyptus tree!!! | Is this app free? I searched for FREE plant identifier apps and yours came up | Hard to know whether the library is limited or pics just don’t provide the detail needed but so far it’s 1 for 4 in ID accuracy. Need more time with the newer version of this app to compare with others. This used to be a really simple app but has morphed to be maybe too many things. Still, a year later it can’t identify one of my succulents correctly. Also has me overwatering (volume not frequency) one of my older indoor plants. The light suggestions are great, and nothing’s dying (because I have common sense) due to the mis-ID’s or watering issues, but I’m on the hunt for a better app if there is one. | I really like this app. I do not hve a green thumb so I need all try the help I can get. title: Tipsport CZ
description:
Mobilní aplikace Tipsport je povinností každého správného sázkaře, který si rád vsadí kdykoli a odkudkoli chce. Moderní aplikace od největší sázkovky v České republice nabízí vše podstatné. Od nepřeberné nabídky sportovních i mimo sportovních událostí a sázení na předzápasové i live kurzy až po vychytávky jako rychlé vsazení sólovky přes minitiket, nejvymakanější cashout a unikátní uzavření některých příležitostí. Nově je umožněno vytvářet MIX tikety, tedy kombinovat na jednom tiketu předzápasové i live sázky. Aplikace umožňuje detailní nastavení zasílání upozornění, mezi které patří i notifikace k důležitým událostem zápasů nebo závodů.

Aplikace vám také zajistí zapojení do největší sázkařské komunity u nás. Můžete se inspirovat oblíbenými sázkaři a jejich analýzami, zveřejněnými tikety v oblíbené Tiket aréně, nebo si přečíst nejzajímavější blogy. Samozřejmostí je přístup do nejrozsáhlejšího diskuzního fóra a možnost zapojit se do aktuálních soutěží.

Tipsport aplikace obsahuje: 

• kompletní a přehlednou nabídku zápasů z široké palety sportů jako jsou fotbal, hokej, tenis, basketbal, volejbal, házená, bojové sporty, rugby, snooker, motorsport, dostihy, badminton nebo třeba baseball, florbal a biatlon 
• neustále se rozšiřující nabídku stále populárnějších esportů 
• možnost upravit si pořadí oblíbených sportů a vyhledávání v předzápasové nabídce 
• pokročilé funkce s tiketem - cashout a uzavření některých příležitostí 
• možnost zapnutí upozornění (push notifikace) k jednotlivým zápasům nebo celým soutěžím 
• bohaté statistiky k předzápasovým příležitostem společné s informacemi, co sází ostatní sázkaři 
• všechny zásadní informace k live příležitosti jako je aktuální stav, live statistiky, tracker, live stream, události popisující průběh zápasu nebo závodu 
• velký výsledkový servis obsahující průběh zápasu nebo závodu 
• tisíce přímých přenosů s exkluzivitou pro hokejovou Tipsport extraligu 
• přehledný seznam vsazených tiketů s jasnou indikací stavu 
• upravenou sekci Můj účet s přístupem k rychlému vkladu nebo výběru peněz z herního účtu, ke kompletní historii transakcí a všem důležitým zprávám  
• široké možnosti nastavení – přepínání mezi světlým a tmavým vzhledem, řazení příležitostí na tiketu a zobrazování dalších informací u příležitostí na tiketu 
• nastavení upozornění pro zasílání push notifikací a zpráv do aplikace ze všech oblastí 
• fórum s vylepšenou klávesnicí pro rychlé přidání tiketu nebo analýzy, možnost využívat soukromé zprávy pro chatování s více uživateli najednou

title: VPN - Proxy Unlimited Shield
description:
■ Features:
- Unlimited time, Unlimited data, Unlimited bandwidth
- No registration or login required
- No Log is saved from any users
- Simple, one tap connect to VPN
- Protect your security and privacy
- Support for multiple devices for the same account
- Support 9.0 for Apple devices (iPhone, iPad, iPod)

■ What can I do with a VPN?
- Enhance your online privacy and enable you to safely and anonymously browse the Internet
- Protect you when using a public WiFi hotspot
- Allows you to create a secure connection to another network over the Internet

You can be a premium user through auto-renewing subscription:

  12-Month Plan, first 7 days free and then $79.99/year
  1-Month Plan, first 7 days free and then $11.99/Month
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
– Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase
- You may cancel a subscription during its free trial period via the subscription setting through your iTunes account. This must be done 24 hours before the end of the subscription period to avoid being charged. Please visit http://support.apple.com/kb/ht4098 for more information
- You may turn off the auto-renewal of your subscription via your iTunes Account Settings. However, you are not able to cancel the current subscription during its active period
- Any unused portion of a free-trial period, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription

■ Suggest:
* In most countries, it is recommended to use the IKEv2 protocol first, for better stability and connection speed.
* When the connection fails, please switch to OpenVPN UDP and OpenVPN TCP protocol in turn.
* Switching to different countries may also increase access speed or connection success rate

■ Privacy Policy:
*When the user is in normal use, we will not log any logs related to the user.
* Only when the user actively fails to connect the connection (requires the user to click the feedback button), we will collect the necessary user connection failure log.
*The connection failure log collected is limited to the success rate of our engineers to improve the VPN connection, and will not be shared with any individual or organization.

Links to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy can be found below.
Privacy Policy: https://www.mobilejump.mobi/about/privacy.html
Terms of Use: https://www.mobilejump.mobi/about/tos.html
